SourceText: We were not able to stick to the rule
text: Khange sikwazi ukuhlala kulomthetho

SourceText: The rule needs to be specific and realistic. Make sure to have a rule that can be kept easily, like having one meal together every Sunday instead of every night.
text: Umthetho kufuneka ucace uze kwaye unyaniseke. Qinisekisa ukuba umgaqo obekwayo unokugcinwa lula, njengokutya isidlo kunye qho ngeCawa endaweni yokwenza oko ubusuku ngabunye.

SourceText: My teen and I disagree on which areas and online activities were unsafe
text: Mna nomntwana wam ofikisayo asivumelananga ukuba zeziphi indawo kwaye nemisebenzi ye intanethi engakhuselekanga

SourceText: Well done for trying the activity! When we listen to our teenagers, even if we disagree, we learn to understand their thinking. Try and find time to do the activity again – try to really listen and show you understand them before sharing your thoughts.
text: Usebenzile ngokuzama ukwenza le midlalo! Xa sibamamela abantwana bethu abafikisayo, nokuba asivumelani nabo, sifunda ukuqonda indlela abacinga ngayo. Zama ukufumana ixesha lokwenza le midlalo kwakhona - zama ukumamela nyhani uze ubonise ukuba uyabaqonda ngaphambi kokwabelana ngeengcinga zakho.

SourceText: My teen identified the house of someone I trust as unsafe. I was shocked and did not know what to do
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo uchonge indlu yomntu endimthembayo njenge ngakhuselekanga. Bendothukile kwaye ndingazi ukuba ndingenza ntoni

SourceText: It is shocking to learn that people who are close to us and who we trust may be a danger to our teens. Remember to take a pause when you are upset and try to listen calmly to your teen. Find someone you can talk to about this, perhaps a friend or support service, so you can get the support you need.
text: Kuyothusa ukwazi ukuba abantu abasondeleyo kuthi kwaye esibathembayo banganobungozi kubantwana bethu abafikisayo. Khumbula ukuthi nqumama xana ukhathazekile kwaye uzame ukumamela ngokuzolile umntwana wakho ofikisayo. Fumana umntu ongathetha naye malunga nale nto, mhlawumbi umhlobo okanye inkonzo yenkxaso, ukwazi ukufumana inkxaso oyidingayo.

SourceText: My teen thinks a place is safe, but I don’t agree. I’m not sure how to talk to them about it
text: Umntana wam ofikisayo ucinga yindawo ekhuselekileyo, kodwa andivumelani naye, Andiqinisekanga ukuba ndingathetha malunga nalento

SourceText: This can be very frustrating. To find a solution, your teen needs to feel heard – so listen calmly to your teen's reasons and only then share your own thoughts. Then, think together about a rule that allows them to have fun but stay safe.
text: Oku kungakwazi ukuphazamisa kakhulu. Fumana isisombululo, umntwana wakho ofikisayo udinga ukuziva emanyelwe - ngoko ke mamele ngokuzolileyo kwizizathu zomntwana wakho ofikisayo, kwaye emva koko kuphela oya kuthi uthethe ngezakho iingcinga. Emva koko, cingani kunye ngomgaqo obavumelayo ukuba bonwabe kodwa bahlale bekhuselekile.

SourceText: As an adult, I feel responsible to protect — but when I told my teen what is safe and what is not, my teen got angry
text: Njengomntu omdala, ndiziva ndinoxanduva lokukhusela - kodwa xa ndixelela umntwana wam ofikisayo oko kukhuselekileyo kunye nokungakhuselekanga, umntwana wam ofikisayo uba nomsindo

SourceText: Our teenagers may know things about our communities and technology that we are not aware of. When we actively involve our teens in the mapping activity and really listen to them, they feel heard and valued, and it can be easier to come up with a plan that everyone agrees on.
text: Abantwana bethu basenokwazi izinto ngeendawo esihlala kuzo kunye neteknoloji ekusenokwenzeka asizazi thina. Xa sibabandakanya ngokupheleleyo abantwana bethu abafikisayo ekucebeni izinto size sibamamele nyhani, baziva bemanyelwa kwaye bexatyiswa, ibe kungalula ukuza necebo wonke umntu avumelana nalo.

SourceText: It was hard to identify support resources available in my community
text: Kunzima ukuchonga izixhobo zenkxaso ezikhoyo kwindawo endihlala kuyo

SourceText: It is difficult to know every detail about our communities. Involve another family member or friend in your mapping activity. You can even visit some of the services available and ask what they do. The more we know, the better we can keep our families safe!
text: Kunzima ukwazi zonke iinkcukacha malunga ngeendawo esihlala kuzo. Ukubandakanya elinye ilungu losapho okanye umhlobo kumdlalo wakho wokuzoba i mephu. Usenokude undwendwele ezinye zeenkonzo ezifumanekayo kwaye ubuze ukuba benza ntoni. Okukhona sisazi, kokukhona sinokugcina iintsapho zethu zikhuselekile!

SourceText: I do not know much about technology, so I do not know how to talk about it with my teen
text: Andazi nto kangako ngeteknoloji, ngoko andiyazi indlela yokuthetha ngayo kunye nomntwana wam ofikisayo

SourceText:
That is totally fine! You can still support your teen. Ask your teen to explain the gadgets they use — you could do this during one-on-one time. 

This is a great opportunity to show interest in your teen’s life and to discuss potential risks together. If you are not sure which rules to set, you can always agree, with your teen, to try a new rule for two weeks and then discuss how things are going and change the rule if needed!
text:
Lonto Ilungile ngokupheleleyo! Usengamxhasa umntwana wakho ofikisayo nangoku. Buza umntwana wakho ofikisayo acacise ngezixhobo abazisebenzisayo --ungayenza lento ngexesha lomnye nomnye. 

Eli lithuba elihle kakhulu ukubonisa umdla kubomi bomntwana wakho ofikisayo kwaye nixoxe kunye ngeengozi ezinobakhona. Ukuba awuqinisekanga nomthetho amuwuwubeke, ningakwazi ukusoloko nivumelana, kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo, ukuzama umthetho omtsha ngeeveki ezimbini kwaye ngoko nixoxe ngendlela izinto ezihamba ngayo kwaye nitshintshe umthetho ukuba kuyadingeka!

SourceText: My teen told me that something serious happened to them and I did not know how to handle it
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo undixelele ukuba behlelwe yinto ebalulekileyo kwaye khange ndiyazi ukuba ndingamelana njani nayo

SourceText: Praise your teen for telling you, that is not easy to do! Remember, you can use all the skills you picked from your toolbox: Take a pause, use the four steps of problem solving and reach out to get the support you and your teen need!
text: Mncome umntwana wakho ofikisayo ngoku kuchazela, ayonto ilula ukuyenza! Ukhumbule, ungakwazi ukusebenzisa zonke izakhono ozifumene kwibhokisi yakho yezixhobo: Yithi nqumama, sebenzisa amanyathelo amane okusombulula ingxaki kwaye fikelela ekufumaneni inkxaso wena kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo eniyidingayo!

SourceText: The conversation made me very uncomfortable because I was reminded of a negative experience I had
text: Iencoko indenze ndaziva ndingakhululekanga ngokuba indikhumbuze ngamava angalunganga endandikhe ndahlangabezana nawo

SourceText: When we are reminded of such experiences, it is normal to feel upset or angry. It is important to find a time when you are calm, so that you can think of what support you need. You may need to talk to someone.
text: Xa sikhumbula lomava anjalo, yinto eqhelekileyo ukuziva ukhathazekile okanye unomsindo. Kubalulekile ukuba ufumane ixesha naxa uzolile, ukuze ukwazi ukucinga ngenkxaso oyidingayo. Kusenokuba udinga ukuthetha nomnye umntu.

SourceText: One of us did not feel comfortable
text: Omnye wethu khange azive ekhululekile

SourceText: This is difficult stuff to talk about. Find a relaxing time for it. We know it is much easier to not talk about these things and to hope they will never happen to us. However, learning to deal with crises is like getting insurance — it is ALWAYS best to be prepared.
text: Kunzima ukuthetha malunga nezizinto. Fumana ixesha elizolileyo ngalento. Siyayazi ukuba kulula kakhulu ukungathethi ngezi zinto kwaye sinqwenele ukuba zingaze zenzeke kuthi. Sekunjalo kodwa, ukufunda ukumelana nengxaki kufana nokufumana inshorensi - ku SOLOKO kulungile ukuhlala ukulungele.

SourceText: I did not want to tell my family how much I earn
text: Bendingafuni ukuxelela usapho lwam ukuba ndamkela malini

SourceText: You do not have to reveal the exact amount you earn; you could give an estimate. You could say, “In this household, we have R2000 every month” rather than, “I make R2000.”
text: Awunyanzelekanga uchaze ngqo imali oyamkelayo; usenokuchaza inani eliqikelelwayo. Usenokuthi, “Apha ekhaya sine R2000 qho ngenyanga” endaweni yokuthi, “Ndamkela R2000”.

SourceText: When budgeting, we could not agree on what should fall under needs and what should fall under wants
text: Xa sisenza uhlahlo lwabiwo-mali, sisenoku ngavumelani ngento ekumele iwele phantsi kwezidingo kwaye yintoni ekumele iwele phantsi kweemfuno

SourceText: People’s wants and needs are different sometimes. Talking about them together can help you and your teen to understand each other, respect your differences and see where you can compromise.
text: Imfuno nezidingo zabantu zohlukene ngamanye amaxesha. Ukuthetha malunga nazo kunye kunganceda wena nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba niqondane omnye nomnye, nihloniphe ukwahluka kwenu kwaye nibone apho ninokuyekelela khona.

SourceText: I did not understand what to do
text: Andiyiqondanga into mandiyenze

SourceText: I am sorry to hear this. I know it can be difficult! Why don’t you try to go through the module again? Your teen or other family members can join and help you!
text: Ndiyaxolisa ukuva oku. Ndiyayiqonda ukuba kunganzima! Kutheni ungazami ukuya kwimodyuli kwakhona? Umntwana wakho ofikisayo okanye amanye amalungu osapho angajoyina kwaye akuncede!

SourceText: My teen did not want to do the budgeting with me
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo khange afune senze uhlahlo lwabiwo mali kunye nam

SourceText:
Try making the budget with other adults in your home first. Your teen may get interested in what you are doing.

Making a budget may sound serious but try to make it fun — make it a game during one-on-one time!

Remember to praise them when you are done!
text:
Zama ukwenza uhlahlo lwabiwo mali momnye umntu omdala kusapho lwakho ekhaya kuqala. Umntwana wakho ofikisayo anganomdla walonto niyenzayo.

Ukwenza uhlahlo lwabiwo mali kungavakala kunzulu kodwa zama uyenze ibemnandi-- yenza ibengumdlalo ngelixa lomnye nomnye!.

Khumbula ukubancoma xana nigqibile!

SourceText: It made me uncomfortable
text: Indenze andakhululeka

SourceText:
Talking about body changes, intimate relationships, and sex can be uncomfortable – many parents feel this way!

Remember, these are all normal parts of life. The more you talk about them and educate your teen, the more prepared they are for keeping themselves healthy and safe.
text:
Ukuthetha malunga notshintsho lomzimba,, nobundlelwane obusondeleneyo, kunye nezesondo ungaziva ungakhululekanga - abazali abaninzi baziva ngalondlela!

Khumbula, zonke ezizinto zizizgaba eziqhelekileyo zobomi. Okungona uthetha malunga nazo kwaye ufundise umntwana wakho ofikisayo, kokukhona ubalungiselela bazigcine besempilweni kwaye bekhuselekile.

SourceText: It made my teen uncomfortable
text: Imenze umntwana wam ofikisayo akakhululeka

SourceText:
Teens often do not want to speak to their parents about body changes, intimate relationships, and sex. Tell your teen that that is normal and you also went through this.

If they do not want to talk to you, give them resources so they can learn about the topic. Tell your teen that you are happy to speak with them any time!
text:
Abantwana abafikisayo amaxesha amaninzi abathandi ukuthetha nabazali babo ngotshintsho lomzimba, nobundlelwane obusondeleyo kunye nezesondo. Xelela umntana wakho ofikisayo ukuba yinto eqhelekileyo kwaye udlulile nawe kulento.

Ukuba abafuni uthetha kuwe, banike izixhobo ukuze bafunde malunga ngesihloko. Xelela umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba ungakuvuyela ukuthetha nabo nangaliphi na ixesha!

SourceText: I do not know where to find resources to support my teen's development
text: Andiyazi ukuba ndingayifumana phi imithombo yolwazi ukuxhasa ekukhuleni komntwana wam ofikisayo

SourceText: It can be hard to find resources! Go to your nearest clinic or another support service and ask what resources they may have available.
text: Kunganzima ukufumama Izixhobo! Hamba uye kwisebe lezempilo elikufutshane kuwe okanye kwamanye amasebe enkonzo zonceda kwaye ubabuze ukuba zeziphi izixhobo abanazo.

SourceText: My teen and/or I felt uncomfortable
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo kunye/okanye mna sizive singakhululekanga

SourceText:
Talking about potential dangers in our direct environment is never easy. However, dangerous situations can happen to anyone and helping your teen be prepared can make the biggest difference to keep them safe.

Try to have another conversation or practise with your teen so you can both get more confident with your new skills to stay safe.
text:
Ukuthetha malunga ngeengozi ezinobakhona kwindawo esihlala kuzo ngqo akuzange kube lula. Nangona kunjalo, iimeko eziyingozi zingenzeka nakubani na kwaye ukunceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba akulungele kunokwenze umehluko omkhulu ukuzigcina ekhuselekile

Zama ukuba nenye incoko okanye uzame kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuze nikwazi ukuba nokuzithemba ngakumbi ngezakhono zenu ezintsha ukuze nihlale nikhuselekile.

SourceText: I discovered my teen experienced a dangerous situation or trauma
text: Ndifumanise ukuba umntwana wam ofikisayo ubenamava kwimeko ezinobungozi okanye ezihlupha umphefumlo

SourceText:
It can be hard for teens to open up about a difficult situation or trauma they experienced, especially if it happened while they were in a place or with people that you may not approve of as a parent. 

Remember to breathe and listen to what your teen needs. You can find support together if needed.
text:
Kusenokuba nobunzima ukuba abantwana abafikisayo bakhululeke ukuthetha malunga nemeko enzima okanye ehlupha umphefumlo abaye bagqitha kuyo, ingakumbi xa yenzeke ngelixa bekulondawo okanye kunye nabantu onganako ukubangqina njengomzali. 

Khumbula ukuphefumla kwaye umamele ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo udinga ntoni. Ningakwazi ukufumana inkxaso kunye ukuba iyadingeka.

SourceText: The conversation reminded me of a difficult experience I had
text: Lencoko yandikhumbuza ngamava anzima endawafumanayo

SourceText:
It is normal to feel upset or angry when we are reminded of such experiences. Think about what support you may need. Taking good care of yourself is essential for taking good care of your family.

Once you are in a calmer space, you can try again to talk to your teen about how they can stay safe.
text:
Kuyinto eqhelekileyo ukuziva ucaphukile okanye unomsindo xa ukhumbula ngeemeko ezinje. Cinga malunga ngeyiphi inkxaso ongayidinga. Ukuzikhathalela kwakho kubalulekile ukukhathalela usapho lwakho kakuhle.

Xa unokuba kwindawo ezolileyo, ungazama kwakhona uthethe nomntwana wakho ofikisayo angahlala njani ekhuselekile.

SourceText: I was afraid my teen would think I was weak.
text: Bendisoyika kuba umntwana wam ebezocinga ukuba ndibuthathaka.

SourceText: Sharing feelings, especially the difficult ones, sets an important example for your teen! It actually makes everyone in the family stronger, because you can understand and support each other better.
text: Ukwabelana ngeemvakalelo, ingakumbi ezo zinzima, kubeka umzekelo obalulekileyo kumntwana wakho! Iye yenze wonke umntu kusapho omelele, ngenxa yokuba niyakwazi ukuqondana kwaye niyaxhasana omnye nomnye ngcono.

SourceText: I felt uncomfortable about naming specific difficult feelings
text: Ndiye ndaziva ndingakhululekanga malunga nokuchaza iimvakalelo ezinzima ngokucacileyo

SourceText:
Being specific is not rude or insensitive – it really helps others to understand you clearly and this prevents confusion in the family. 

Feelings, like anger and stress, are part of our lives. All we need to do when we feel angry and stressed is handle our emotions well by taking a few deep breaths before responding.
text:
Ukucacisa into ayikuku bakrwada okanye ungabi novelwano-inceda ngokwenene nabanye ukuba bakuqonde ngokucacileyo kwaye oku kuthintela ukubhideka kusapho. 

Iimvakalelo, ezifana nomsindo kunye nonxinzelelo, yinxalenye yobomi bethu. Into esidinga ukuyenza xa siziva sinomsindo kunye noxinzelelo kukumelana neemvakalelo zethu kakuhle ngokuthi siphefumlo kambalwa phambi kokuphendula.

SourceText: My teen felt uncomfortable when I shared my feelings
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo uye waziva engakhululekanga xa bendisabelana ngeemvakalelo zam

SourceText: Starting a new thing is always difficult at first. Give yourselves some time to get used to it and keep showing a good example by observing and sharing your feelings. Over time, your teen will learn to do the same, and they will feel even more loved and cared for!
text: Ukuqala into entsha kusoloko kulula ekuqaleni. Zinikeni ixeshana lokuqhelana nokuthetha ngeemvakalelo zenu kwaye niqhubeke nokubonisa umzekelo omhle ngokunika ingqalelo kwaye nabelane ngeemvakalelo zenu. Ekuhambeni kwexesha, umntwana wakho ofikisayo uzakufunda ukwenza into efanayo, kwaye uza kuziva ethandwa kwaye ekhathalelwe kakhulu!

SourceText: When I shared my feelings, my teen asked many questions, which made me uncomfortable
text: Xa bendisabelana ngeemvakalelo zam, umntwana wam ofikisayo ubuze imibuzo eminizi, endenze ndaziva ndingakhululekanga

SourceText: Sharing feelings helps your teen to be aware and learn to do the same. You can choose how much detail you want to share about the situation. It is up to you! You can also choose to answer questions later by saying, *“I am feeling angry/stressed now. Could you please give me some time? We can talk about this more tonight.”*
text: Ukwabelana ngeemvakalelo kunceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo ayazi kwaye afunde ukwenza into efanayo. Usenokwazi ukukhetha ukuba ziingakanani iinkcukacha ozakwabelana ngazo malunga nemeko. Kuxhomekeke kuwe! Unako nokukhetha ukuphendula imibuzo ngelinye ixesha ngokuthi, *“Ndiziva ndinomsindo/ndinoxinzelelo ngoku. Ingaba ungakwazi ukundinika ixeshana? Singathetha malunga nalento ngakumbi ngokuhlwa"

SourceText: I was too sad or overwhelmed to try sharing my feelings — I prefer to be alone when I feel like that
text: Bendikhathazeki kakhulu okanye bendixinekile ukuba ndingazama ukwabelana ngeemvakalelo zam – ndikhetha ukuba ndedwa xa ndiziva ngolohlobo

SourceText: It is okay to not want to share at that time. Find some time to explain later, when you feel calmer, so that everyone can understand.
text: Kulungile ukuba awufuni kwabelana ngalonto ngelo xesha. Fumana elinye ixesha lokucacisa, xa uziva uzolile, ukuze wonke umntu akwazi ukuqonda.

SourceText: I did not have enough time
text: Khange ndibenalo ixesha elaneleyo

SourceText: That’s okay — it can be hard to find time. Try starting with something small, like helping them with one task or asking about their day. Every bit helps.
text: Kulungile, kunganzima ukufumana ixesha. Zama ukuqala ngento encinci, njengoku kubanceda ngomsebenzi omnye okanye ukubabuza malunga nosuku lwabo. Yonke lonto iluncedo.

SourceText: My teen wasn't interested in the activity
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo wayengenamdla kulo mdlalo

SourceText: It can be tough when teens seem not interested. Try letting them choose the activity next time — it might help them feel more involved.
text: Kunganzima xa abantwana abafikisayo bebonakala bengenamdla, Zama ukubavumela bakhethe umsebenzi kwixesha elilandelayo - ingabanceda bazive bebandakanyekile kakhulu.

SourceText: I felt unsure what kind of activity would help with learning
text: Ndizive ndingaqinisekanga ukuba loluphi uhlobo lomdlalo olunganceda ekufundeni

SourceText: That’s okay. It doesn’t have to be school-related — even cooking or watching a video together can be a chance to learn and connect.
text: Kulungile, akunyanzelekanga ukuba inxulumane-nesikolo - nokuba kupheka okanye ukubukela ividiyo kunye ingaba lithuba lokufunda kunye nonxibelelwano.

SourceText: We did something together, but I don’t think it helped
text: Senza into kunye, kodwa andicingi ukuba incedile

SourceText: It’s normal to wonder if it’s working. Just spending time together builds connection and supports learning — even if it doesn’t seem obvious right away.
text: Kuqhelekile ukukhangela ukuba iyasebenza. Nje ukuchitha ixesha kunye kwakha unxibelelwano kunye nokufunda ukuxhasana - nokuba ayibonakali isekuhleni okwangoku.

SourceText: I tried, but my teen was too busy
text: Ndizamile, kodwa umntwana wam ofikisayo wayexakekile kakhulu

SourceText: Teens often have full schedules. Try asking when they’re free, or offer to join something they’re already doing — even briefly.
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo amaxesha maninzi unezincwangciso ezipheleleyo. Zama ukucela xana bengenzi nto, okanye uzinikele ukujoyina into abesele beyenza -nangokufutshane.

SourceText: My teen chose a competitive activity. I won and s/he got angry
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo ukhetha imidlalo yokhuphiswano. Ndiye ndaphumelela kwaye wazibona enomsindo

SourceText:
Competitive activities can be tough if your teen doesn’t like losing.

Once they’ve calmed down, talk about what it means to win or lose kindly.

Try suggesting activities where you work together instead of compete.

Need ideas for activities? Tap the ‘Play’ button at the bottom of the App.
text:
Imidlalo yokhuphiswano kungaba nobunzima ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo akakuthandi ukohluleka.

Kanye xa bathe bazola, thetha malunga nokuba kukuthini ukuphumelela okanye ukungaphumeleli ngokuthambileyo.

Zama ukucebisa ngemidlalo apho nizosebenza kunye endaweni yokukhuphisana.

Udinga iingcebiso ngemidlalo? Cofa u 'dlala' Iqhosa ezantsi kwi App.

SourceText: My teen refused to make or sign the agreement
text: Umntwana wam ofikisayo uye wala ukwenza okanye ukusayina isivumelwano

SourceText: That’s okay. Start by listening to what bothers them. Suggest a short trial: they choose one rule and you choose one. Keep it simple, try it for one week, then review together.
text: Kulungile. Qala umamele bathini obuti babo. Cebisa ngenzame emfutshane: Bakhetha umgaqo omnye kwaye uzakukhetha ubemnye. Wugcine ulula, wuzame iveki enye, emva koko niwuphonononge kunye.

SourceText: We disagreed about screen-time limits
text: Asivumelani malunga nemida yexesha lesikrini

SourceText: Pick one small change (e.g., no phones at dinner) and agree on exceptions for homework. Use a timer and review in a week.
text: Khetha utshintsho olunye oluncinci (umzekelo,akukho zifowuni kwisidlo sangokuhlwa) kwaye nivumelana ngezinto ezingaphandle komsebenzi wasekhaya. Sebenzise isibali xesha kunye nophononongo ngeveki.

SourceText: We could not agree on social media / app rules
text: Asikwazi ukuvumelana kwimidiya yoluntu/ umgaqo we-app

SourceText: Check age ratings and privacy settings together. Agree to keep accounts private, approve followers, and “ask before new apps.” Try these for two weeks, then adjust.
text: Khangela ubungakanani beminyaka kunye noseto lwabucala kunye. Vuma kungcina ii-akhawunti ziyimfihlo, uvumeleabalandeli kwaye 'ubuze phambi kwe-apps ezintsha ''Zama ezi veki ezimbini, emva koko ulungise.

SourceText: I did not have time to make the agreement with my teen
text: Khange ndibenalo ixesha lokwenza isivumelwano nomntwana wam ofikisayo

SourceText: That’s okay — life gets busy. Try finding a calm moment, like during dinner or before bedtime, to start with just one small rule together. yes My teen refused to make or sign the agreement.
text:
Kulungile - ubomi buxakekisa. Zama ukufumana umzuzu ozolileyo, njengaxa besitya isidlo sangokuhlwa okanye ngaphambi kokulala, niqale ngongaqo nje omnye omncinane nikunye. ewe Umntwana wam ofikisayo uyala ukwenza okanye ukusayina isivumelwano.
.

SourceText: I do not know enough about technology to set fair rules
text: Andazi ngokwaneleyo malunga netekhnoloji ukuseta imigaqo efanelekileyo

SourceText: Ask your teen to teach you during one-on-one time. Start with three basics: privacy settings, how to block/report, and “tell me if something worries you.” Set one rule per topic and test it.
text: Cela umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba akufundise ngexesha elinye kumntu ngamnye. Qala ngezinto ezintathu ezisisiseko: iisetingi zabucala, indlela ukubhloka/ ukuxela kwaye undixelele ukuba kukho into ekukhathazayo ''Seta umgaqo omnye ngesihloko kwaye uwuvavanye.

SourceText: My partner and I had different ideas about online rules
text: Iqabane lam kunye nam seneembono ezahlukeneyo malunga nemigaqo ye-intanethi

SourceText: Keep it consistent. Talk privately with your partner first and agree on two or three shared rules before discussing them with your teen. This helps everyone stay on the same page.
text: Ngcina ngokulandelelana. Thetha bucala neqabane lakho kuqala kwaye nivumelane ngemigaqo emibini okanye emithathu ekwabelwana ngayo ngaphambi kokuba nixoxe ngayo nomntwana wakho ofikisayo. Oku kunceda wonke umntu ahlale ekwimo enye.

SourceText: What challenges did you experience?
text: Ngowuphi umceli mngeni othe wahlangabezana nawo?

SourceText: Challenges other parents experience:
text: Imiceli mngeni abanye abazali abahlangabezane nayo:

SourceText:
Your data is important to us. This @global.privacy_policy sets out our policies for the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data in the use of @global.app_name_full.

Please read this @global.privacy_policy carefully. By downloading or using the app, you confirm to be informed concerning the collection and use of personal data in relation to this policy. We will not use or share your personal data with anyone except as described in this @global.privacy_policy.

The terms used in this @global.privacy_policy have the same meanings as in our @global.terms_and_conditions, which are accessible within the app, unless otherwise defined in this @global.privacy_policy.
text:
Idatha yakho ibalulekile kuthi. Le @global.privacy_policy imisela imigaqo yethu yokuqokelela, ukusetyenziswa, kunye nokubhengeza kwedatha yomntu ekusetyenzisweni kwe@global.app_name_full.

Nceda ufunde le @global.privacy_policy kakuhle. Ngokukhuphela okanye usebenzise le-app, uyaqinisekisa ukuba unolwazi malunga nokuqokelelwa nokusetyenziswa kwedatha yakho ngokumalunga nalomgaqo. Asizokusebenzisa okanye sabelane ngolwazi lomntu kunye nabani na ngaphandle ngokuba kuchaziwe kule @global.privacy_policy.

Imigomo esetyenzisiweyo kule @global.privacy_policy inenkcazelo ezifanayo kunye ne @global.terms_and_conditions zethu ezithi zifumaneke apha kwi-App, ngaphandle kokuba kucacisiwe kule@global.privacy_policy.

SourceText: What personal data does the app collect about you and how do we use it?
text: Yeyiphi idatha yomntu ethi le app iyiqokelele kuwe kwaye siyisebenzisa njani?

SourceText:
For the purpose of this @global.privacy_policy, 'personal data' means any information that enables us to identify an individual, directly or indirectly. We collect data as follows:
- Personal details (name; surname, gender, nationality, current country of residence);
- Contact data (phone number);
- Log data (IP address, device name, operating system version, configuration of the App when utilising our App, the time, date and your intentions within the App - which include but are not limited to any App buttons clicked or pages visited.)
We also collect information about the number and age of your children that, however, is not personal data.

All data collected is linked to your unique @global.app_name identification number. The ParentApp identification number produced within the app may also be used to link with any out-of-app surveys you may consent to as part of a @global.app_name_full research trial. If you are participating in a facilitated programme, your ParentApp identification number and app engagement data may also be shared with programme facilitators through an API for follow-up and support but will not be accompanied with personally identifiable information. 


1. **Categories of personal data processed**:
-   Personal data
-   Contact data
-   Log data
-   or any further personal data necessary to assert or defend one's rights in civil, administrative or criminal proceedings

2. **Purposes of processing**:
-   Providing the service (to provide parenting support including by communicating with you when you contact us)
-   Protecting our rights and interests in case of litigation
-   Feedback processing – you may provide us with feedback on the App. We always anonymise your personal information when sharing and publishing your feedback.

3. **Legal Basis**:
-   Performance of a contract 
-   Legitimate interests to protect our rights and interests

4. **Data retention period**:
-   We will retain your personal information for as long as you continue to use the App and for the period strictly necessary to achieve the relevant purposes. In any case, we will not process your data over 4 years after your last use of the App.
-   We will retain your personal information for as long as for the period strictly necessary to achieve the relevant purposes.
text:
Injongo yale @global.privacy_policy 'personal data'  ithetha ukuba naziphina iinkcukacha zokuba zisivumele ukuba sikwazi ukuchonga umntu,  ngqo okanye ngokungaqondakali ngokuthe ngqo. Siqokelela idatha ngoluhlobo lulandelayo:
-Iinkcukacha zomntu ( igama, ifani, isini, ubuzwe, ilizwe ohlala kulo ngoku);
- Inkcukacha zoqhangamshelwano ( Inombolo yefowuni).
-Idatha ye log ( idilesi yeIP, igama le device, operating system version, configuration of the App xa usebenzisa i-App yethu, ixesha, usuku kunye neenjongo zakho kwi -App ezithe zaqukwa kodwa azinamda naphina kumaqhosha e App acofiweyo okanye amaphepha ahanjelweyo.)
-Okubandakanya kodwa kungaphelelanga kuwo nawaphi na amaqhosha e -App acofayo okanye undwendwele iphaji leyo. Sikwaqokelela ulwazi malunga nenani kunye neminyaka yabantwana bakho,nangona kunjalo ingeyodatha yobunqu.

Yonke idatha eqokelelweyo iyakudityaniswa nenombolo yakho yesazisi eyahlukileyo @global.app_name. Inombolo yesazisi eveliswe ngaphakathi kwi App inokusetyenziswa ukudibanisa naluphina uphando lwangaphandle kwe App onokuthi uvume ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo njengenxalenye  @global.app_name_full yovavanyo lophando. Ukuba uthatha inxaxheba,abaququzeleli benkqubo eququzelelwayo ngokusebenzisa i- API  yokulandelela kunye nenkxaso kodwa abayi kukhatshwa kunye nolwazi oluchongayo lomntu.
 
1.** Iindidi zedatha yabucala eqhutywayo **
- Idatha yabucala
- Idatha yoqhangamshelwano
- Idatha yokungena
-Okanye nayiphi na enye idatha yobuqu eyimfuneko ekuqinisekiseni amalungelo omntu kwinkqubo zoluntu, zolawulo okanye zolwaphulo- mthetho.

2.** Iinjongo zokwenziwa komsebenzi**
- Ukubonelela ngenkonzo ( ukubonelela ngenkxaso yobuzali ukuquka nokunxibelelana nawe xa uqhagamshelana nathi)
-Ukukhusela amalungelo kunye nezinto esinomdla kuzo xa simangalelana.
-Ukusetyenzwa kwengxelo - ungasinikaingxelo nge -App.
- Sihlala sifihla iinkcukacha zakho xa usabelana kwaye sipapasha  ingxelo yakho.

3.** Isiseko somthetho**
-Ukwenziwa kwesivumelwano
- Umdla osemthethweni wokukhusela amalungelo kunye nomdla wethu.

4**Ixesha lokungcinwa kwedatha  siza kuzigcina iinkcukacha zakho logama uqhubeka usebenzisa i-App kunye nexesha eliyimfuneko elithe ngqo ukufezesika iinjongo ezifanelekileyo.
-Nokuba yeyiphi na imeko asizukuyiqhuba idatha yakho ngaphezulu kweminyaka emi 4 emva kokuba ugqibele kwi-App
-Siza kugcina ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ixesha elide,kangengexesha eliyimfuneko ngokuthe ngqo ukufezekisa injongo efanelekileyo.

SourceText: Information Sharing and Third Party Service Providers and Websites
text: Ukwabelana ngolwazi kunye nababoneleli ngeenkonzo yomntu wesithathu kunye newebhusayithi

SourceText:
Your personal data may be shared with third parties such as researchers and partners involved in the improvement or implementation of the app including those outside your country. Prior to the disclosure of information with research partners we will make them anonymous by extracting data and removing any personally identifiable information. In reading this @global.privacy_policy, you acknowledge that we will use your anonymised data in published research.

We may transfer your personal data outside your country, for example, to administer cloud services. We will ensure that any country, company or person that we pass your personal information, will treat your information with the same level of protection as we are obliged to and we will rely on Standard Contractual Clauses.

The app is supported by duly authorized third parties that may collect your personal data in order to provide their services. We do so for the following reasons:
-   To provide the app on our behalf;
-   To perform app-related services; or
-   To assist us in analysing how our app is used.

Links to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app:
-   [Apple Media Services](https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/)
-   [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
-   [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
-   [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
-   [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
-   [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

This app may contain links to other sites that are not covered by this @global.privacy_policy. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. This @global.privacy_policy applies only to the processing of your personal data by this app. It does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which this app links to.

We reserve the right to the storage of your data on third party servers or databases outside of the listed @global.app_name_full team (refer to the section on Third Party Service Providers and Websites) that provide security measures compliant with applicable privacy laws and regulations.

SourceText: Children’s Privacy
text: Imfihlelo zabantwana

SourceText: If you are under the age of 18 you are not allowed to use this app. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18. If we become aware that a user under 18 has submitted personal data without verifiable parental consent, we will delete such information as quickly as possible.
text: Ukuba uneminyaka engaphantsi kwe 18 awuvumelekanga ukuba usebenzise i-App. Asiqokeleli ulwazi olunokuchonga inkcukacha zabantu abangaphantsi kwe 18. Ukuba siyazi umsebenzisi ongaphantsi kweminyaka eyi 18 ungenise idatha yobuqu ngaphandle kwemvume yabazali eqinisekisiweyo, siya kuyicima loo nkcazelo ngokukhawuleza.

SourceText: Your data protection rights
text: Amalungelo akho okhuseleko lwedatha

SourceText:
Under data protection law, you have rights including:

Your right of access - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information.

Your right to rectification - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete.

Your right to erasure - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances.

Your right to withdraw consent for data processing at any time - You can choose to halt the processing of your data if consent was the legal basis for handling your information.

Your right to restriction of processing - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

Your right to object to processing - You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

Your right to data portability - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances.

You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. Depending on the circumstances and the nature of your request it may not be possible for us to do what you have asked, for example, where there is a statutory or contractual requirement for us to process your data and it would not be possible to fulfil our legal obligations if we were to stop. Further information on your rights is available from the [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).
text:
Phantsi komthetho wakho wokhuseleko lwedata, unamalungelo aquka: 

Ilungelo lakho lokufikelela - nelungelo lokucela iikopi zolwazi lwakho lobuqu

Ilungelo lakho lokulungiswa - unelungelo lokusicela ukuba silungise iinkcukacha zakho ocinga ukuba azichanekanga. Ukwanalo nelungelo lokusicela ukuba sigqibezele ulwazi ocinga ukuba aluphelelanga.

Ilungelo lakho lokucima - unelungelo lokusicela sicime iinkcukacha zakho kwiimeko ezithile.

Ilungelo akho lokurhoxisa imvume yokusetyenziswa kwedata yakho nangaliphi na ixesha - Unokukhetha ukunqumamisa ukusetyenziswa kwedatha yakho ukuba imvume ibisisisekho esisemthethweni sokufumana ulwazi lwakho.

Ilungelo lakho lokuthintela ukuqhubekeka - Unelungelo lokusicela ukuba sikuthintele ukusetyenziswa kolwazi lwakho buqu kwiimeko ezithile.

Unelungelo lokuchasa - unelungelo lokuchasa ukusetyenzwa kolwazi lwakho lobuqu kwiimeko ezithile.

Ilungelo lakho lokuphatheka kwedata - unelungelo lokucela ukuba ulwazi lomntu osinike lona siludlulisele komnye umbutho, okanye kuwe, kwiimeko ezithile.

Awunyanzelekanga ukuba uhlawule nayiphina intlawulo ngokusebenzisa amalungelo wakho. Ngokuxhomekeka kwiimeko kunye nohlobo lwesicelo sakho akunakwenzeka ukuba senze into oyicelileyo, umzekelo, apho kukho imfuneko esemthethweni okanye yesivumelwano sokuba siqhube idatha yakho kwaye akunakwenzeka ukuzalisekisa izibophelelo zethu ezisemthethweni ukuba sinokuyeka. Ulwazi oluthe vetshe ngamalungelo akho luyafumaneka kwi [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).

SourceText: User Agreement
text: Isivumelwano somsebenzisi

SourceText: Rules of Usage
text: Imithetho yokusetyenziswa

SourceText: @global.app_name_full is open-source, which means that its codebase can be found on GitHub for the wider software developer community. However, it's against the terms of use to alter the existing application or its materials, or to replicate any trademarks from the @global.app_name_full team. While the app is open-source, unauthorised translations or versions that do not credit the @global.app_name_full team are not permitted. Unauthorised access to confidential user data is forbidden. It's not acceptable to provide false information about yourself when using the app, make unfounded claims of affiliation, or inaccurately report the app's behaviour. Ensure that your usage of the app adheres to all local rules and laws. Adults only can use the app. If you are a minor in your country of residence you may not access and use the app.
text: @global.app_name_full ngumthombo ovulekileyo, oku kuthetha ukuba isiseko sayo sinokufumaneka kwi-1GitHub kuluhlu olubanzi lolunto lwesoftware. Nangona kunjalo, ngokuchasene nemigaqo yokusetyenziswa kokutshintsha usetyenziso olukhoyo okanye imathiriyeli yayo, okanye ukuphinda naziphi iimpawu zokuthengisa kwiqela le@global.app_name_full. Ngelixa i-app ingumthombo ovulekilyo, iinguqulelo ezigunyaziswanga okanye iinguqulelo ezingenatyala kwiqela le@global.app_name_full azivumelekanga. Ukufikelela okungagunyaziswanga kulwazi lomsebenzisi oluyimfihlo kwaye aluvumelekanga. Akwamkelekanga ukunikezela ngolwazi olungeyonyani ngawe xa usebenzisa i-app, wenze amabango angenasihlala ngokunxulumana, okanye uchaze ngokungachanekanga ukuziphatha kwe-App. Qinisekisa ukuba ukusetyenziswa kwakho kwe0-app kuthobela yonke imithetho nemigaqo. Abantu abadala kuphela abanokusebenzisa i-app. Ukuba ungumntu omncinci kwilizwe ohlala kulo awunakufikelela kwaye usebenzise i-app.

SourceText: Content Changes
text: Utshintsho lomxholo

SourceText:
The @global.app_name_full is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and user friendly as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app which will be delivered through updates. At present the app is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way.

In the future it is possible that some services may be offered that would incur a cost. We will never charge you for the app or its services without clearly making known to you first any access charges applicable.
text:
I@global.app_name_full iyazibophelela ekuqinisekiseni ukuba iApp iluncedo kwaye isebenziseka lula kangangoko. Ngesosizathu, sinelungelo lokwenza utshintsho kwi-App eya kuhamnjiswa ngohlaziyo. Okwangoku i-App isimahla kwaye injongo yethu kukuba ihlale ngolo hlobo.

SourceText: Security
text: Ukhuseleko

SourceText:
Our app stores and processes personal data that you have provided to us, in order to offer our services. It is your responsibility to keep your phone and access to the app secure. Removal of software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device is therefore not recommended. Doing so could make your phone vulnerable to malware, viruses, malicious programs as well as compromise your phone’s security features and could mean that the app will not work properly or at all.
All data collected by PLH is stored securely using encryption protocols, including encryption at rest and in transit, and is accessible only to authorized personnel.
To see how we handle your personal information, please see our @global.privacy_policy.
text:
I-App yethu igcina kwaye iqhubekekisa phambili idatha yobuqu osinike yona, ukuze sinikezele ngeenkonzo zethu. Luxanduva lwakho ukugcina ifowuni yakho kunye nokufikelela kwi-app ikhuselekile. Ukususwa kwezithintelo zesoftware kunye nolunye olubekwe sisixolelwano esisemthethweni sokusebenza sesixhobo sakho akukhuthazwa.Ukwenza njalo kungafaka ifowuni yakho emngciphekweni we-Malware, izifo, umonzakalo wemigaqo kwaye wenze ifowuni yakho imoshe ukhuseleko lwezinto ezingahakathi kwaye lonto ithetha ukuba i-App ayizokusebenza kakuhle kwaphela.
Yonke idatha eqokelelwe yi PLH igcinwe ngokukhuselekileyo kusetyenziswa iprothokholi yoguqulelo oluntsokothileyo, kubandakanya uguqulelo oluntsokothileyo ekuphumleni nasendleleni, kwaye lufikeleleka kuphela kubasebenzisi abagunyazisiweyo.
Ukubona ukuba siyiphatha njani inkcukacha yobuqu, nceda jonge i@global.privacy_policy yethu.

SourceText: Disclaimer
text: I-Disclaimer

SourceText:
Please be aware that, except in cases of wilful misconduct, gross negligence, breach of obligations arising from public policy or liability that cannot be limited under the applicable law, the @global.app_name_full team exclude responsibility for the following:

1. Certain functions of the app will require the app to have an active internet connection. The @global.app_name_full team cannot take responsibility for the app not working at full functionality if you do not have access to Wi-Fi, or you do not have any of your data allowance left.

2. Using the app outside of an area with Wi-Fi, will mean that your terms of agreement with your mobile network provider will still apply. As a result, you may be charged by your mobile provider for the cost of data for the duration of the connection while accessing the app, or other third party charges. In using the app, you accept responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the app outside of your home territory (i.e. region or country) without turning off data roaming. If you are not the bill payer for the device on which you are using the app, please be aware that we assume that you have received permission from the bill payer for using the app.

3. Although we endeavour to ensure that the app is updated and its content accurate, we do rely on third parties to provide information to us so that we can make it available to you. We do not regularly review all of the external sites and cannot guarantee that they are always accurate or reliable.

4. The @global.app_name_full team accepts no liability for any damage or loss, direct or indirect, you experience as a result of using the app, or arising from any reliance you may place on advice or information provided from the app. You should always exercise your own discretion and judgment appropriate to your own circumstances in relation to any advice or information provided from the app.

5. We are devoid of any responsibility for any instances of software bugs, viruses or other malicious material transmitted by a third party through our site.

6. Updates to the app occur regularly in order to improve performance and content, to adapt to new technologies, to prevent abuse or harm, to address legal, regulatory, safety, or security issues or for any other further need. The app is available on Android and Apple -- the requirements for this system (and for any additional systems we decide to extend the availability of the app to) may change. It is your responsibility to download app updates to keep using the app. The @global.app_name_full team does not promise that it will always update the app so that it is relevant to you and/or works with the operating system version that you have installed on your device. However, you agree to always accept updates to the application when offered to you.

7. The app site might not be available at all times for reasons of maintenance or trouble with associated software or hardware. We are not liable for any loss you may incur should the site not be accessible or is withdrawn. Equally, we have the right and choice to terminate your access and use of the app (including availability of captured data) at any time. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licenses granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must stop using the app, and (if needed) delete it from your device.

8. You agree to indemnify, at your own expense, PLH, its officials, employees, consultants and agents, against any claims, including your costs and expenses, by any third party, resulting from your use of the app.

9. Companies or products associated with the app should not be interpreted as endorsement by the app or the @global.app_name_full team or demonstrate an intention to infringe proprietary rights.
text:
Nceda uqaphele ukuba, ngaphandle kumatyala okungakhathali kakubi ngobom, ukungakhathali okugqithisileyo,ukwaphulwa kwemithwalo ezivela kwipolisi zoluntu okanye ubutyala obungenako ukulinganiselwa phantsi komthetho osebenzisa i @global.app_name_full elibandakanya uxanduva loku kulandelayo:

1. Imisebenzi ethile ye-app iya kufuna ukuba i-app ibenoqhagamshelo lwe intanethi olusebenzayo. Iqela le @global.app_name_full alinakuthatha uxanduva lokuba i-app ingasebenzi ngokupheleleyo ukuba awukwazi ukufikelela kwi-WiFi, awunaso nasiphi na isibonelelo sakho sedatha esisele.

2. Ukusebenzisa i-app ngaphandle kwendawo ene-Wi-Fi, kuya kuthetha ukuba imigaqo yakho yesivumelwano nomboneleli wakho wenethiwekhi yemfonomfono isengasebenza. Ngenxa yoko, unokuhlawuliswa ngumboneleli wakho wemfonomfono ngexabiso ledatha ngexesha loqhamshelo ngelixa ufikelela kwi -app,okanye ezinye iintlawulo zequmrhu lesithathu. Ekusebenziseni i-app, wamkela uxanduva lwazo naziphi na iintlawulo zedatha yokuzula ukuba usebenzisa i-app ngaphandle kwe ndawo yakho yasekhaya ( okuthi ingingqi okanye ilizwe) ngaphandle kokucima ukuzulazula wedatha. Ukuba awungomhlawuli wetyala lefowuni osebenzisa kuso i-app,nceda uqaphele ukuba sicinga ukuba ufumene imvume kumhlawuli wetyala ngokusebenzisa i-app.

3.Nangona sizama ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-app ihlaziywe kunye nomxholo wayo ochanekileyo, sixhomekeke kwiqumrhu lesithathu ukusinika ulwazi ukuze silufumane kuwe. Asijongi rhoqo onke amacandelo angaphandle kwaye asinakuqinisekisa ukuba ahlala echanekile okanye athembekile.

4. Iqela le @global.app_name_full alamkeli tyala ngawo nawuphi na umonakalo okanye ilahleko,ngokuthe ngqo okanye ngemva, ozifumanayo ngenxa yokusebenzisa i-app,okanye ngenxa yokuthembela nokuthi ongayifaka kwifowuni okanye ulwazi olunikwe kwi-app. Kufuneka usoloko usebenzisa ingqiqo yakho kunye nesigwebo esifanelekileyo kwiimeko zakho ngokunxulumene nalo naliphi na icebiso okanye ulwazi olunikwe kwi-app.

5.Asinalu xanduva lwazo naziphi na iimeko zeentsholongwane ze software okanye ezinye izinto ezinobungozi ezisasazwa liqumrhu lesithathu ngesayithi yethu.

6. Uhlaziyo lwe-app lwenzeka rhoqo ukuze kuphuculwe ukusebenza kunye nesiqulathisi, ukuziqhelanisa nobuchwepheshe obutsha,ukunqanda ukuphathwa kakubi okanye ukwenzakaliswa, ukulungisa imiba yezomthetho, yolawulo,yokhuseleko okanye nayiphina enye imfuneko.Usetyenziso luyafumaneka kwi-Andriod kunye ne-Apple - iimfuno zale nkqubo (kunye nayo nayiphi na inkqubo eyongezelelweyo sigqibe kwelokuba sandise ukufumaneka kwe-app ukuya) kunokutshintsho. Luxanduva lwakho ukukhuphela uhlaziyo lwe -app ukuze uqhubeke usebenzisa i-app. Iqela @global.app_name_full alithembisi ukuba liyakuhlala lihlaziya usetyenziso ukuze lufaneleke kuwe kunye /okanye lusebenza ngeguqulelo lwenkqubo esebenzayo oyifakileyo kwifowuni yakho. Nangona kunjalo, uyavuma ukuhlala ulwamkela uhlaziyo lwesicelo xa ulunikwa..

7. Indawo yosetyenziso i -app isenokungafumaneki ngawo onke amaxesha ngenxa yezizathu zogcino okanye iingxaki nge software ehambelanayo okanye ihardware. Asinaxanduva ngayo nayiphi na ilahleko onokuthi uyenze ukuba isayithi ayifikeleleki okanye irhoxiswe. Ngokulinganayo, sinelungelo kunye nokuthetha ukuyekisa ukufikelela kwakho kunye nokusetyenziswa kwe-app (kubandakanywa nokufumaneka kwedatha efakiweyo)nangaliphi na ixesha.Ngaphandle kokuba sikuxelela ngenye indlela,nokupheliswa (a) amalungelo nelayisenisi onikelwe yona ngokwale miqathango iya kuphela; (b) kufuneka uyeke ukusebenzisa i-app kwaye ( ukuba kuyimfuneko) uyicime ifowuni yakho.

8. Uyavuma ukuhlawula, ngeendleko zakho, i-PHL amagosa ayo, abacebisi babasebenzi kunye nee arhente,ngokuchasene nawo nawaphi na amabango, kubandakanywa iindleko zakho kunye neendleko zaye nawuphi na umntu wesithathu, ezibangelwa kusetyenziso lwakho lwe -app.

9. Iinkampani okanye iimveliso ezinxulumene ne-app akufuneki zitolikwe njengoqinisekiso lwe-app okanye iqela le @global.app_name_full okanye zibonise injongo yokucinizela amalungelo obuni.

SourceText: A challenge with alcohol or drugs
text: Umceli mngeni wotywala okanye iziyobisi

SourceText:
**Would you like to talk to someone about challenges you or a loved one are experiencing with alcohol or drugs?**

**Alcoholics Anonymous (AA)**
AA offers free, anonymous support for people who want to stop drinking. Meetings take place across South Africa.
📞 National Helpline (24/7): 0861 435 722
🌐 www.aasouthafrica.org.za

**Al-Anon Family Groups**
Al-Anon supports anyone affected by a loved one’s drinking. Meetings are free, safe, and confidential.
📞 National Helpline: 086 125 2666
🌐 www.alanon.org.za

**Nar-Anon Family Groups**
Nar-Anon provides support to family and friends of people struggling with drug addiction.
📞 National Helpline: 088 129 6791
🌐 www.naranon.org.za

**South African National Council on Alcoholism and Drug Dependence (SANCA)**
SANCA offers help with prevention, counselling, and treatment for substance use.
📞 General: 011 892 3829
📱 WhatsApp call: 076 535 1701
🌐 www.sancanational.info

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
The DSD helpline offers free 24/7 support for substance use and other social issues.
📞 Helpline: 0800 121 314
📩 SMS: 32312

**WhatsApp Chat Line – National Substance Abuse Helpline**
A free WhatsApp chat line for information and support around alcohol or drugs.
📱 WhatsApp: 087 163 2025 (8am–5pm)
text:
**Ungathanda ukuba uthethe nomntu malunga nengxaki wena okanye umntu omthandayo enijongene nazo ngotywala neziyobisi?**

**Alcoholics Anonymous (AA)**
AA inikezela ngenkxaso emahala, ebantwini abafuna ukuyeka ukusela. Iintlanganiso zihlalelwa kwiindawo ezise Mzantsi Afrika.
📞 National Helpline (24/7): 0861 435 722
🌐 www.aasouthafrica.org.za

**Al-Anon Family Groups**
Al-Anon ixhasa wonke umntu ochaphazelekileyo ngenxa yokusela komntu amthandayo. Intlanganiso zimahala, zikhuselekile kwaye ziyimfihlo.
📞 National Helpline: 086 125 2666
🌐 www.alanon.org.za

**Nar-Anon Family Groups**
Nar-Anon inika inkxaso kwintsapho nakubantu abanezihlobo ezilwa nokubangamakhoboka eziyobisi.
📞 National Helpline: 088 129 6791
🌐 www.naranon.org.za

**South African National Council on Alcoholism and Drug Dependence (SANCA)**
SANCA inika uncedo ngokuthintelo, iingcebiso kunye nonyango lokusetyenziswa kweziyobisi.
📞 General: 011 892 3829
📞 WhatsApp call: 076 535 1701
🌐 www.sancanational.info

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
Inombolo yakwaDSD emahala inikeza ngenkxaso 24/7 kusetyenziso lweziyobisi kunye neminye imiba yentlalo.
📞 Helpline: 0800 121 314
📩 SMS: 32312

**WhatsApp Chat Line – National Substance Abuse Helpline**
Incoko yamahala kaWhatsapp engenkcukacha kunye nenkxaso jikelele ngotywala okanye iziyobisi.
📱 WhatsApp: 087 163 2025 (8am–5pm)

SourceText: A legal problem
text: Ingxaki kwezomthetho

SourceText:
**Do you need legal assistance?**

**Black Sash Helpline**
Black Sash offers free advice on social grants, legal rights, and government services.
📞 Call or WhatsApp: 072 663 3739 / 063 610 1865
🌐 www.blacksash.org.za

**Legal Aid South Africa**
Legal Aid provides free legal services for low-income individuals across many legal issues.
📞 0800 110 110
📩 Send a 'please call me' to: 079 835 7179
🌐 www.legal-aid.co.za

**Refugee Rights Unit – UCT Law Clinic**
Offers legal advice and support for asylum seekers and refugees in South Africa.
📱 WhatsApp (for status): 072 499 8146
📱 WhatsApp (for rights): 078 594 5591
🌐 www.refugeerights.uct.ac.za

**South African Social Security Agency (SASSA)**
SASSA provides information about social grants and who qualifies for support.
🌐 www.sassa.gov.za 
(Click the ‘Social Grants’ tab to review your options)
text:
**Udinga uncedo ngezomthetho?**

**Black Sash Helpline**
Black Sash inika inkxaso ngengcebiso kwisibonelelo sikarhulumente semali, amalungelo omthetho, kunye nemisebenzi karhulumente.
📞 Call or WhatsApp: 072 663 3739 / 063 610 1865
🌐 www.blacksash.org.za

**Legal Aid South Africa**
Legal Aid provides free legal services yeyabantu abafumana imivuzo ephantsi jikelele ngengxaki ezininzi zomthetho.
📞 0800 110 110
📩 Send a 'please call me' to: 079 835 7179
🌐 www.legal-aid.co.za

**Refugee Rights Unit – UCT Law Clinic**
Inikezela ngengcebiso kwezomthetho kunye nenkxaso kwi asylum seekers kunye refugees in South Africa.
📱 WhatsApp (for status): 072 499 8146
📱 WhatsApp (for rights): 078 594 5591
🌐 www.refugeerights.uct.ac.za

**South African Social Security Agency (SASSA)**
SASSA unikezela ngeenkcukacha malunga nezibonelelo zika rhulumente kwaye nomntu oselungelwenu lokufumana lenkxaso.
🌐 www.sassa.gov.za 
(Click the ‘Social Grants’ tab to review your options)

SourceText: Feeling unsafe at home or in my relationship
text: Uziva ungakhuselekanga ekhaya okanye kwezobudlelwano

SourceText:
**Would you like to talk to someone about feeling unsafe in your home or with your partner?**

**South African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG)**
SADAG offers emotional support and referrals for people in distress, including those feeling unsafe at home.
📞 0800 567 567
🌐 www.sadag.org (Online support groups available)

**Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Command Centre**
The GBV helpline offers 24/7 support for anyone experiencing abuse or violence.
📞 0800 428 428
📩 Send a ‘please call me’ to: *120*7867#
text:
Ungathanda ukuthetha nomnye umntu malunga nendlela yokungakhuseleki ekhayeni lakho okanye kwiqabane lakho?**

**South African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG)**
SADAG Unikezela ngenkxaso yomphefumlo kunye nokugqithisela abantu abanonxinzelelo, kubandakanya nabo baziva bengakhuselekanga emakhaya.
📞 0800 567 567
🌐 www.sadag.org (Amaqela enkxaso ayafumaneka Online)

**Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Command Centre**
The GBV helpline offers 24/7 Ixhasa naye nabani onamava wokuhlukunyezwa okanye ubundlobongela.
📞 0800 428 428
📩Thumela 'please call' ku: *120*7867#

SourceText: A referral related to violence
text: Ukudlulisela okunxulumene nobundlobongela

SourceText:
**Do you need to find referrals for challenges relating to violence**?

**Crime Stop (South African Police Service)**
Report crimes or suspicious activity anonymously.
📞 0860 010 111

**Childline South Africa**
Free 24/7 support for children and anyone concerned about a child’s safety.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za

**Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Command Centre**
24/7 help for anyone experiencing abuse or gender-based violence.
📞 0800 428 428
📩 Send a ‘please call me’ to: *120*7867#

**Thuthuzela Care Centres (TCCs)**
Support for survivors of rape and sexual violence, including medical care and counselling.
🌐 Find your nearest TCC: www.gov.za/TCC

**Safeline (Male Survivor Helpline)**
Confidential support for boys and men affected by sexual abuse or violence.
📞 0800 035 553

Refugee Support (Scalabrini Centre)
Legal and psychosocial help for refugee children and families.
📱 WhatsApp (children): 063 656 5080
📱 WhatsApp (refugee rights): 078 594 5591
🌐 www.scalabrini.org.za
text:
** Ngaba kufuneka ufuna iindawo onokudluliselwa kuzo malunga nemimiceli mngeni enxulumene nobundlobongela**?

**Crime Stop(South African Police Service)**
Xela ulwaphulo mthetho okanye umsebenzi owukrokrelekayo ngokungazivezi wena.
📞 0860 010 111

**Childline South Africa**
Free 24/7 Inkxaso yabantwana kwaye nabani na onovelwano malunga nokhuseleko lwabantwana. 
📞 116

🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za**Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Command Centre**
24/7 Inceda nabani na oye wakuhlukunyezwa okanye wahlangabezana nokuphathwa gadalala ngokwesini.
📞 0800 428 428
📩 Send a ‘please call me’ to: *120*7867#

**Thuthuzela Care Centres (TCCs)**
Ixhasa abasindiliyo kuhlukunyezo ngokwesondo, ukuphathwa gadalala ngokwesondo, ukuquka ukunakekelwa ngezempilo kunye neengcebiso. 
🌐 Fimana ekufutshane nawe i TCC: www.gov.za/TCC

**Safeline (Male Survivor Helpline)**
Ukuxhaswa kwamakhwenkwe ekhusini kunye namadoda achaphazeleke kuhlukunyezo ngokwesondo okanye ubundlobongela.
📞 0800 035 553 Refugee Support (Scalabrini Centre)

Legal and psychosocial, inceda abantwana kunye intsapho ezingengabo abaemi balapha.
📱 WhatsApp (children): 063 656 5080
📱 WhatsApp (refugee rights): 078 594 5591
🌐 www.scalabrini.org.za

SourceText: Online safety
text: Ukhuseleko kwi-Intanethi

SourceText:
**Would you like to talk to someone about your concerns around your child’s online behaviour or experiences?**

**Childline South Africa**
Childline offers free, confidential support for parents and children. You can talk to a trained counsellor about anything that worries you.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za

**Film and Production Board (FPB)**
You can report Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM) and any form of harmful or violent content online.
📞 0800 148 148  
📱 WhatsApp 083 428 4767
🌐 Report online: https://apps.fpb.org.za/hotline/

**You can also report online safety issues directly through these platforms:**
- Tiktok 
- Meta (Facebook) 
- Instagram
text:
** Ungathanda ukuthetha nomntu malunga neenkxalabo zakho ezingqonge ukuziphatha komntwana wakho okanye amava kwi-intanethi?**

**Childline South Africa**
U-Childline unika inkxaso yamahala, eyimfihlo kubazali nabantwana. Ungathetha nomcebisi oqeqeshiweyo malunga nayo nayiphi na into ekukhathazayo.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za

**Film and Production Board (FPB)**
Ungaxela imathiriyeli yokuxhatshazwa  komntwana ngokwesondo, kunye naluphi na uhlobo lwesiqulatho esiyingozi okanye esinobundlobonela kwi-intanethi
📞 0800 148 148  
📱 WhatsApp 083 428 4767
🌐 Report online: https://apps.fpb.org.za/hotline/

**Ungaxela imiba yokhuseleko lwe-intanethi ngokuthe ngqo kulamaqonga:**
- Tiktok 
- Meta (Facebook) 
- Instagram

SourceText: A challenge in my family
text: Umceli mngeni kusapho lwam

SourceText:
**Do you need more information or support in managing a challenge in your family?**

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
Offers support with family issues, child welfare, and elder care. 
📞 0800 220 250 (Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm)
🚩 Visit your local DSD office (Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm)

**ACVV (Afrikaanse Christelike Vroue Vereniging)**
Supports families in crisis through social work, child protection, and community services.
🌐 www.acvv.org.za

**Badisa**
Faith-based organisation offering social support for families, children, the elderly, and people with disabilities.
🌐 www.badisa.org.za

**Childline South Africa**
24/7 helpline for children or families needing support, guidance, or to report abuse.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za
text:
**Ingaba ufuna ulwazi oluninzi okanye inkxaso ekulawuleni umceli mngeni kusapho lwakho.**?

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
Inikezela ngenkxaso kwimiba yentsapho, intlalo ntle yabantwana, kunye nokunakekelwa kwabantu abadala. 
📞 0800 220 250 (Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm)
🚩 Visit your local DSD office (Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm)

**ACVV (Afrikaanse Christelike Vroue Vereniging)**
Ixhasa intsapho ngonontlalo ntle, ukhuseleko lwabantwana, kunye nenkonzo zoluntu. 
🌐 www.acvv.org.za

**Badisa**
Faith-based organisation inikeza ngonkxaso yokuhlala kwintsapho, abantwana, abantu abadala, kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo. 
🌐 www.badisa.org.za

**Childline South Africa**
24/7 Umnxeba woncedo lwabantwana, intsapho ezidinga inkxaso, isikhokelo, okanye ukuxela ngohlukunyezo.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za

SourceText: Feelings of anxiety or sadness
text: Imvakalelo zokuxhalaba okanye usizi

SourceText:
**Do you have questions about what to do if you or a loved one may be feeling sad or anxious?**

South African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG)
Offers free mental health support, counselling, and referrals for adults and teens.
📞 0800 567 567
🌐 www.sadag.org

Lifeline South Africa
Provides 24/7 counselling and emotional support for anyone in distress.
📞 0861 322 322
📱 WhatsApp call: 065 989 9238
🌐 www.lifeline.org.za

Childline South Africa
Free helpline for children and young people needing emotional support or help.
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za
text:
**Ingaba unemibuzo malunga nokubawenze ntoni ukuba wena okanye umntu omthandayo unokuziva ulusizi okanye unexhala.**?

South African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG)
Inikeza inkxaso kululeko lwengqondo mahala,ingcebiso, kunye nokuthunyelwa kwabantu abadala kunye nabantwana abafikisayo. 
📞 0800 567 567
🌐 www.sadag.org

Lifeline South Africa
Inikezela 24/7 ngoluleko lwengqondo kunye nenkxaso yomphefumlo kuye nabani ongxunguphelayo.
📞 0861 322 322
📱 WhatsApp call: 065 989 9238
🌐 www.lifeline.org.za

Childline South Africa
Umnxeba woncedo olumahala wabantwana abadinga inkxaso ngokwemvakalelo okanye uncedo. 
📞 116
🌐 www.childlinesa.org.za

SourceText: A health referral
text: Ukudluliselwa kwezempilo

SourceText:
**Would you like to talk to someone about your health questions?**

**AIDS Helpline (National Department of Health)**
Free, confidential support on HIV, treatment, testing, and prevention.
📞 0800 012 322

**Cancer Association of South Africa (CANSA)**
Support, screening info, and referrals for cancer-related health concerns.
📞 0800 226 622
🌐 www.cansa.org.za

**Marie Stopes South Africa**
Support for family planning, abortion, and sexual health.
📞 0800 117 785
🌐 www.mariestopes.org.za

**Lifeline South Africa**
Counselling for sexual health, relationships, and unplanned pregnancy.
📞 0861 322 322
🌐 www.lifeline.org.za

**Termination of Pregnancy Services**
Public info on safe and legal abortion options.
📞 Department of Health 012 395 8000 
🌐 https://www.gov.za/services/services-residents/birth/terminate-pregnancy

**Men’s Sexual Health (including circumcision)**
Ask the professional nurse at your local clinic for free advice and services.
text:
**Ungathanda ukuthetha nomnye umntu malunga ngemibuzo ngempilo yakho?
 
**AIDS Helpline (National Department of Health)*
Inkxaso yasimahla, eyimfihlo kwi-HIV, unyango, uvavanyo kunye nothintelo. 
📞 0800 012 322

**Cancer Association of South Africa (CANSA)**
Inkxaso, ulwazi lokuhlola, kunye nokuthunyelwa kwiinkxalabo zempilo ezinxulumene nomhlaza.
📞 0800 226 622
🌐 www.cansa.org.za

**Marie Stopes South Africa**
Inkxaso yocwangciso-ntsapho, ukuphunza, kunye nempilo yezesondo.
📞 0800 117 785
🌐 www.mariestopes.org.za

**Lifeline South Africa**
 Ukucetyiswa ngempilo yezesondo, ubudlelwane, kunye nokukhulelwa okungacwangciswanga.
📞 0861 322 322
🌐 www.lifeline.org.za

**Termination of Pregnancy Services**
 Ulwazi loluntu ngeendlela ezikhuselekileyo nezisemthethweni zokuqhomfa.
📞 Department of Health 012 395 8000 
🌐 https://www.gov.za/services/services-residents/birth/terminate-pregnancy

**ImpiloYamadoda ngokwezesondo(Ukuquka nolwaluko)**
Cela umongikazi oqeqeshiweyo kwikliniki ekufutshane nawe ukuze akucebise kunye nenkonzo zasimahla.

SourceText: A disability
text: Ukukhubazeka

SourceText:
**Would you like to find someone to talk to for support regarding disability?**

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
Provides disability grants, support services, and referrals through offices across South Africa.
📞 Contact your local DSD office

**National Disability WhatsApp Support Line**
General guidance and referrals for all disabilities.
📱 WhatsApp: 081 517 8757
🌐 www.wcapd.org.za (based in Western Cape, assists nationally)

**South African Disability Alliance (SADA)**
A national network of organisations supporting persons with disabilities across different sectors.
🌐 www.sada.org.za

**BlindSA**
Offers support, advocacy, and accessible resources for blind and visually impaired persons.
📞 Helpline: 060 967 0258
🌐 www.blindsa.org.za

**Autism South Africa**
Information, resources, and guidance for families and individuals living with autism.
🌐 www.aut2know.co.za
text:
**Ungathanda ukufumama umntu onokuthetha naye ngenkxaso malunga nokukhubazeka?**

**Department of Social Development (DSD)**
Inikezela ngesibonelelo sokhubazeko, ixhasa ngenkonzo, kunye nokuthunyelwa kwii-ofisi ezinqamleze u Mzantsi Afrika.
📞 Contact your local DSD office

**National Disability WhatsApp Support Line**
Isikhokelo jikelele kunye nokuthunyelwa kwabo bonke abakhubazekileyo.
📱 WhatsApp: 081 517 8757
🌐 www.wcapd.org.za (based in Western Cape, assists nationally)

**South African Disability Alliance (SADA)**
Uthungelwano lwesizwe lwemibutho exhasa abantu abakhubazekileyo kumacandelo ahlukeneyo.
🌐 www.sada.org.za

**BlindSA**
Ibonelela ngenkxaso, ubhengezo, kunye nezixhobo ezifikelelekayo kubantu abangaboniyo.
📞 Helpline: 060 967 0258
🌐 www.blindsa.org.za

**Autism South Africa**
Ulwazi, izixhobo, kunye nesikhokelo kwiintsapho kunye nabantu abaphila noluphazamiseko.
🌐 www.aut2know.co.za

SourceText: A school challenge

Inikezela ngeengcebiso kubhaliso lwesikolo, kukuxhatshazwa, amalungelo, kunye neminye imiba ezinxulumene nesikolo.
📞 0800 202 933

SourceText:
Today's topic is about managing stress.

We know how stressful it is to bring up teenagers in these times. Learning to manage your stress helps you – and your family.
text:
Isihloko sanamhlanje simalunga nokulawula uxinzelelo.

Siyayazi kunzima kangakanani na ukukhulisa abantwana abafikisayo kula amaxesha. Ukufunda ukulawula uxinzelelo lwakho kunceda wena - kunye nosapho lwakho.

SourceText:
With a few small changes, you can feel more peaceful in your normal day-to-day life.

When you are peaceful, your family members will get calmer too!
text:
Kutshintsho oluncinci, ungaziva unoxolo ngakumbi kubomi bakho besiqhelo bemihla ngemihla.

Xa unoxolo, nosapho lwakho luyazola!

SourceText: Let’s look at an example of how stress can sometimes just get too much, for all of us:
text: Makhe sijonge indlela uxinezeleko olunokuthi maxa wambi lube ngaphaya kwamandla, kuthi sonke:

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_father.name lost his job. He was sitting at home feeling frustrated and stressed when @data.characters.f1_son_18.name entered the room.
text: u@data.characters.f1_father.name uphelelwe ngumsebenzi. Ebehleli endlini eziva ekhathazekile kwaye enoxinzelelo xa u@data.characters.f1_son_18.name engena egumbini.

SourceText: Thank you for thinking along! Let’s go back in time and see what @data.characters.f1_father.name does now:
text: Enkosi ngokucinga kunye! Masibuyele emva ngexesha kwaye sibone ukuba u@data.characters.f1_father.name wenzani ngoku:
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.name should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_father.name lost his job. He was sitting at home feeling frustrated and stressed, when his son @data.characters.f1_son_18.name entered the room.
text: u@data.characters.f1_father.name uphelelwe ngumsebenzi. Ebehleli endlini eziva ekhathazekile kwaye enoxinzelelo xa u@data.characters.f1_son_18.name engena egumbini.

SourceText: Here are a few skills to help you manage stress that you can use with your teens!
text: Nazi izakhono ezimbalwa ongazisebenzisa ukunceda wena ukwazi ukumelana nonxinzelelo ongazisebenzisa kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo!

SourceText:
Here is your home activity for this week:

Whenever you are feeling stressed or upset with your teen, take five breaths in and out before you react.

And when you're both calm, share with each other how you feel.
text:
Nanku umsebenzi wakho wale veki:

Nanini xa uziva unoxinzelelo okanye ukhathazekile ngomntwana wakho osafikisayo, phefumla kayi 5 ngaphakathi nangaphandle, phambi kokuthatha amanyatelo.

Kwaye xa nobabini ninomoya ozoliley, nabelane ngendlela omnye nomnye aziva ngayo.

SourceText:
**Remember to:** 

😮‍💨 BREATHE: take five breaths in and out before you react
🤝🏾 SHARE: when you're both calm, share with your teen how you feel
💙 SHOW: ask them how they feel to show you care
🔍 SEEK: find something positive in this situation together
text:
**Khumbula uku:**

😮‍💨 PHEFUMLA: phefumla kahlanu ngaphakathi nangaphandle phambi kokuba uphendule
🤝🏾 YABELANA: xa nobabini nizolile, yabelanani wena nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngohlobo oziva ngalo
💙 BONISA: babuze ukuba baziva njani ukubonisa ukuba uyakhathala
🔍 FUNA: fumanani into elungileyo kwesisimo kunye

SourceText: Remember, when we practice responding calmly and sharing how we feel, our teens learn to do the same. This skill will help them their whole life!
text: Khumbula, xa sizama ukuphendula zolileyo kwaye sabelane ngendlela esiziva ngayo, abantwana bethu abafikisayo bafunda ukwenza ngokufanayo. Esisakhono siyakubanceda ubomu babo bonke!

SourceText:
Today's topic is about giving positive instructions!

Telling our teens what we DO want them to do works better than telling them to STOP doing something.

You will see the difference.
text:
Isihloko sanamhlanje simalunga nokunika imiyalelo elungileyo!

Ukuxelela abantwana bethu abafikisayo ukuba BENZE ntoni kusebenza ngcono kunokuba sibaxelele ukuba MABAYEKE ukwenza into.

Uzakuwubona umehluko.

SourceText:
When you give positive instructions, your teen is more likely to listen! 

And remember to praise your teen for any good behaviour - the big and small things.
text:
Xa unika imiyalelo elungileyo, umntwana wakho ofikisayo uvame ukumamela ngakumbi!

Kwaye khumbula ukuncoma umntwana wakho ofikisayo namgayiphi na indlela yokuziphatha entle - izinto ezinkulu nezincinci.

SourceText:
Let’s do a thought experiment!

DO NOT THINK ABOUT AN ELEPHANT.
text:
Makhe senze umfuniselo wokucinga!

SUKUCINGA NGENDLOVU.

SourceText:
What are you thinking about? 

You probably DID think about an elephant...
text:
Ucinga ngantoni?

Mhlawumbi UYE wacinga ngendlovu...

SourceText:
In the same way, when we tell our teens “don’t do that,” they often focus only on the thing we told them not to do.
They may not understand what we *DO* want.

And like most of us, they don’t enjoy being told what not to do.
text:
Ngendlela efanayo, xa sixelela abantwana bethu abafikisayo ''sukuyenza lonto'' amaxesha amanintsi bagxila kuphela kulento besibaxelele ukuba bangayenzi. 
Bangangayi qondi eyonanto esifuna *BAYENZE*.
 
Kwaye ngokufana nathi sonke, abakonwabeli ukuxelelwa into amabangayenzi.

SourceText:
NOW, THINK ABOUT A CHEETAH!

What are you thinking about?
text:
NGOKU, CINGA NGE NGWE!

Ngoku ucinga ngantoni?

SourceText:
That’s right! Positive, clear instructions help teens focus on what they should be doing.

Teens will also feel more respected this way and are more likely to listen.
text:
Kulungile! Kuhle, imiyalelo ecacileyo inceda abantwana abafikisayo bagxile kulento bekufanele ukuba bayenze. 

Abantwana abafikisayo baye bazive behloniphekile ngakumbi ngale ndlela kwaye baye bamamele ngakumbi.

text: Masibone ukuba kwenzeka ntoni ukuba @data.characters.f2_grandmother.name sixelela @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name “SUKWENZA”:

SourceText: Here are some tips to help you give your teen clear and positive instructions!
text: Nanga amanye amacebiso anokunceda unike umntwana wakho ofikisayo imiyalelo ecacileyo nelungileyo!

SourceText: This week's home activity is to give your teen positive instructions.
text: Kuleveki umsebenzi wasekhaya kukunika umntwana wakho ofikisayo imiyalelo elungileyo.

SourceText: Remember, teenagers are much more likely to listen when we give positive, clear and realistic instructions.
text: Khumbula, abantwana abafikisayo bavame ukumamela xa sibanika imiyalelo elungileyo, ecacileyo kwaye enyanisekileyo.

SourceText: More positive instructions means less frustrations. And that is something we all want, right?
text: Imiyalelo eyongezelekileyo elungileyo ithetha ukudakumba okuncinci. Kwaye yinto esiyifunayo sonke, akunjalo?

SourceText:
Today's topic is about calm consequences.

Our actions have consequences. Some consequences happen naturally (“if you break something, you can’t use it anymore”). Other consequences we set as a family to motivate us to follow the rules (“if you come home late, you can’t go out with friends tomorrow”).

HOW you set and use consequences together matters.

Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.
text:
Isihloko sanamhlanje singeziphumo ezizolileyo.

Izenzo zethu zineziphumo. Ezinye iziphumo zenzeka ngokwendalo ("ukuba wophula into, awuphindi uyisebenzise nanini na"). Ezinye iziphumo sizihlela silusapho ukukhuthazana ukulandela imithetho ("ukuba ubuyela ekhaya emva kwexesha, awuzuphuma nezihlobo ngomso").

INDLELA obeka kwaye nosebenzisa ngayo iziphumo zombini zibalulekile.

Ukufumana iziphumo ngokulungileyo kunceda abantwana ofikisayo baziphathe ngcono kwaye kwenza nobomi bosapho buzole.

SourceText:
🎉 CONGRATULATIONS! 

You have done it! You have built lots of important parenting skills.

This is a huge achievement. It shows such care for your family.

Let’s celebrate you and plan your future @global.app_name support.
text:
🎉 SIYAVUYISANA!

Uyiqgibile! Uye wakha izakhono ezibalulekileyo ezininzi zobuzali.

Le yimpumelelo enkulu. Ibonisa inkathalo ku sapho lwakho.

Masivuyisane nawe kwaye sicwangcise ikamva lakho @global.app_name sikuxhase.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Calm consequences work best when they are fair, agreed on together, and followed through consistently - not in anger.
text: Iziphumo ezizolileyo zisebenza ngcono xa zilungile, nivumelene nonke, kwaye zilandelwe ngokuqhubekaya - kungekho msindo.

text: Wena kunye nosapho lwakho nifunde lukhulu. Masibuyele emva sibone ukuba lukhona na utshintsho emva kokufunda zonke ezizakhono zobuzali

SourceText: Here are a few tips to help you continue learning and supporting your community!
text: Nazi ingcebiso zokunceda uqhubeke ufunda kwaye uxhase ekuhlaleni!

SourceText: **Here are some ideas on how you can support each other:**
text: **Nazi ezinye imbono eninokuxhasana ngazo:**

SourceText:
Well done!

We are so proud of you. You have shown strength, courage, and love for your family. Parents are amazing. You are amazing.
text:
Wenze kakukhle!

Siyazidla ngawe. Ubonise amandla, inkuthazo, kunye nothando kusapho lwakho. Abazali bayamangalisa. Uyamangalisa.

SourceText:
Teens often break rules. This is normal - growing up is a difficult time when they are learning about who they are.

Luckily, there are ways to discipline without getting angry or using violence… and they work well!

Giving calm consequences is important because it helps teens learn from their actions and take responsibility for their choices.
text:
Abantwana abafikisayo bahlala beyophula imithetho. Oku kuqhelekile - ukukhula lixesha elinzima xa befunda malunga ukuba bangobani. 

Ngethamsanqa, zikhona iindlela zokuqeqesha ngaphandle kokuba nomsindo okanye ukusebenzisa ubundlobongela… kwaye zisebenza kakuhle!

Ukunika iziphumo ezizolileyo kubalulekile ngokuba kunceda abantwana abafikisayo bafunde kwizenzo zabo kwaye bathathe uxanduva ngezinto abazikhethela bona.

SourceText: Here are some tips to help you with calm consequences:
text: Nazi ezinye iingcebiso ezinokunceda kwiziphumo ezolileyo:
