SourceText:
I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it.

Shall we use an imaginary ‘Aunty Cecilia’ as our Safety Word? Just say something about Aunty Cecilia, I promise that I will try my best to help and I will not be angry – even if you are doing something you shouldn't be doing.
text:
Ndiyakhathala ngokhuseleko lwakho ngaphezu kwayo nayiphi into. Ukuba uye wakhathazeka, okanye usoyika, ungandifowunela rhoqo malunga noncedo, okanye undixelele ngalonto. 

Singasebenzisa umfanekiso ongengowenyani ka 'kaAunty Cecilia' njengeGama loKhuseleko? Itsho nje into malunga noAunt Cecilia, Ndiyathembisa into yokuba ndizakuzama kangangoko ndinako ukunceda kwaye andizukhathazeka -- noba wenza into ongamelanga ukuba uyayenza.

SourceText: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, how is Aunty Cecilia doing now?
text: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, unjani uAunty Cecilia ngoku?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: *(on the other side of the phone)* Not well. We need you at home. I will come pick you up right away. Where are you?
text: *(Kwelinye icala le phone)* Akukho nto intle. Sidinga wena ekhaya. Ndizazokulanda njengangoku. Uphi?

SourceText: You are playing so nice and quiet, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to clean up your toys.
text: Udlala kamnandi kwaye uthe cwaka, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. Kwimizuzu eyi 5, izakubalixesha lokucoca izinto zakho zokudlala.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: It’s time to put away your toys.
text: Lixesha lokubeka kude izinto zakho zokudlala.

SourceText: No. Not yet!
text: Hayi. Hayi okwangoku!

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, either you put away the toys now, or you won’t be able to play with your toys after dinner.
text: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, ingaba ubeka kude izinto zakho zokudlala ngoku, okanye awuzokwazi ukudlala ngazo emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don’t want to! I’m not finished with my game.
text: Hayi, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! Andifuni! Andikagqibi ngomdlalo wam.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! should not be translated.

SourceText:
Because you did not clean up your toys when I asked you to, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, you cannot play with your toys after dinner. 
Now please come and wash your hands.
text:
Kuba ungakhange uzicoce izinto zakho zokudlala ngexesha ndikuxelela ngalo, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, awuzokudlala ngezinto zakho zokudlala emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa.
Ngoku ndicela uze kwaye uhlambe izandla zakho.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: You are washing your hands so nicely, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name – well done!
text: Uzihlambe kakuhle izandla zakho, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name - wenze kakuhle!
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, would you like to do something fun together?
text: Molo @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, ungathanda ukuba senze into eyonwabisayo kunye?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Ooooh yes!
text: Ooooh ewe!

SourceText: What would you like to do?
text: Ungathanda ukwenza ntoni?

SourceText: Build a house out of bed sheets!
text: Ukwakha indlu ngeshiti lebhedi!

SourceText: Great idea! What do we need to do first?
text: Yingcinga entle! Kudingeka ukuba senze ntoni kuqala?

SourceText: First, we hang one bed sheet from the top bunk bed. It’s our first wall! Then, maybe we can use a pillow at the bottom.
text: Kuqala, sixhoma ishiti elinye phezulu kumaplanga ebhedi. Ludonga lwethu lokuqala! Emva koko, mhlawumbi singasebenzisa umqamelo ezantsi.

SourceText: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.
text: Kuyavuyisa ukubona ucinga yonke into ngocoselelo.

SourceText: Well done, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! This is a wonderful bedsheet house.
text: Wenze kakuhle, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! Le yindlu intle yeshiti lebhedi.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?
text: Singakwazi ukufunda ibali lethu lokulala apha ngokuhlwa?

SourceText: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, please walk slowly in the house! You’re going to break something.
text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, Ndicela uhambe kancinci apha endlini! Uzakwaphula into.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: I am just going to get my book quickly!
text: Ndizakuthatha nje incwadi yam ngokukhawuleza!

SourceText: Are you hurt?
text: Ingaba wonzakele?

SourceText: No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. I’m so, so sorry for breaking the vase… I didn’t see it.
text: Hayi, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. Ndicela uxolo ngokophula ivazi... Khange ndiyibone.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: I am not happy that you broke the vase, but thank you for realising your mistake and saying sorry. Do you know how you could have prevented that from happening?
text: Andonwabanga ngokuba wophule ivazi, kodwa ndiyabulela ngokuyiqonda impazamo yakho kwaye waxolisa. Ingaba uyayazi ukuba ubungayibalekela njani ukuba ingenzeki?

SourceText: Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you asked me to walk in the house.
text: Ewe, ngendimamele. Ndiye ndaqhubeka ndabaleka emveni kokuba undicelile ukuba ndihambe endlini.

SourceText: It’s OK, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. I’m proud that you are able to learn from your mistakes. Let’s get a broom to sweep up the pieces. We may be able to repair the vase with some glue.
text: Kulungile, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. Ndiyazingca ngawe ngokuba uyakwazi ukufunda kwimpazamo zakho. Masithathe umtshayelo ukutshayela amaqhekeza. Sisenokwazi ukulungisa ivazi ngesincamathelisi.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Okay…
text: Kulungile…

SourceText: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, I have 5 minutes to spend one-on-one time with you. What would you like to do?
text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, ndinemizuzu emi- 5 yokuchitha ixesha kunye nawe sisodwa. Ungathanda senze ntoni?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Let’s play with the ball outside!
text: Masidlale ngebhola ngaphandle!

SourceText: I can’t do it!
text: Andikwazi ukuyenza!

SourceText: I see that your hands are tight and you are speaking loudly. It looks like you are upset, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. It’s not easy, let’s practise a little bit more. I know you can do it.
text: Ndiyabona ukuba izandla zakho zibophelelekile kwaye uthethela phezulu. Ukhangeleka ngathi ucaphukile, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. Akukho lula, Masizame kwakhona. Ndiyazi ungayenza lento.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Five throws in a row! You seem really proud to have made it to five!
text: Ubambe ka- 5 kulandelelana! Ubonakala uzingca kakhulu ngokuba ukwazile ukubamba kahlanu!

SourceText: Let’s do 10!
text: Masenze 10!

SourceText: Well done! I am very happy to be able to spend this time with you, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name.
text: Uqhube kakuhle! Ndivuya kakhulu ukuba ndikwazile ukuchitha eli xesha kunye nawe, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: It looks like you’re having a lot of fun, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It’s almost time to clean up. In 3 minutes, please put your blocks away.
text: Kubonakala ngathi uyonwaba kakhulu @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Selisondele ixesha lokucoca, kwimizuzu emi 3 nceda ubeke iibloko zakho ecaleni.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: 3 minutes are over, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Please pack away your blocks.
text: Imizuzu emi- 3 iphelile @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name Nceda upakishe ibloko zakho ecaleni.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Okay.
text: Kulungile.

SourceText: Thank you very much for packing away the blocks when I asked you, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Because you listened so well, I will read you an extra story before bed.
text: Enkosi kakhulu ngokupakisha kude iibloks xa ndikucelile, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Kuba umamele kakuhle, ndizokufundela ibali elongezelelekileyo phambi kokuba ulale.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Yay!
text: Yay!

SourceText: Once upon a time…
text: Ngaminazana ithile…

SourceText: Give it back to me!
text: Yibuyisele kum!

SourceText: But I want it!
text: Kodwa ndiyayifuna!

SourceText: @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name and @data.characters.f2_son_8.name come and help me plant these vegetables together.
text: @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name kunye no@data.characters.f2_son_8.name izani nizokundincedisa sityale imifuno kunye.

SourceText: Thank you for coming to help me. We are going to grow lots of delicious vegetables together.
text: Enkosi ngokuba nize nizokundincedisa. Sizakulima imifuno emininzi emnandi kunye.

SourceText: I have 5 minutes and I would like to spend it with you, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. What would you like to do?
text: Ndinemizuzu eyi 5 kwaye ndingathanda ukuyichitha nawe, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Yintoni ongathanda uyenza?
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: I want to play dress-up!
text: Ndifuna ukudlala umdlalo wokunxiba!

SourceText: Wonderful idea, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! I see you are taking out the yellow scarf with blue stripes on it.
text: Ngumbono omhle, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Ndiyakubona ukhupha isikhafu esithyeli esinemigca eluhlaza.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, it’s for you.
text: u@data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, Sesakho.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Thank you, I love this scarf!
text: Enkosi, Ndiyasithanda esisikhafu!

SourceText: Wear it, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!
text: Sinxibe, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name! should not be translated.

SourceText: Well done for getting that dress on by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. You’re learning to do so many new things for yourself!
text: Wenze kakuhle ngokuzinxibisa ngokwakho loo lokhwe, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Ufunda ukuzenzela izinto ezininzi ezintsha ngokwakho!
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: You found one striped sock and one with dots. Let’s find socks that match.
text: Ufumene ikawusi enemigca enye kwaye enye inamachokoza. Masifumane iikawusi ezihambelanayo.

SourceText: Another sock! This one is white. It’s frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many clothes to look through.
text: Enye ikawusi! lena imhlophe. Iyakhathaza ukuzama ukufumana efanayo xa zininzi iimpahla ojonga phakathi kwazo.

SourceText: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.
text: Unomonde kakhulu kwaye uyajongisisa kakhulu, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Wenze kakuhle ngokuzama. Ndiyavuya uncedisa mna.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. should not be translated.

SourceText:
You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to do?
text:
Ufumene iikawusi ezimbini ezinepateni efanayo! Wenze kakuhle ngokunganikezeli @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Ngokuba undinceda kakuhle, ngoku ndinemizuzu emi 5 eyongezelelweyo yokudlala kunye nawe. Ingaba ungathanda ukwenza ntoni?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: Come on, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, it's time to get ready for bed.
text: Yiza, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, lixesha lokulungiselela ulala.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: But I still have so much homework to do!
text: Kodwa ndisenomsebenzi omninzi wesikolo ekufuneka ndiwenze!

SourceText: Hmm, this is the third night in a row that you haven’t gone to bed on time because of homework.
text: Hmm, Bubusuku besithathu evekini obu ungakhange ulale kwangethuba ngenxa yomsebenzi wesikolo.

SourceText: How can we make sure you get all your work done and still get to bed on time so that you get enough sleep?
text: Singaqinisekisa njani ukuba uyawenza wonke umsebenzi wakho kwaye ulale kwangethuba ukuze ulale ngokwaneleyo?

SourceText: Maybe I can start earlier?
text: Mhlawumbi ndingaqalisa kwangethuba?

SourceText: Shall we make a rule that you start your homework half an hour after you get home from school? That way, you can finish it and have some time to eat and relax before bed, too!
text: Singakwazi ukwenza umthetho wokuba uqala umsebenzi wakho wesikolo emva kwesiqingatha seyure emva kokuba ubuyile eskolweni? Ngalo ndlela, ungakwazi ukuyigqiba kwaye ube nexesha lokutya kwaye nelokuphumla ngaphambi kokulala!

SourceText: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.
text: Kulungile, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, have you started your homework yet?
text: @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, sowuqalisile ngomsebenzi wakho wesikolo?
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: I'll start now, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. Could you help me with this one problem? I was having trouble with it yesterday.
text: Ndizakuqala ngoku, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name Ungakwazi ukundinceda ngengxaki enye? Bendinengxaki kunye nayo izolo.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Of course, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.
text: Kunjalo, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Look, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name, I'm ready for bed earlier tonight!
text: Jonga, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name ndikulungele uyokulala kwangoko ngokuhlwa nje!
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Well done, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. I’m proud that we figured that problem out together. Now you can be well-rested for tomorrow, and your homework is done!
text: Wenze kakuhle,@data.characters.f2_son_8.name Ndiyazingca ngokuba siyifumene kunye le ngxaki, Ngoku ungakwazi ukuphumla-kakuhle ukulungela ngomso, Kwaye nomsebenzi wesikolo ugqityiwe!
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, it is important that you get your homework done so you can do well in school. Let’s make a rule about watching TV so that you have enough time for homework, too.
text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, kubalulekile ukuba wenze umsebenzi wakho wesikolo ukwenzela uzokwenza kakuhle esikolweni. Masenze umthetho ngokubukela iTV ukwenzela ukuba ubenexesha elaneleyo lokwenza umsebenzi wesikolo, nawo.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: What do you think would be a fair rule?
text: Ucinga ukuba umthetho olungileyo ingangowuphi?

SourceText: Hmmm… Maybe I can watch TV as much as I want, but only after I do my homework?
text: Hmmm... Mhlawumbi ndingayibukela iTV kangakoko ndifuna, kodwa kuphela emva kokuba ndenze umsebenzi wam wasekhaya?

SourceText: I like that idea, but let’s limit it to 30 minutes per day so that you have time for other fun and relaxing things too. How does that sound?
text: Ndiyawuthanda lo mbono, kodwa masilicuthe libe yimizuzu eyi 30 ngosuku ngalunye ukwenzela ubenalo nelinye ixesha lokwenza ezinye izinto ezonwabisayo neziphumlisayo. Ivakala njani lonto?

SourceText: That’s okay.
text: Ilungile lonto.

SourceText:
Thank you for doing your homework before watching TV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. 
Last night, you mentioned that your math tests have become easier for you. I am proud of you! We can increase your TV time to 45 minutes each day… as long as you still do your homework first.
text: Enkosi ngokwenza umsebenzi wakho wasekhaya phambi kokuba ubukele iTV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. Ebusuku izolo, ukhankanye into yokuba uvavanyo lwezibalo luya lubalula kuwe. Ndiyazidla ngawe! Singalinyusa ixesha lakho lokubukela iTV ngemizuzu eyi 45 suku ngalunye... uba nje usaqala ngomsebenzi wakho wasekhaya.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!
text: Enkosi, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! should not be translated.

SourceText: I am so happy to see you playing quietly with your building blocks, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to get ready for bed. When you are ready for bed, we can read a story together.
text: Ndiyavuya ukubona udlala uthe cwaka ngebhokisi zakho zokwakha, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Kwimizuzu eyi 5 izakubalixesha lokulungiselela ukulala. Xa ukulungele ukulala, singafunda ibali kunye.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Okay!
text: Kulungile!

SourceText: Time to get ready for bed, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. First, let’s get you nice and clean with a bath.
text: Lixesha lokulungiselela ukulala, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Kuqala, masikwenze ukuba ubemhle kwaye ucoceke ngokuba uhlambe.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: You were so well-behaved in the bath, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Now it is time to put your pyjamas on.
text: Ubuziphethe kakuhle ngexesha lokuhlamba, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Ngoku lixesha lokuba unxibe impahla yakho yokulala.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Well done for putting on your pyjamas by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Now let’s brush your teeth. Make sure you get the ones in the back of your mouth too!
text: Wenze kakuhle ukuba uzinxibise impahla zakho zokulala ngokwakho, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Ngoku masihlambe amazinyo wakho. Uqiniseke ukuba ufumana nalawa angemva emlonyeni wakho!
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: You did so well getting ready for bed! Now, we have time to read a story. Which book would you like to read?
text: Wenze kakuhle ukulungiselela ukulala! Ngoku, sinexesha lokufunda ibali. Yeyiphi incwadi onokuthatha ukuyifunda?

SourceText: Yay! Can you read me the story about the lion?
text: Yay! Ungandifundela ibali ngengonyama?

SourceText: “The end…” I’m glad you chose that story for us to read, it’s one of my favourites! Goodnight, my dear. I love you very much.
text: "Isiphelo...'' Ndiyavuya ukuba ukhethe elabali ukuba silifunde, lelinye lendiwathandayo! Ubusuku obuhle, sithandwa sam. Ndiyakuthanda kakhulu.

SourceText: Goodnight, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.
text: Ubusuku obuhle, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!
text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name yiza uzodlala nam ononopopi!
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.
text: (🤔_Ecinga_) Ndziva ndinoxinzelelo. Mandikhe nditsale umphefumlo ezantsi.. Phewww... Mhlawumbi ndingagqiba ukupheka ndithathe imizuzu embalwa ndidlale no@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Izokususa ingqondo yam kuwo onke la maxhala.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.
text: Kulungile, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, mandikhawuleze ndigqibe isidlo sangokuhlwa, emva koko ndizo kudlala nawe.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?
text: Onjani ubamhle unodoli wakho @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name ingaba unalo igama?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Hmmm, I will name her @data.characters.doll_name.name!
text: Hmmm, ndiza kumthiya igama u@data.characters.doll_name.name!
note: The string @data.characters.doll_name.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!
text: (🤔_Ezicingela_) Olunjani usuku. Ndinezinto ezininzi kwisitya sam, kodwa ndimile kwaye ndizama konke okusemandleni am yonke imihla. Kufuneka ndindwendwele nabahlobo bam ukuze sibambane kwaye ndikhunjuzwe ukuba asikho sodwa!

SourceText: Thank you for doing your schoolwork, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, and thank you for helping your sister, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I'm so proud of you!
text: Enkosi ngokwenza umsebenzi wakho wesikolo, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, kwaye ndiyabulela nokuncedisa kwakho udade wenu, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. Ndiyazingca ngawe!

SourceText: You always come home late!
text: Usoloko ubuya emva kwexesha!

SourceText: No I don’t, I don’t even know what late means! Stop nagging me.
text: Hayi andizange, andiyazi noba ukufika emva kwexesha kuthetha ukuthini! Yeka ukundidika.

SourceText: I want you to have fun, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, but I’m also worried about you staying out late. Do you know why?
text: Ndifuna wonwabe, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, kodwa nam ndiyakhathazeka ngokubuya kwakho sekuhlwile.Uyayazi ngoba kutheni?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Because you want me to have enough time for my schoolwork?
text: Kuba ufuna ndibenexesha elaneleyo lomsebenzi wam wesikolo?

SourceText: That is right. It is also not safe in this area to be outside after sunset. What do you think would be a good time for you to be home?
text: Unyanisile. Kwaye akukhuselekanga kulengingqi ukuba ngaphandle emva kokutshona kwelanga. Ucinga ukuba ingaba leliphi ixesha elilungileyo lakho lokuba sekhaya?

SourceText: I could come home at 10pm?
text: Ndingabuya ekhaya ngo10?

SourceText: That is a bit late, what about 6pm?
text: Sekuhlwile kancinci, unjani u6pm?

SourceText: Maybe we can agree I will come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays?
text: Mhlawumbi singavumelana ngokubuyela ekhaya ngo6pm ngentsuku zesikolo kwaye ngo10pm ngoLwezihlanu nangeMigqibelo?

SourceText: Yes, great. From now on, our household rule is that you need to come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays. But you always walk home with a friend. Okay?
text: Ewe, kuhle. Sukela ngoku ukuya phambili, umthetho wethu wasekhaya uthi kufuneka ubuye ngo 6pm ngentsuku zesikolo uphinde ngo10pm ngoLwezihlanu nangeMigqibelo. Kodwa rhoqo uhambe nomhlobo ukubuyela ekhaya. Kulungile?

SourceText: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.
text: Kulungile, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Thank you very much, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for helping to come up with a good rule together. I am proud to see how responsible you are getting.
text: Enkosi kakhulu, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, ngokundincedisa senze umthetho olungileyo kunye. Ndiyazidla ukubona indlela oya ubanexanduva ngayo.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for coming home on time. After you finish your schoolwork, we can have your favourite meal for dinner.
text: Enkosi, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, ngokubuya ekhaya kwangethuba. Emva kokugqiba umsebenzi wakho wesikolo, singafumana isidlo osithandayo sangokuhlwa.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, can I talk to you about something?
text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, Ndikwazi ukuthetha nawe malunga ngenye into?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: (_calmly_) Sure, my darling. What is the matter?
text: (_zolileyo_) Ngokuqinisekileyo, sithandwa sam. Yintoni ingxaki?

SourceText: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name wants us to study together tomorrow. I really like him but I am not sure what to do.
text: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name ufuna sifunde kunye ngomso. Ngokwenene ndiyamthanda kodwa andinqisekanga ukuba mandithini.
note: The string @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name should not be translated.

SourceText: (🤔_thinking to herself_) How has my daughter grown up so fast? What now? Take a deep breath…
text: (🤔_ezicingela yena siqu_) Ikhule kanjani intombi yam ngokukhawuleza? Yintoni ngoku? Phefumla kancinci…

SourceText:
(_calmly_) Thank you for sharing this with me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I know that you like @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name a lot, he is a charming boy and he does great at school, but you are only 16 and he is 18.

I feel worried that it is not safe for you to be alone with him. He might pressure you into doing something that you are not prepared to do.

I don’t want to tell you who you can see but we need to have some rules about how you spend time together.
text:
(_zolileyo_) Enkosi ngokwabelana ngalento kunye nam, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. Ndiyayazi into yokuba uyamthanda @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name kakhulu, yinkwenkwe enomtsalane kwaye uqhuba kakuhle esikolweni, kodwa una 16 qha kwaye yena una 18.

Ndiziva ndinexhala lokuba akukhuselekanga kuwe ukuba ubuwedwa kunye naye. Anganako ukukufakela uxinzelelo lokwenza into ubungazilungiselelanga kuyenza.

Andifuni kuxelela ukuba ngubani onokumbona kodwa kudingeka sibenemigaqo malunga nokuba ulichitha njani ixesha kunye naye.

SourceText: What do you think would be a fair rule about how you spend time together?
text: Ucinga ukuba ingangowuphi umgaqo olungileyo malunga nokuchitha ixesha nikunye?

SourceText: How about, we can spend time together if there is an adult with us?
text: Kunganjani, Sichithe ixesha kunye ukuba kungakho umntu omdala kunye nathi?

SourceText: That would be fine as long as his parents also know. I will chat with his mother when I see her later today. And after you get back, we can talk about how it went.
text: Kulungile oko kunganjalo ukuba abazali bakhe nabo bayazi. Ndizakuthetha nomama wakhe xa ndimbona emva kwexesha namhlanje. Kwaye emva kokuba ubuyile, singathetha ngokuba ihambe njani.

SourceText: _(hugs @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Okay. Thank you for coming up with a plan together, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.
text: _(Wamanga u @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Kulungile. Enkosi ngokuza nesicwangciso kunye, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

SourceText: Hi @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name! I have 5 minutes of one-on-one time before I leave for work. What would you like to do together?
text: Molo @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name! Ndinemizuzu emi- 5 yexesha lethu sobabini phambi kokuba ndihambe ndiye emsebenzini. Yintoni obungathanda siyenze kunye?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name! should not be translated.

SourceText: I was about to do my Geography project. We have to find the capital cities of all the East African countries. Can you help me with that?
text: Ndandizokuqala ukwenza iprojekthi yam ye Geography. Kufanele sifumane idolophu ezinkulu kuwo onke amazwe ase Mpuma Africa. Ungandinceda ngalonto?

SourceText: Of course! How can I help?
text: Ngokuqinisekileyo! Ndingakunceda njani?

SourceText: Great! I can remember the countries, and you could write them down? Then we can look up the capitals on your phone.
text: Kulungile! Ndiyawakhumbula amanye amazwe, kwaye ungawabhala phantsi? Emva koko sijonge emakhulu e fowunini yakho.

SourceText: Very good. Let’s do that.
text: Kuhle kakhulu. Masenze lonto.

SourceText: Wow, you remembered all the countries! And you were so clever to find the capital cities using the phone.
text: Wow. Uwakhumbula onke amazwe! Kwaye uye wahlakanipha kakhulu ukufumana amazwe amakhulu ngokusebenzisa ifowuni.

SourceText: Thank you, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. Can I go on TikTok now?
text: Enkosi, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. Ndingaya ku Tik Tok ngoku?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText:
You can have 30 minutes on TikTok after you finish your homework. 
I would also love to try TikTok. Can you help me set up an account tomorrow?
text:
Ungayifumana i mizuzu eyi30 kuTik Tok emva kokuba ugqibe umsebenzi wakho wasekhaya.
Ndingathanada nam ukuzama u TikTok. Ungandinceda ukwenza i akhawunti ku Tik Tok ngomso?

SourceText: Yes, of course! Then I can show you that cool video I told you about yesterday.
text: Ewe, nakanjani! emva koko ndingakubonisa la video intle bendikuxelela ngayo izolo.

SourceText: Shame my dear, you look really upset, do you want to tell me what happened?
text: Torho sthandwa sam, ubonakala ukhathazeke nyani, uyafuna ukundibalisela ukuba kwenzeke ntoni?

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_father.name, I am so worried about this boy. He is not doing his homework, he is only on his phone day and night. If he keeps doing this, he may fail his exams.
text: @data.characters.f1_father.name, iyandikhathaza into yalenkwenkwe. Akawenzi umsebenzi umsebenzi wakhe wesikolo, usoloko esefowunini imini nobusuku. Ukuba uyaqhubeka ukwenza lento uzakuzitshona iimviwo zakhe.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: I know, @data.characters.f1_mother.name. What can we do?
text: Ndiyayazi, @data.characters.f1_mother.name. Singenza ntoni?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: It’s that man, he… he… he touched me.
text: Yilandoda, e... e... e ye yandiphatha.

SourceText: (🤔_thinking_) Oh no, this is terrible! Let me take a deep breath… Now, what does my child need? She needs me to be calm and listen.
text: (🤔_ecinga) Oh hayi, imbi lento! Makhe ndiphefumle... Ngoku yintoni umntwana wam ayidingayo? Undidinga ndizolile kwaye ndimamela.

SourceText: Come and sit down next to me. Take your time, I am listening.
text: Yiza uzokuhlala phantsi ecaleni kwam. Thatha ixesha lakho, ndimamele.

SourceText: What if we talk to @data.characters.f1_son_18.name about how he can use his phone to support his schoolwork, and come up with some activities we could do together that don’t involve phones?
text: Kunganjani ukuba sithethe no@data.characters.f1_son_18.name ngendlela anokuyisebenzisa ngayo ifowuni yakhe ukuxhasa umsebenzi wakhe wesikolo, kwaye aze nemisebenzi esinokuyenza kunye engafuni fowuni?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name should not be translated.

SourceText: That is a great idea! Maybe we can both spend a bit less time on our phones as well, to set a good example for him.
text: Ngumbono omhle kakhulu! Mhlawumbi sobabini singachitha ixesha elincinci nathi kwifowuni zethu, ukumenzela umzekelo olungileyo.

SourceText: Yesterday when you went to see your friend. He just came and that’s when it happened. He… he… he made me have sex with him! I did not want to, I swear, and I even said NO, but he told me I would be in trouble.
text: Izolo xa ubuyobona umhlobo wakho. uvele weza kungelixesha iye yenzeka. u... u... undenze ukuba ndabelane naye ngesondo! Bendingafuni, ndiyafunga kwaye ndide ndathi HAYI, kodwa undixelele ukuba ndizoa sengxakini.

SourceText: Thank you for sharing this with me. I believe you. You are not in trouble. This is not your fault.
text: Enkosi ngokwabelana nam ngalento. Ndiyakukholwa. Awukho sengxakini. Ayilotyala lakho eli.

SourceText: You are right. I always think that I am relaxing when I am on my phone, but all that scrolling actually makes my head tired.
text: Unyanisile. Ndisoloko ndicinga ukuba ndipholile xa ndisefowunini yam, kodwa yonke lanto yokujonga-jonga yenza intloko yam idinwe.

SourceText: We’ve both been struggling to relax. You enjoy having your friend over. Why don’t you invite her for Saturday?
text: Sobabini besisokola ukuphumla. Uyakonwabela ukuhanjelwa ngumhlobo wakho. Kutheni ungammemi ngomgqibelo?

SourceText: Let’s decide together what to do. Your @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name loves you and he would want to help. Are you okay with it if I call him?
text: Masivumelane kunye ukuba senze ntoni. U @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name uyakuthanda kwaye angafuna ukunceda. Ingaba kulungile kuwe xa ndimfowunela?
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name should not be translated.

SourceText: I would really like that, thank you, and what about you? How will you relax?
text: Ndingayithanda lonto, enkosi, kwaye kunjani kuwe? Ungaphumla njani?

SourceText: Yes, that’s a good idea.
text: Ewe, ngumbono omhle.

SourceText: Some friends are watching the soccer match on the weekend. I should join them.
text: Abanye abahlobo babebukele umdlao webhola ekhatywayo ngempela veki. Kufuneka ndiba joyine.

SourceText: I am so sorry this happened to you, my child. We are here to support you. What you shared is important. We will find a way to get the help we need.
text: Engena egumbini_) Ndiyaxolisa ngento eyenzekileyo kuwe, mntwana wam. Silapha ukuba sizokuxhasa. Lento wabelane ngayo ibalulekile. Sizakufumana indlela yokufumana uncedo esiludingayo.

SourceText: That sounds like a great plan. You are always taking care of everybody, it is important that you also take care of yourself.
text: Ivakala ilicebo elihle. Usoloko ukhathalela wonke umntu, Kubalulekile ukuba uzikhathalele nawe.

SourceText: I think it would be a good idea to go to the clinic, so they can do a check-up to make sure you are okay. What do you think about that?
text: Ndiyacinga iyakuba ngumbono omhle ukuba uye ekliniki, bazokwenza uhlolo baqinisekise ukuba uphilile. Ucinga ntoni ngalonto?

SourceText: Yes… Okay… But will you come with me @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name?
text: Ewe... Kulungile... Kodwa ingaba uzakukwazi ukuhamba nam @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name?
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name? should not be translated.

SourceText: Of course I will. And @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Remember this is not your fault. We love you. You are a good person. We will get through this.
text: Ngokuqinisekileyo ndiya kwenza njalo. Kwaye @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Khumbula ukuba ayilotyala lakho eli. Siyakuthanda. Ungumntu olungileyo. Siza kudlula kulento.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? should not be translated.

SourceText: I am glad we could handle this together. I was so scared you would think this is my fault.
text: Ndiyavuya sikwazile ukubambisana ngalento kunye. Ndandisoyika kakhulu ukuba uzakucinga lityala lam eli.

SourceText: Of course not. A crisis can happen to any family. It is important that @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name trusts us and we can support her. We can also look online at what support and information is available to help us.
text: Hayi ngokuqinisekileyo. Ingxaki iyenzeka nakweliphi na usapho. Kubalulekile ukuba u@data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name asithembe kwaye singamxhasa. Singajonga kananjalo kwi-intanethi inkxso kunye nenkcukacha ekhoyo enokusinceda.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name should not be translated.

SourceText: I have never done this before. And now they will expel me.
text: Andizange ndiyenze le nto ngaphambili. Yaye ngoku baza kundigxotha.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I am so ashamed. I do not know what to do.
text: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, Ndineentloni kakhulu.Andazi ukuba mandenze ntoni.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: I do not want to have a baby.
text: Andifuni ukuba nomntwana.

SourceText: The test said I have HIV. I am scared I am going to die.
text: Uvavanyo lufumanise ukuba ndine ntsholongone kagawulayo. Ndiyoyika ndizakufa.

SourceText: I didn't really want to. Now I will get pregnant or be ill. @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, I am so scared...
text: Enyanisweni bendingafuni. Ngoku ndiza kumitha okanye ndigule. @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, Ndiyoyika kakhulu...
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: That looks fun! What are you watching?
text: Oku kubonakala kumnandi! Ubukele ntoni?

SourceText: This guy on TikTok gets a million likes on every post! My friends and I make our own videos too.
text: Lomfana ukuTik Tok ufumana ukuthandwa zizigidi kuzozonke powusti! Abahlobo bam kunye nam senza ezethu ividiyo nathi.

SourceText: That’s exciting! What do you like about making videos yourself?
text: Oko kuyonwabisa! Yintoni oyithandayo ngokwenza iividiyo ngokwakho?

SourceText: It’s fun to create them with my friends. And people comment on them a lot. I already have 600 followers!
text: Kuyonwabisa ukuzenza kunye nabahlobo bam. Kwaye abantu bayaphawula kuzo kakhulu. Sendinabalandeli abayi600!

SourceText: Wow, that must feel great. It’s exciting when other people like what we do. At the same time, it is important to make sure Tiktok is fun and safe for you. Do you have any ideas of how we could do that?
text: Wowu, kuvakala kukuhle. Kuyonwabisa xa abanye abantu beyithanda into esiyenzayo. Ngaxeshanye, Kubalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuba uTik Tok uyonwabisa kwaye ukhuselekile kuwe. Ingaba unazo naziphina ezinye iimbono zokuba singayenza njani lonto?

SourceText: Sometimes I get mean comments, or DMs from people I don’t even know. Maybe I should block them?
text: Ngamanye amaxesha ndiye ndifumana izimvo ezimbi, okanye DMs ezisuka ebantwini engabazi nokubazi. Mhlawumbi kumele ndibabloke?

SourceText: Yes, that’s a really good idea. Do you know how to block people? We can look it up together if you like? I am sure there are other steps too, like making your account private or limiting who can comment.
text: Ewe, ngumbono omhle lowo nyani. Uyayazi kublokwa njani abantu? Singajonga kunye ukuba uyathanda? Ndiqinisekile akhona amanye amanyathelo angamanye, Efana nokwenza akhawunti yakho ifihlakale okanye unciphise ngubani onokuphawula.

SourceText: Yes, let’s look it up together, thank you @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.
text: Ewe, Masijonge kunye,enkosi @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: I am glad we can talk about this, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. If something ever feels wrong, remember you can always come to me. We will figure it out together, and you can keep enjoying TikTok safely.
text: Ndiyavuya singathetha ngalento, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. Ukuba kunento engalunganga, khumbula ungeza kum naninina. Sizakuzama ukuyifumana kunye, kwaye ungaqhubeka wonwabele uTik Tok ukhuselekile.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: (_thinking_) I am so worried about Lerato. She has been acting differently lately. She seems quiet and keeps to herself.
text: (_ecinga_) Ndikhathazekile kakhulu ngoLerato. Wenza ngokwahlukileyo mva nje. Ubonakala ethule kwaye uzigcinela kuye.

SourceText: Mother, guess what happened at school. My classmate @data.characters.friend_female_5.name shared a sexy picture of herself with her boyfriend to prove that she loves him, and his friends told him to post it online. Now it is everywhere.
text: Mama, qikelela kwenzeke ntoni esikolweni. Umntwana ofunda nam u@data.characters.friend_female_5.name wabelene ngemifanekiso yakhe enomtsalane kwinkwenkwe yakhe uqinisekisa ukuba uyayithanda, kwaye abahlobo bakhe bamxelele ukuba azipowuste kwi-internet. Ngoku ikuyo yonke indawo.
note: The string @data.characters.friend_female_5.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Send me another picture or I’ll share the last one with your family and friends…
text: Ndithumelele omnye umfanekiso okanye ndizakwabelana nale yokugqibela nosapho lwakho kunye nabahlobo…

SourceText: (_thinking_): What if my friends and family see those other pictures I sent… I don’t know what to do! Maybe I should talk to my father.
text: (_ecinga_): Kungathini ukuba abahlobo kunye noswapho lwam babone eminye yemifanekisa endayithumelayo... Andiyazi ukuba mandenze ntoni! Mhlawumbi kufanele ndithethe notata wam.

SourceText: Why is your grandson showing my daughter those pictures at school!
text: Kutheni umzukulwana wakho ebonisa intombi yam lo mifanekiso esikolweni!

SourceText: I saw your profile. We are at the same school! Let’s chat privately, I’ll send you data.
text: Ndibone iprofayile yakho. Sikwisikolo esinye! Masincokole bucala, ndizokuthumelela idatha.

SourceText: Parent or caregiver
text: Umzali okanye umnakekeli

SourceText: Facilitator
text: Umbhexeshi

SourceText: System tester
text: Umvavanyi wenkqubo

SourceText: None of the above
text: Akukho nanye kwezi zingentla

SourceText: Man
text: Indoda

SourceText: Woman
text: Mfazi

SourceText: Prefer not to say
text: Ukhetha ukungatsho

SourceText: Partners
text: Amaqabane

SourceText: Donors
text: Abaxhasi

SourceText:
Breathe slowly. Pause.

Before you say anything, slowly breathe in and out five times. It will calm you, and give you a chance to think.
text:
Phefumla ngokucothayo. Yima.

Ngaphambi kokuba uthethe nantoni na, ngokucothayo phefumla uphinde uwukhuphe izihlandlo ezintlanu. Loo nto iya kukwenza uzole, kwaye ikunike ithuba lokucinga.

SourceText:
Share how you feel.

This is hard. Many of us were told not to cry, or show our feelings to our children. But take a deep breath and calmly tell them how you feel. They will understand better, and also learn from you how to deal with stress.
text:
Yabelana ngendlela oziva ngayo.

Lento inzima. Uninzi lwethu lwaxelelwa ukuba lungakhali, okanye lubonise abantwana indlela esiva ngayo. Kodwa ungaphefumla nzulu ngokuzolileyo kwaye ubaxelele indlela oziva ngayo. Baya kuqonda ngcono, kwaye bafunde kuwe indlela yokuhlangabezana kunye noxinzelelo.

SourceText: SHOW
text: BONISA

SourceText:
Show them you care.

This is also hard! Stress makes us focus on ourselves. But our teens need our support. Ask them how they feel. Listen to them and comfort them. Try a hug or say "I understand". It can change everything.
text:
Babonise uyakhathala

Nale inzima! Uxinzelelo lwenza ukuba sinike ingqalelo kwiziqu zethu. Kodwa abantwana bethu abafikisayo bayayidinga inkxaso yethu. Babuze indlela abaziva ngayo. Mamela kubo kwaye ubathuthuzele. Zama ubanga okanye uthi ‘Ndiyaqonda’. Ingatshintsha yonke into.

SourceText: SEEK
text: FUNA

SourceText:
Seek the positive.

Can you and your teen think about ideas that might help? Can you do something positive together to take your mind off the stress?
text:
Funa okulungileyo.

Ungakwazi wena nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ukucinga ngezinto ezinokuba luncedo? Ningakwazi ukwenza into elungileyo nobabini ukususa iingqondo zenu kuxinzelelo?

SourceText: GET REAL
text: YIBA SENYANISWENI

SourceText: Can your teen actually do what you are about to ask? It may be impossible for them to read quietly all day, but half an hour when you really need it is realistic.
text: Ingaba umntwana wakho ofikisayo angakwazi ukuyenza le nto uza kuyicela? Kusenokuba nzima kubo ukufunda ngelizwi eliphantsi imini yonke, kodwa isiqingatha seyure xa ufuna njalo kusenyanisweni.

SourceText: GET POSITIVE
text: OKULUNGILEYO

SourceText: Smile, look them in the eye and use positive words. Praise them as soon as they start to do what you ask!
text: Ncuma, Bajonge emehlweni kwaye sebenzisa amazwi alungileyo. Bancome kwa ukuba beqala ukwenza lonto uyicelayo!

SourceText: GET CLEAR
text: Cacisa

SourceText: Often we know what we want in our head, but we don’t say it clearly enough. Say exactly what you want your teen to do. Try ‘please come home by 7pm’ instead of ‘come home on time’.
text: Rhoqo siyayazi into esiyifunayo ezintlokweni zethu, kodwa asiyithethi ngokucacileyo. Thetha kanye oko ufuna ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo akwenze. Zama 'nceda ubuye ngo 7pm ekhaya' endaweni yokuba 'buyela ekhaya ngexesha'.

SourceText: MEET
text: DIBANANI

SourceText: Keep meeting regularly to give each other parenting support.
text: Qhubekani nidibana rhoqo ukuze nixhasane njengabazali.

SourceText: CALL
text: FOWUNANI

SourceText: Be ‘parenting buddies’ to call when you are upset or do not know what to do.
text: Yibani 'ngabazali abazitshomi’ ukuze nifowunelane xa nikhathazekile okanye ningazi ukuba nenze ntoni.

SourceText: TEXT
text: THUMELA UMYALEZO

SourceText: Text each other every week to share what you have done well.
text: Thumelelanani imiyalezo qho ngeveki ukwabelana ngezinto enizenze kakuhle.

SourceText: SHARE
text: YABELANANI

SourceText: EXPLAIN
text: CACISA

SourceText:
Check you are both calm. Take a few breaths. Explain to your teen why you are concerned about their behaviour.

Explain the reasons why the rule mattered. You can share your feelings – it is okay to say you are disappointed.
text:
Jonga ukuba nobabini nizolile. Phefumla kambalwa. Cacisela kumntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba kutheni uxakekile malunga nesimilo sakhe.

Cacisa izizathu zokuba kutheni lo mthetho ubalulekile. Ningabelana ngemvakalelo zenu - kulungile ukutsho ukuba uphoxekile.

SourceText: How you introduce calm consequences is important. When you involve your teen, things usually go better!
text: Indlela owazisa ngayo iziphumo ezizolileyo kubalulekile. Xa ubandakanya umntwana wakho ofikisayo, izinto ziya zibangcono!

SourceText: AGREE
text: VUMA

SourceText:
Plan consequences with your teen for following and not following the rule.

Ask for their ideas. Talk until you agree on something realistic.

Make a consequence for NOT following the rule and a privilege when they DO follow the rule.
text:
Cwangcisa iziphumo kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngokulandela kwaye nokungawulandeli umthetho.

Cela ezabo izimvo. Thethani nide nivumelane ngento eqondakalayo.

Yenza isiphumo SOKUNGAWULANDELI umthetho kwaye nelungelo xa BEWULANDELA umthetho.

SourceText: Remember, consequences are more successful if you discuss and agree in advance with teens before you apply them.
text: Khumbula, iziphumo ziyimpumelelo ngakumbi xa nibonisana kwaye nivumelane kwangethuba nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngaphambi kokuba usisebenzise.

SourceText: ACT
text: YENZA

SourceText:
**When your teen follows the rule, give praise and privileges!** 
They will feel respected and valued. Remember: The more we praise them, the more they will show that good behaviour!


**When your teen does not follow the rule, follow through with the consequence.** 
When your teen breaks the rule, calmly give the consequence. This should be FAIR (not too harsh), IMMEDIATE (do it straight away), CONSISTENT (same every time).
text:
**Xa umtwana wakho ofikisayo elandela umthetho, mncome kwaye umnike namalungelo!** 
Bayakuziva behloniphekile kwaye bexabisekile. Khumbula: Xa siqubeka sibancoma, kuxa beqhubeka nokubonisa isimilo esilungileyo!

**Xa umntwana wakho engalandeli umthetho, landelela ngeziphumo.** 
Xa umntwana wakho esophula umthetho, ngokuzolileyo mnike isiphumo. Kufanele lento ilungelane (ungabiqatha),
NGOKONANGOKO (yenze ngokonangoko), INGAJIKAJIKI (ngohlobo olunye ngalo lonke ixesha).

SourceText: Remember, you can also agree on GOOD consequences for GOOD actions to see more positive behaviour!
text: Khumbula, kananjalo ningavumelana ngeziphumo EZILUNGILEYO ukwenzela izenzo EZILUNGILEYO ukuze ubone isimilo esilungileyo ngakumbi!

SourceText: STEP 1: THINK
text: Inyathelo 1: CINGA

SourceText:
**What do we spend on now?**

Write down or draw what you spend money on as a family each month. 

How much does each item cost? 
How much money do you need in total?
text:
**Sicitha entweni ngoku?**

Bhala phantsi okanye uzobe ukuba niyichitha entweni imali nilusapho nyanga nganye.

Ingaba into nganye ixabisa malini?
Yimalini eniyidingayo iphelele?

SourceText: STEP 2: CHOOSE
text: INYATHELO 2: KHETHA

SourceText:
**Talk together about needs and wants.**

Which expenses are a ‘need’ that you cannot live without? 
Which expenses are a ‘want’ that is nice to have but not essential? 
Which things could you try to spend less on? 

When we explain and listen to each other carefully, we can make good money choices together as a family.
text:
**Thetani kunye ngezidingo kunye neemfuno.**

Zeziphi iindleko ezizidingo eningakwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwazo?
Zeziphi iindleko ezifunwayo ezingeyomfuneko ukubanazo kodwa ezingabalulekanga?
Zephi izinto eningazama ukuchitha kancinci kuzo?

Xa sicaciselana kwaye simamelana ngokuqaphela, singenza ukhetho oluhle lwemali njengosapho.

SourceText: STEP 3: BUILD
text: INYATHELO 3: YAKHA

SourceText:
**Make your own budget.**
Write down your income for the month. 
Take stones, beans, or anything with lots of bits - this is your income. 
Agree how much you will spend on each item, and put the objects on that image/word.
text:
**Yenza olwakho uhlahlo lwabiwo-mali.** 
Bhala phantsi ingeniso yakho yenyanga,
Thatha amatye, imbotyi, okanye nantoni eninzi enamasuntswana - le yingeniso yakho. 
Vumelanani ukuba niza kuchitha malini kwinto nganye, kwaye ubeke into kuloo mfanekiso/igama.

SourceText: STEP 4: PLAN
text: INYATHELO 4: Cwangcisa

SourceText:
Plan for emergencies and family goals.

Draw a circle ‘emergencies’.
Draw a circle ‘saving’.
Move your ‘money’ around so you can save a bit every month for both.
text:
Cwangcisela ingxaki zikaxakeka kunye namaphupho osapho.

Zoba isangqa 'uxakeka'.
Zoba isangqa 'ukonga'
Susa 'imali' yakho ngeenxa zonke ukuze ukwazi ukugcina isuntswana rhoqo ngenyanga kuzo zombini.

SourceText: Remind your teen to always tell you or a trusted adult if someone offers them gifts, airtime, money, or deals that are ‘too good to be true’ - online or offline - especially if asked for photos, favours, or to keep secrets.
text: Khumbuza umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba akuxelele okanye axelele omnye umntu omdala ukuba kukho umntu omthembisa ngezipho, ethayimu, imali, okanye izivumelwano 'ezilunge kakhulu ukuba zibeyinyani' - kwi-intanethi okanye ngaphandle kwe-intanethi- ngakumbi xa beye bacelwa imifanekiso, ububele, okanye ukugcina iimfihlo.

SourceText: Identify the problem.
text: Fumanisa ingxaki.

SourceText: Think of possible solutions and what would happen if we used them.
text: Cinga ngezisombululo ezinokubakho nokuthi kungenzeka ntoni ukuba sinokuzisebenzisa.

SourceText: Choose a solution and try it out.
text: Khetha isisombululo uze usizame.

SourceText: TEST IT
text: SIVAVANYE

SourceText: Did it work? Great! If it did not work, then try another solution.
text: Ngaba sisebenzile? Kulunge kakhulu! Ukuba asikhange sisebenze, khawuzame esinye isisombululo.

SourceText: MAPS
text: IIMEPHU

SourceText: Make maps with your teen of safe and unsafe areas in your community and online. Talk about how to keep their information, photos and videos private online. Talk about how once something goes online, it stays there forever. They might know an example from their friends.
text: Yenza imephu kunye nomntwana ofikisayo yendawo ezikhuselekileyo nezingakhuselekanga ekuhlaleni kwakhokunye ne intanethi. Thetha ngokuba bangalugcina njani ulwazi, imifanekiso neevidiyo zabucala kwi intanethi. Thetha malunga nokuba xa into ingenile kwi intanethi ihlala njani khona ngonaphakade. Basenokwazi umzekelo kubahlobo babo.

SourceText: RULES
text: IMIGAQO

SourceText: Make rules with your teen about how they can stay safe in your community (especially in risky areas that cannot be avoided), and how they can safely use the apps and websites that they like.
text: Yenza imithetho nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngendlela abanohlala ngayo bekhuselekile ekuhlaleni(ingakumbi kwindawo ezingakhuselekanga ongenakuzibaleka), nendlela ekhuselekileyo abangayisebenzisa ekusebenziseni i apps ne webhusayithi abazithandayo.

SourceText: Explore with your teen if you can create a rule around sharing with a trusted adult when something feels wrong. This can really help them stay safe in person and online.
text: Phanda kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisay ukuba ningenza umgaqo mayelana nokwabelana nomntu omdala omthembileyo xa kukho into engalunganga. Oku kunokubanceda ngokwenene ukuba bahlale bekhuselekile emntwini nakwi-intanethi.

SourceText: SAFETY WORD
text: IGAMA LOKHUSELEKO

SourceText: Agree on a Safety Word. If something happens that makes your teen upset, uncomfortable or scared, they can say the Safety Word and you will help them without getting angry or punishing them, even if they were doing something wrong.
text: Vumelanani NgeGama loKhuseleko. Ukuba kukho into eyenzekileyo yenza umntwana wakho ofikisayo wakhathazeke, angakhululeki okanye oyike, bangatsho iGama loKhuseleko kwaye ungabanceda ngaphandle kokuba ube nomsindo okanye ubohlwaye, nokuba bebesenza into engalunganga.

SourceText:
What Safety Word can you choose with your teen? Here are some ideas from other families:

🥑 A specific food
👵🏽 A specific family member
🐒 A specific animal
🤔 Something else
text:
Leliphi iGama loKhuseleko onolikhetha kunye nomntana wakho ofikisayo? Nantsi eminye imibono esuka kwezinye intsapho.

🥑 Ukutya okuthile
👵🏽 Ilungu losapho oluthile 
🐒 Isilwanyana esithile
🤔 Into engenye

SourceText: BE CALM
text: ZOLA

SourceText:
Take some deep breaths or walk away from the situation if you need to.

Then, respond in a calm, clear way.
text:
Tsala umoya ezantsi, okanye umke kwindawo ukuba ufuna njalo.

Emva koko, phendula ngokuzolileyo, ngendlela ecacileyo.

SourceText: Shouting at our children only makes things worse. It also teaches them that it is okay to treat others like this when they are upset.
text: Ukubangxolisa abantwana bethu kwenza izinto zibe ngakumbi. ikwabafundisa ukuba kulungile ukuphatha abanye ngoluhlobo xa becaphukile.

SourceText: BE FAIR
text: YIBA NOBULUNGISA

SourceText: Give a consequence connected to the behaviour, and make sure it is something you can follow through with.
text: Nika iziphumo ezinxulumene nokuziphatha kwaye uqiniseke ukuba yinto onokuthi uyilandele.

SourceText:
For example, if they do not clean up their toys, they cannot play with them the next day (rather than the whole week).

If your child is experiencing a natural consequence for their action (like not being able to play with their toy after breaking it), you might not need to give them an additional consequence.
text:
Umzekelo, ukuba abazicoci izinto zabo zokudlala, abanakudlala ngazo ngosuku olulandelayo (kuneveki yonke).

Ukuba umntwana wakho ufumana isiphumo sendalo ngesenzo sakhe (njengokungakwazi ukudlala ngento yakhe yokudlala emveni kokuba eyophulile), akudingeki ukumnika esinye isiphumo kwakhona.

SourceText: Follow through with a consequence every time a rule is broken, even if it feels small. Being consistent shows your child you mean what you say and helps them take the rules seriously.
text: Landela ngeziphumo ngalo lonke ixesha kusaphulwa umthetho, nokuba uvakala umncinci. Ukungaguquki kubonisa umntwana wakho ukuba uthetha lento uyithethayo kwaye umncede ayithathele ingqalelo imithetho.

SourceText: If you miss a chance to follow through, do not worry – just try again next time.
text: Ukuba uphose ithuba lokulandela, sukukhathazeka - zama kwakhona kwixesha elizayo.

SourceText: INVOLVE THEM
text: BABANDAKANYE

SourceText: Ask your child what a fair consequence might be if a rule is not followed. This helps them learn responsibility and makes it more likely they will stick to the rule.
text: Buza umntwana wakho ukuba sesiphi isiphumo esifanelekileyo ukuba umthetho awulandelwanga. Oku kunokubanceda bafunde uxanduva kwaye kwenza kubelula ukuba babambelele kumthetho.

SourceText: You can also involve your child in choosing simple and free rewards for their behaviours. This will encourage them to follow the rules more often!
text: Unokumbandakanya umntwana wakho ekukhetheni imivuzo elula kwaye esimahla ngokuziphatha kwakhe. Oku kuya kumkhuthaza ukuba alandele imithetho rhoqo!

SourceText: LEARN BY PLAYING
text: FUNDA NGOKUDLALA

SourceText:
Play helps children develop important physical and social skills. 

Set aside time to play games with your child, be creative, and have fun together. Remember, through play, you also learn what kind of support your child may need.
text:
Ukudlala kunceda ukuphuhlisa izakhono ezibalulekileyo ngokwasemzimbeni kwaye nezakhono zentlalo. 

Beka ecaleni ixesha lokudlala imidlalo nomntana wakho, yiba nobuchule, kwaye nonwabe kunye. Khumbula, ngokudlala, ungafunda ngoluphi uhlobo lwenxaso umntwana wakho aludingayo.

SourceText:
You can support your child to play and make friends with other children, so they learn how to interact with others well. 

If your child starts to feel overwhelmed with anything in their day, help them reduce their stress by taking a pause and playing together.
text:
Ungaxhasa umntwana wakho ngokudlala kwaye wenze abahlobo kunye nabanye abantwana, ukuze bafunde ukuba kunxulumanwa kanjani nabanye ngokunjalo. 

Ukuba umntwana wakho uqalisa ukuziva onganyelwe nayiphina into kusuku lwakhe, bancedise ukwehlisa uxinzelelo ngokuthi nqumama kwaye nidlale kunye.

SourceText: BE PATIENT
text: YIBA NOMONDE

SourceText:
Learning new things takes time. Be patient and encourage your child to keep trying, even when things feel hard. 

Stay calm when they get angry or frustrated – your child will learn to do the same over time.
text:
Ukufunda izinto ezintsha kuthatha ixesha. Yiba nomonde kwaye ukhuthaze umntwana wakho ukuqhubeka ezama, nokuba izinto zivakala zinzima. 

Hlala uzolile xa besiba nomsindo okanye bexinekile - Umntwana wakho uyakufunda ukwenza okufanayo ngokuhamba kwexesha.

SourceText:
You can support them by praising them for trying, and helping them break large tasks into smaller tasks that are appropriate for their age.

Use play to help your child learn difficult skills, like losing, sharing, or taking turns.
text:
Ungabaxhasa ngokubancoma ngokuzama, kwaye ukubanceda ukwahlula imisebenzi emikhulu ibe yimesebenzi emincinci efanelekileyo kwiminyaka yabo.

Sebenzisa ukudlala ukunceda umntwana wakho afunde izakhono ezinzima, njengokohluleka, ukwabelana, okanye ukutshintshana.

SourceText: SUPPORT CURIOSITY
text: XHASA UMDLA

SourceText: Children learn by asking questions and exploring the things they are interested in. Give your child time and space to do this, and be patient when they make mistakes. We all learn from our mistakes!
text: Abantwana bafunda ngokubuza imibuzo kwaye baphonononge izinto abanomdla kuzo. Nika umntwana wakho ixesha kunye nethuba ukwenza lento, kwaye ubenomonde xa besenza iimpazamo. Sonke sifunda kwiimpazamo zethu!

SourceText:
Your child may talk a lot and have many questions –  including difficult ones. You can give your child short but honest answers. 

If you need a break or more information, you can take a pause and tell your child you will respond to them later.
text:
Umntwana wakho angathetha kakhulu kwaye abenemibuzo emininzi - ukuquka neyona inzima. Unganika umntwana wakho impendulo emfutshane kodwa enyanisekileyo. 

Xa udinga ukhefu okanye incukacha ezithe vetshe, ungathi nqumama kwaye uxelele umntwana wakho ukuba uzakuphendula ethubeni.

SourceText: NOTICE
text: Qaphela

SourceText: Recognise the *positive* and *difficult* emotions that you and your child feel.
text: Qwalasela *okulungileyo* kunye *nobunzima* bemvakalelo ezinokuthi wena nomntwana wakho nizive.

SourceText: To recognise feelings, pay attention to your thoughts and to your and your child’s words and actions.
text: Ukuze uziqonde iimvakalelo zakho, nikela ingqalelo kwiingcinga zakho nakumazwi nezenzo zomntwana wakho.

SourceText: ACCEPT
text: YAMNKELA

SourceText: Be open to how you and your child feel. All feelings are okay.
text: Vuleka kwindlela wena nomntwana wakho eniziva ngayo. Zonke iimvakalelo zilungile.

SourceText:
There are six basic emotions. Each send us an important message:
😊 Happy: Keep doing things that make you feel good. 

☹️ Sad: Something important in your life needs attention.

😠 Angry: Stand up for yourself and set limits.

🤢 Disgusted: Move away from something you don't like.

😯 Surprised: Stop and pay attention for a moment.

😨 Afraid: Run away from danger.
 
As children get older, they learn to identify lots of other emotions, like feeling excited, frustrated, proud, lonely, peaceful, guilty, or confused.
text:
Kukho iimvakalelo ezintandathu ezisisiseko. Ngamnye usithumelela umyalezo obalulekileyo:
😊 Ndowabile: Qhubeka wenze into ekwenza uzive ulungile.

☹️ Ukukhathazeka: Into ebalulekileyo ebomini bakho ifuna ukuhoywa. 

😠 Umsindo: Yima ngokwakho kwaye ubeke imida.

🤢 Zonda: Bhekela kwinto ongayithandiyo.

😯 Ndimangalisiwe: Yima kwaye unikele ingqalelo okomzuzwana.

😨 Ukoyika: Balekela kude kwingozi.

Njengoko abantwana bekhula, bafunda ukuchonga ezinye iimvakalelo ezininzi, njengemvakalelo, imincili, ukuphoxeka, ukuzingca, ukubawedwa, uxolo, ityala, okanye ukubhideka.

SourceText: TALK
text: THETHA

SourceText:
Use words to describe your and your child’s emotions, so they can learn to do the same. 
 
This may be hard at first, but it is an important step to help manage emotions!
text:
Sebenzisa amagama ukuchaza iimvakalelo zakho nezomntwana wakho, ukuze nabo bafunde ukwenza okufanayo.

Oku kunokuba nzima ekuqaleni, kodwa linyathelo elibalulekileyo lokunceda ukulawula iimvakalelo!

SourceText:
Describe how you see your child’s emotion in a calm way. For example:
 
*“I notice you’re stomping your feet, talking loudly, and your face looks a bit upset. Are you feeling angry?”*
 
Share your own feelings with your child. For example: 
 
*“I know, I feel the same way when I can’t go out when I want to.”*
 
This shows your child that it's okay to share their feelings. They will learn to recognise emotions in themselves and others too.
text:
Chaza indlela ozibona ngayo iimvakalelo zomntwana wakho ngendlela ezolileyo. Umzekelo:

*"Ndiyaqaphela ukuba ubetha unyawo, uthethela phezulu, kwaye ubuso bakho bukhangeleka bukhathazekile. Ingaba uziva unomsindo?"*

Yabelana ngeemvakalelo zakho nomntwana wakho. Umzekelo:

*"Ndiyayazi, ndiziva ngendlela efanayo xa ndingakwazi ukuphuma ndibe ndifuna."*

Oku kubonisa umntwana wakho ukuba kulungile ukwabelana ngeemvakalelo zakhe. Uzakufunda ukuqaphela kuye nakwabanye ngokunjalo.

SourceText: BE SPECIFIC
text: YIBA NGQO

SourceText:
Say the behaviour you want your child to do.
But before you do that, connect to them, so they are more likely to listen.
text:
Xela isimilo osifuna kumntwana wakho ayenze.
Kodwa phambi kokuba uqale, qhagamshelana nabo, bavamile kakhulu ukuba bamamele.

SourceText:
Use your child’s name to get their attention. Go down to their level. Make eye contact.

Then say exactly what you want them to do. For example: “Please take your shoes off when you come inside, dear”.
text:
Sebenzisa igama lomntwana wakho ukufumana ingqalelo kuye. Yehlela ezantsi kwizinga lwakhe. Yenza uqhagamshelwano lwamehlo.

Emva koko chaza into ofuna ukuba ayenze. Umzekelo: "Nceda ukhulule izihlangu zakho xa ungena ngaphakathi, sithandwa".

SourceText: Give one instruction at a time, and make sure that the instruction is something that your child can do.
text: Nika umyalelo ubemnye ngexesha, kwaye qiniseka ukuba umyalelo yinto umntwana wakho anokwazi ukuyenza.

SourceText: Giving a transition warning helps when you are asking them to change activities! For example: “In 10 minutes, you will need to pack away your toys so we can start getting ready for bed.”
text: Ukunikeza ngesilumkiso esinenguqu kuyanceda xa ubacela ukuba atshintshe imidlalo! Umzekelo: "Kwimizuzu eyi 10, kuzofuneka uqoqoshe izinto zakho zokudlala sizokwazi ukulungela ukulala."

SourceText: BE POSITIVE
text: OKULUNGILEYO

SourceText:
Try using positive words when giving instructions. For example, instead of “Don’t shout inside”, say “Talk in a quiet voice when we’re inside.” 

ALWAYS praise your child immediately when they follow your instruction. This will make them more likely to repeat the behaviour and listen to you next time!
text:
Zama ukusebenzisa amagama akwisimo esihle xa unikisa ngemiyalelo. Umzekelo, endaweni yokuba "Sukungxola ngaphakathi", yithi "Thetha ngelizwi elithuleyo xa singaphakathi."

Maxa wonke ncoma umntwana wakho ngoko nangoko xa elandele umyalelo wakho. Lonto izakumenza avamise ukuphinda eso similo kwaye akumamele kwixesha elizayo!

SourceText: More
text: Kaninzi

SourceText:
Give instructions in a firm voice and stay calm. Behave as if you expect your child to do what you ask.

Also, be kind to yourself if you forget sometimes. Learning how to give positive instructions is not easy, but it works!
text:
Nika imiyalelo ngelizwi eloqinileyo kwaye uhlale uzolile. Ziphathe ngendlela okungathi ulindele umntwana wakho enze into oyicelayo.

Kwaye, yibanenceba kuwe xa uye walibala ngamanye amaxesha. Ukufunda ukunikeza imiyalelo elungileyo akukho lula, kodwa kuyasebenza!

SourceText: DO IT EVERY DAY
text: YENZA NGAZO ZONKE INTSUKU

SourceText:
Spend at least 5 minutes a day with your child.
More time is even better!
text:
Chitha kangangemizuzu 5 ngosuku kunye nomntana wakho.
Ixesha elithe chatha lingenza ngcono!

SourceText: STAY FOCUSED
text: HLALA UMISE INGQONDO

SourceText:
Turn off the TV, put down your phone, and remove distractions.
Show your child you’re really listening and paying attention!
text:
Cima umabona kude iTV, Beka phantsi ifowuni yakho, kwaye ususe izinto eziphazamisayo.
Bonisa umntana wakho ukuba umamele nyhani kwaye umnika ingqwalasela!

SourceText:
- Look at your child. Get down to their level. Use their name.
- Describe what they are doing and feeling. Praise them.
- Your child will learn a lot from what you say and do.
text:
-- Jonga umntana wakho. Yehla ubekumgangatho wabo. Sebenzisa amagama abo.
-- Chaza into abayenzayo kunye nemvakalelo. Bancome. 
-- Umntana wakho uyakufunda lukhulu kulonto uyitshoyo kunye noyenzayo.

SourceText: FOLLOW THEIR LEAD
text: LANDELA EMVA KWABO

SourceText: Let your child choose what to do or talk about. It helps them feel important. Ask to spend time together and try fun (or even silly!) activities.
text: Vumela umntana wakho akhethe into makayenze okanye athethe ngayo. Lonto ibanceda bazive bebalulekile. Cela ukuba nichithe ixesha ndawonye kwaye nizame ukuzonwabisa (okanye imidlalo egezeyo!).

SourceText: Look for good behaviours that you can praise! It can be anything positive or helpful your child does or tries to do.
text: Khangela izimilo ezihle ongakwazi ukuzincoma! Ingayiyo nayiphina elungileyo okanye eluncedo eyenziwa ngumntwana wakhe okanye azama ukuyenza.

SourceText:
Pause and really notice when they are doing something positive. Even if it’s expected of them.

Praise your child for *trying*. This boosts their self-esteem and confidence, which helps them to learn new behaviours.
text:
Yima kwaye uqaphele ngokwenene xa benza into elungileyo. Nokuba ilindelekile kubo.

Mncome umntwana wakho *ngokuzama*. Oku kukhulisa ukuzazi kunye nokuzithemba kwabo, okubanceda bafunde izimilo ezitsha.

SourceText: Praise them when you see them do something you like. Do this every day – even if it’s something really small.
text: Bancome xa ubabona besenza into oyithandayo. Yenza oku yonke mihla - nokuba yinto encinci ngokwenene.

SourceText:
Tell them specifically what they have done well.

Be enthusiastic and really mean it!

You can show your praise with a big smile and words.
text:
Baxelele ngokucacileyo oko bakwenzileyo kakuhle.

Yiba nomdla kwaye uzimisele ngokwenene!

Ungabonisa ukuncoma kwakho ngoncumo olukhulu kunye nangamazwi.

SourceText: REWARD IT
text: YIVUZE

SourceText: Give your child a simple, free reward to encourage them to do more of the behaviours that may be difficult for them.
text: Nika umntwana wakho umvuzo olula, wasimahla wokumkhuthaza ukuba enze ngakumbi iizimilo ezinganobu nzima kuye.

SourceText:
Give your child a hug, extra playtime together, or make their favourite meal. 

Simple rewards can be a big motivation for your child to keep trying and show more positive behaviour.
text:
Mange umntwana wakho, ixesha elongezelelweyo lokudlala kunye, okanye wenze isidlo asithandayo!

Imivuzo elula ingaba yinkuthazo enkulu kumntwana wakho ukuba aqhubeke ezama kwaye abonise isimilo esilungileyo.

SourceText: KNOW IT
text: YAZI

SourceText:
Put the problem into words.

Talk to your child about what the problem is.
text:
Yibeke ngamazwi ingxaki.

Thetha nomtwana wakho malunga nokuba yintoni ingxaki.

SourceText: _"I can hear you arguing because you don’t want to watch the same television programme. I know I said you both could watch TV after you’ve helped clean up after dinner, but we only have one television. How can we solve this problem?"_
text: _"Ndiyaniva ukuba niyaxambulisana kuba anifuni kubukela inkqubo enye kumabonakude. Ndiyayazi ukuba ndithe ningabukela umabonakude nobabini emva kokuba nincedise ukucoceni emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, kodwa sinomabonakude omnye nje. Singayisombulula njani le ngxaki?"_

SourceText: SOLVE IT
text: YISOMBULULE

SourceText:
Together, think of possible solutions to this problem.
What could you or your child do differently in this situation in the future?
text:
Kunye, cingani ngezisombululo ezinokubakho kule ngxaki.
Yintoni wena okanye umntwana wakho onokuyenza ngokwahlukileyo kule meko kwixesha elizayo?

SourceText: _"One option is for us not to turn the television on at all. You can also take turns choosing a programme or select one you both want to watch. What do you both think?"_
text: _''Olunye ukhetho kukuba angavuli umabonakude kwaphela. Ningatshintshana ukukhetha inkqubo okanye ukhethe enye enifuna ukuyibukela nobabini. Nicinga ntoni nobabini?"_

SourceText: TRY IT
text: YIZAME

SourceText:
Choose one solution together.

Try it next time you are in a similar situation, and praise your child for trying!
text:
Khetha isisombululo esinye kunye.

Yizame kwixesha elilandelayo ukwimeko efanayo, kwaye umncome umntwana wakho ngokuzama oko!

SourceText:
_"Okay boys, do you remember what we said last night about the TV? Who can remember the solution we came up with?"
"That's right – well done for remembering! Let's try to pick a programme that you both want to watch – I can even come watch with you!"_
text:
_"Kulungile bafana, niyakhumbula ukuba sithethe ntoni phezolo ngo MABONAKUDE? Ngubani osasikhumbulayo isisombululo esize naso?"
"Kulungile - wenze kakuhle ukukhumbula! Masizame ukukhetha inkqubo enifuna ukuyibukela nobabini - ndingeza nam ndizokubukela kunye nani!"_

SourceText: REFLECT
text: Cingisisa

SourceText: After you’ve tried it, decide with your child whether or not your solution worked.
text: Emva kokuba uyizamile, yenza isigqibo nomntwana wakho ukuba isisombululo sakho sisebenzile na okanye hayi.

SourceText: What you could say
text: Yintoni onokuthi uyithethe

SourceText: After the programme ends… _“Well that was an exciting game! I never knew I liked watching soccer so much, so thank you for introducing me to something new! I think we all had fun watching that together.”_
text: Emva kokuba inkqubo iphelile... _"Ewe Ibingumdlalo onika umdla! Zange ndiyazi ukuba ndiyakuthanda ukubukela ibhola ekhatywayo kakhulu, ngoko ke ndiyabulela ngondazisa ngento entsha! Ndicinga ukuba sonke sikonwabele ukubukela loo nto kunye."_

SourceText: BE A TEAM
text: YIBANI LIQELA

SourceText: When you involve your child in making rules they are more likely to follow them.
text: Ukuba ubandakanya umntana wakho ekwenzeni imithetho, banokuyilandela nangakumbi.

SourceText:
Plan rules WITH your child. Discuss the reasons for the rule and ask about their ideas.

Older children can share their own ideas of what they think the rule should be and you can agree together. They will feel appreciated and heard.
text:
Cwangcisa imithetho KUNYE nomtwana wakho. Xoxani izizathu zemithetho kwaye ubuze nangengceebiso zakhe.

Abantwana abadala bangabelana ngeengcebiso zabo ukuba bacinga umthetho ungathini kwaye ningavumelana kunye. Bazakuziva bexatyisiwe kwaye bemanyelwa.

SourceText: BE REALISTIC
text: NYANISEKA

SourceText:
Consider your child’s age and developmental level when creating rules and routines. They have to be able to do what is expected of them.

Remember: Only introduce one new rule or routine at a time – you can add another one later.
text:
Cingela iminyaka yomntwana wakho kunye nenqanaba lokukhula kwakhe xa usenza imithetho kunye nesiqhelo. Funeka bakwazi ukwenza into elindelekileyo kubo.

Khumbula: Yazisa umthetho omtsha ubemnye kuphela okanye isiqhelo ngexesha - ungongeza omnye emva koko.

SourceText:
Start with small and clear rules your child can follow. If a rule feels too hard, work together to break it into smaller steps.

Make rules realistic for what your child can do. Be specific – instead of “clean up,” say “put your blocks away.”
text:
Qala ngemithetho emincinci ecacileyo umntana wakho anokuyilandela. Xa umthetho uvakala unzima, sebenzani kunye niwucalule ubengamanyathelo amancinci.

Yenza imithetho yokwenyani enokwenziwa ngumntana wakho. Mngqale - endaweni ka "coca" ithi "zisuse izitena zakho."

SourceText: BE CONSISTENT
text: UKUNGAGUQUKUQUKI

SourceText:
Make sure your child follows the rules and routines daily.

That way, your child knows what to expect and this will help them to feel secure. They will learn to be more independent and responsible.
text:
Qinisekisa ukuba umntwana wakho ulandela umthetho kunye nesiqhelo yonke imihla.

Ngalo ndlela, umntwana wakho uzakuyazi ukuba yintoni amakayilindele kwaye lento izakumnceda azive ekhuselekile. Uzakufunda ukuzimela ngakumbi kwaye abenoxanduva.

SourceText: Activities become easier when children learn and get comfortable with the routine.
text: Imisebenzi iye ibelula ukuyilawula xana abantwana befunda kwaye beqhelene nenkqubo yemihla ngemihla.

SourceText: TAKE A PAUSE
text: YIMA/ NQUMAMA

SourceText: Taking a pause helps us to feel and respond calmer in stressful moments.
text: Ukuma kancinci kusinceda ukuba sizive kwaye siphendule sizolile ngamaxesha onxinzelelo.

SourceText:
Even taking a few deep breaths makes a big difference. 

By staying calm instead of reacting strongly, you can also prevent a lot of problems!
text:
Nokuba ungatsala umphefumlo kancinci ezantsi lonto yenza umahluko omkhulu.

Ngokuhlala uzolile endaweni yokusabela ngamandla, unokukhusela iingxaki ezininzi!

SourceText: PRAISE YOURSELF
text: ZINCOME WENA

SourceText: Take a moment and think of one thing YOU did well recently. Say it aloud if you can: _"Well done for …"_
text: Thatha umzuzwana kwaye ucinge ngento ibenye WENA ubukhe wayenza kakuhle kutshanje! Yitsho ngokuvakala ukuba unako: "Ndiqhube kakuhle ngokwenza...''

SourceText:
Being a parent can be hard. Praise yourself for trying your best. 

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of “I am a bad parent” say “I am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support”.
text:
Ukuba ngumzali kunganzima. Zincome ngokuzama kangangoko unako.

Chonga iingcinga ezingalunganga xa ziqala kwaye wenze isigqibo sokuba ziyinyani okanye ziluncedo. ukuba akunjalo, fumana iingcinga ezilungileyo ukuze ufake zona endaweni yazo.

Umzekelo, endaweni yokuthi "Ndingumzali ongalunganga " yithi ndiziva ndonwabile ngoku. kodwa ndenza konke okusemandleni am kwaye ndiza kuthetha nomhlobo ukuba andixhase.

SourceText: REWARD YOURSELF
text: ZIVUZE

SourceText: What makes you happy? Find small things that you can do every day to care for yourself.
text: Yintoni ekwenza wonwabe? Fumana izinto ezincinci onokuzenza yonke imihla ukuze uzikhathalele.

SourceText: Doing something you enjoy will give you a short break. It will help you to think more clearly and care better for your family. Caring for yourself = caring for your family!
text: Ukwenza into oyithandayo kuya kukunika ikhefu elifutshane. Kuya kukunceda ukuba ucinge ngokucacileyo kwaye ukhathalele ngakumbi usapho lwakho. Ukuzikhathalela = ukukhathalela usapho lwakho!

SourceText: SEE IT
text: YIBONE

SourceText: Look for anything your teen does that is helpful or good — whether that’s online or offline — and praise them for it. They may not show it, but you’ll see them do that good thing again. It also shows them that you notice and care.
text: Jonga nantonina umntwana wakho ofikisayo athi ayenze eluncedo okanye elungileyo - nokuba ikwi-intanethi okanye ngaphandle kw-intanethi- kwaye bancome ngalonto. Mhlawumbi bangangayibonakalisi lonto, kodwa uyakubabona besenza into elungileyo kwakhona. Lonto ikwababonisa ukuba uyaqaphela kwaye uyakhathala.

SourceText: SAY IT
text: YITHETHE

SourceText: Be enthusiastic – really mean it when you say it!
text: Yiba nentshiseko – nyaniseka xa uyitsho!

SourceText: REPEAT IT
text: YIPHINDE

SourceText: Try to find something to thank them for every day. Even something really small.
text: Zama ukufumanisa into oza kubabulela ngayo suku ngalunye. Nditsho nento encinci kakhulu.

SourceText: TEAM RULES
text: IMITHETHO YEQELA

SourceText: Household rules help to keep our teenagers safe and to understand what is expected from them. When you involve a teenager in making rules they are more likely to follow them.
text: Imithetho yekhaya inceda ukugcina abantwana bethu abafikisayo bekhuselekile kwaye baqonde ukuba yintoni elindelekileyo kubo. Xa umbandakanya umntwana wakho ofikisayo ekwenzeni imithetho banokuzimisela ngakumbi ekuyilandeleni.

SourceText: Include rules for healthy relationships and safe online habits — like sharing openly, showing respect, using phones responsibly, and talking to a trusted adult if something feels wrong.
text: Bandakanya imigaqo yobudlelwane obuphilileyo kwaye nemikhwa ekhuselekileyo kwi intanethi- Enje ngokwabelana nokuphandle, Ukubonisa intlonipho, ukusebenzisa ifowuni ngendlela eyiyo, kwaye ukuthetha nomntu othembakeleyo omdala ukuba kukho into evakala ingalunganga.

SourceText: REAL RULES
text: IMITHETHO YOKWENENE
