SourceText: Plan rules WITH your teenager. Start with one new rule first – you can add another one later. Discuss the reasons for the rule and listen to their views.
text: Cwangcisa KUNYE nomntwana wakho ofikisayo imithetho. Qala ngomthetho omnye omtsha - ungongezelela omnye mva. Xoxani ngezizathu zalemithetho kwaye umamele izimvo zabo.

SourceText: Talk with your teen about why rules are important both online and offline.
text: Thetha nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngokuba kutheni imigaqo ibalulekile kuzo zombini i-intanethi nangaphandle kwe intanethi.

SourceText: PRAISE RULES!
text: IMIGAQO YOKUNCOMA!

SourceText: Praise your teen for planning a rule with you, and praise them for keeping it! Positive feedback helps teens make good choices, including in relationships and online.
text: Ncoma umntwana wakho ofikisayo ngokucwangcisa imigaqo kunye nawe, Mcome ngokuyigcina! Ingxelo eyakhayo inceda abantwana abafikisayo ukuba benze ukhetho olulungileyo, kubandakanya ubudlelwane kunye ne intanethi.

SourceText: RELATIONSHIP RULES
text: IMIGAQO NGOBUDLELWANE

SourceText:
Teens learn about sex and relationships from many places, and some information may be incorrect or not right for their age.

Talk calmly about body changes, respect, and consent.

Listen without judging, and guide your teen to make safe choices in relationships and online.
text:
Abantwana abafikisayo bafunda ngesondo kwaye nobundlelwane kwiindawo ezininzi, kwaye ezinye inkcukacha ezilunganga okanye ezingalungenanga iminyaka yabo.

Thetha zolileyo malunga notshintsho lomzimba, hlonipha, kwaye funa isivumelwayo.

Mamela ngaphandle kokugweba, kwaye ukhokele umntwana wakho ofikisayo ekwenzeni ukhetho olukhuselekileyo kubundlelwane bakwi -intanethi.

SourceText: You do not need to have all the answers. You can ask other adults or health workers for help and information.
text: Akudingeki ukuba ubenazo zonke impendulo. Ungabuza abanye abantu abadala okanye abasebenzi bezempilo ngo ncedo okanye ulwazi.

SourceText: DAY
text: USUKU

SourceText:
Try to do it every day. 

Find 5 minutes (or more!) each day when your teen does not have something else they want to do.
text:
Zama ukuyenza iintsuku zonke. 

Fumana imizuzu emi 5 (okanye ngaphezulu) suku ngalunye xa umntwana wakho ofikisayo engenayo enye into yokwenza.

SourceText: Many short moments of connection each day or week help build trust and give you more chances to guide your teen than long, serious conversations.
text: Amaxesha amaninzi onxibelelwano ngosuku ngalunye evekini anceda ukwakha kwaye akunike amathuba amaninzi ukukhokela mntwana wakho ofikisayo kunencoko ezinde, nezinzulu.

SourceText: PLAY
text: DLALA

SourceText:
Let your teen choose.

Tell your teen that you would like to spend some time with them and that they can choose what to do or talk about. They might think this is weird at first, but they will come to enjoy this time with you!
text:
Vumela umntwana wakho ofikisayo akhethe.

Mxelele umntana wakho ofikisayo ukuba ungathanda ukuchitha ixesha kunye naye. Kwaye angakwazi ukukhetha into eninokuyenza okanye emanithethe ngayo. Angacinga ukuba ayiqhelekanga ekuqaleni, kodwa uzakubuya alonwabele eli xesha kunye nawe!

SourceText: One-on-one time can also help you understand your teen’s online world better. Get involved by asking “Did you come across anything exciting online today?” or “Can you show me how to do a group call on WhatsApp?
text: Ixesha lomnye nomnye linganceda nalo ukuqonda ngcondo ilizwe le i-intanethi lomntwana wakho ofikisayo. Zibandakanye ngokubuza "Ubukhe wadibana nayo nayiphi na into eyonwabisayo kwi-intanethi namhlanje?" okanye " Ungakwazi ukundibonisa ukuba yenziwa njani ifowuni yeqela kuWhatsapp?

SourceText: STAY
text: HLALA

SourceText:
Focus on your teen.

Switch off the TV and put phones aside. Look at your teen. Nod or say “I see” to show that you are really paying attention. Accept what they say without judging them.
text:
Qwalasela kumntwana wakho ofikisayo.

Cima i-UMABONAKUDE ubeke umnxeba ecaleni. Jonga emntwaneni wakho ofikisayo. Nqwala okanye uthi "ndiyabona" ukubonakalisa ukuba unike ingqwalasela. Kwamnkele akuthethayo ngaphandle kokumgxeka.

SourceText: LEARN
text: FUNDA

SourceText: One-on-one time also helps your teen learn. They learn best when they feel connected and supported. Spend time with them online and offline. Encourage them to try, and be patient with mistakes. Praise their efforts so they feel safe, confident, and motivated to keep learning.
text: Ixesha lomnye nomnye nalo liyamnceda umntwana ofikisayo afunde. Bafunda ngcono xa bes=ziva benxulumene okanye bexhaswa. Chitha ixesha kunye nabo kwi-intanethi kunye nangaphandle kwe-intanethi. Bakhuthaze ukuba bazame, kwaye yibanomonde kwimpazamo zabo. Yincome imizamo yabo ukuze bazive bekhuselekile, ukuzithemba, kwaye bekhuthazeka ukuba baqhubeke bafunde.

SourceText: ⚠️ Sensitive Content Notice
text: ⚠️ Isaziso somxholo onobuzaza

SourceText:
This module includes content that may be sensitive. You can check it out by yourself first. This will prepare you well for sharing the content with your teen and others afterwards.

If you need support, see the “Support Contacts” section in your Library for help.
text:
Esi sifundo siquka umxholo ongabanobuthathaka. Ungazikhangelela ngokunokwakho kuqala. Lonto ingakulungiselela kakuhle ukwabelana nomxholo nomntwana wakho ofikisayo kunye nabanye emva koko.

Ukuba udinga inkxaso, jonga kwicandelo la"Abanxulumanisi bonika inkxaso" kwithala leencwadi ukuze uncedakale.

SourceText: RELAX
text: PHOLA

SourceText: Do a 30 second quick relaxation activity.
text: Yenza umsebenzi oza kukupholisa okhawulezileyo wemizuzu engama-30.

SourceText:
Take a moment now to relax. Breathe in slowly as you count to three... and breathe out as you count to three. Feel your body relax with each breath. 

Try this whenever you are feeling stressed and need a break. A few calm breaths can make a big difference.
text:
Thatha imizuzwana ngoku uphole. Bizela umphefumlo ngokucotha ube ubala uyokutsho kwisithathu... phinda uphefumlele ngaphandle ube ubala uyokutsho kwisithathu. Yiva umzimba wakho upholile ngomphemfulo ngamnye.

Zama lento nanina uziva unoxinzelelo ube ufuna ukuphumla. Ukuphefumla ngokuzola kambalwa kungenza umehluko omkhulu.

SourceText: RECOGNISE
text: QAPHELA

SourceText:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

_"Well done to me for..."_
text:
Cinga ngento ibenye WENA ubukhe wayenza kakuhle kutshanje.

_"Kum ndiqhube kakuhle ngokwenza..."_

SourceText:
It could be showing love to your children, helping them with schoolwork, or preparing a meal even when you felt tired. 

Every small effort you make matters, and you get to celebrate yourself.
text:
Ingabonisa uthando kubantwana bakho, ukubancedisa ngemisebenzi yesikolo, okanye ubalungiselele ukutya naxa uziva udiniwe.

Yonke imzamo emincinci oyenzayo, kwaye ufumane ukuzibhoyozela.

SourceText: REWARD
text: UMVUZO

SourceText: Remember, you deserve your “me time” too! What makes you happy?
text: Khumbula, ufanelwe "lixesha lakho" nawe! Yintoni ekwenza wonwabe?

SourceText:
It could be something small, like enjoying a cup of tea, taking a short nap, chatting with a friend, or listening to your favourite music.

Spending time with your teen can be fun for you too! It might even make you feel less stressed.
text:
Ingayinto encinci, njengo konwabela ikomityi ye-ti, ukungqengqa kancinci, uncokole nomhlobo, okanye umamele umculo owuthandayo.

Ukuchitha ixesha kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo kungakonwabisa nawe! Ingakwenza uzive unoxinzelelo oluphantsi.

SourceText: SUPPORT
text: INKXASO

SourceText: Help other parents, including your partner, to take care of themselves, and ask them to do the same for you.
text: Nceda abanye abazali. ukuquka nomlingani wakho, ukuba bazikhathalele, kwaye ubacele benze okufanayo kuwe.

SourceText: Share chores, give each other time to rest, or remind each other to take breaks. When parents support each other, the whole community benefits — and teens learn self-care matters, too.
text: Yabelanani ngomsebenzi, ninikane ixesha lokphumla, okanye nikhumbuzane ukuba nithathe ikhefu. Xa abazali bexhasana, bonke abahlali bayazuza - kwaye abantwana abafikisayo bafunda ukuzikhathalela nabo.

SourceText: CONNECT
text: NXIBELELANA

SourceText: Make sure your teen knows they can talk to you about anything that happens online and offline, and if a crisis happens, you will handle it together.
text: Qinisekisa umntwana wakho ofikisayo ayazi ukuba angathetha nawe ngento yonke eyenzekayo kwi-intanethi nagaphandle kwi-intanethi, kwaye ukuba ingxaki iyenzeka, nizakuphathisana ngayo kunye.

SourceText: BREATHE
text: PHEFUMLA

SourceText: Stay calm. Ask yourself, "What does my teen need right now?"
text: Hlala uzolile, Zibuze, "umntwana wam ofikisayo udinga ntoni ngoku?"

SourceText: LISTEN
text: MAMELA

SourceText: Tell them you are there for them and love them.
text: Mxelele ukuba ukunye nabo yaye uyabathanda.

SourceText: THINK
text: CINGA

SourceText: Talk with your teen. What might help the situation? Reach out to the available support around you, in your community, and online.
text: Thetha noimntwana wakho ofikisayo. Yintoni enokunceda isimo? Fikelela kwiknxaso ekhoyo ekungqongileyo, ekuhlaleni kwakho, kunye nakwi-intanethi.

SourceText: You might need to make immediate plans now and then long-term plans later. Remember, you can find Support Contacts in the @global.app_name Library.
text: Kungadingeka ukuba wenze izicwangciso ngoko nangoko ngoku kwaye emva koko wenze izicwangciso zexesha elide kamva. Khumbula, ungafumana inxaso yonxibelelwano kwi@global.app_name yeThala lencwadi.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: ⚠️ Sensitive Content
text: ⚠️Umxholo obuthathaka

SourceText:
This module includes sensitive topics and offers tips to help keep your teen safe online.
If your teen has faced something difficult or you’re worried about their behaviour, you are not alone.
You can call Childline at 116 for free, private help and advice.
text:
Le modyuli ibandakanya izihloko ezinobuzaza kwaye inikezela ngengcebiso zokugcina abantwana bakho abafikisayo bekhuselekile kwi intanethi.
Ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo uhlangabezana nento enzima okanye unexhala ngendlela yabo yokuziphatha, awukho wedwa.
Unga fowunela i Childline ku 116 simahla, uncedo labucala nengcebiso.

SourceText: PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY
text: KHUSELA UBUMFIHLO BAKHO

SourceText: Keeping accounts private, turning off location sharing, and using strong passwords helps stop strangers from seeing your teen’s information.
text: Gcina i -akhawunti yakho bucala, Cima ukwabelana ngendawo okuyo, ukusebenzisa i phasiwedi eqinileyo kunceda ukunqanda abantu ongabaziyo ekuboneni inkcukacha zomntwana wakho ofikisayo.

SourceText: SET BOUNDARIES
text: BEKA IMIQATHANGO

SourceText: Help your teen stay safe by setting clear boundaries together. Remind them to only talk to people they know offline, and explore together how to block and report anyone who makes them feel uncomfortable. Agree on simple family rules, like device-free times at meals or bedtime.
text: Nceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo ahlale ekhuselekile ngoku beka imiqathango ecacileyo kunye. Bakhumbuze ukuba bathethe nabantu ababaziyo kuphela ngaphandle kwe intanethi, nikhangele indlela zokuba bhloka kunye kwaye nixele nabani owenza ukuba bazive bengakhululekanga. Vumelanani kwimigaqo elula yosapho, enje ngamaxesha amahala okungasebenzisi idevices ngamaxesha okutya nawokulala.

SourceText: NOTICE RED FLAGS
text: QAPHELA IZINTO EZIKROKRISAYO

SourceText: Help your teen recognise unsafe signs, like someone asking for photos, offering money, or suggesting to keep secrets. These are warning signs of danger. Remind your teen they can always ask for help if something feels wrong. They can ask you, a teacher, another trusted adult, or Childline (call 116).
text: Nceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo aziqaphele iimpawu zokungakhuseleki, njengomntu ocela iifoto, okunika imali, okanye okucebisa ukungcina iimfihlo. Ezi zizilumkiso zobungozi. Khumbuza umntwana wakho ofikisayo angasoloko elucela uncedo ukuba kukho into evakala ingalunganga. Bangacela wena, utitshala, okanye umnye umntu omdala, okanye Childline (fowuni116).

SourceText: THINK BEFORE YOU SHARE
text: CINGA PHAMBI KOKUBA WABELANE

SourceText: Remind your teen that once something is online, it can spread quickly. Encourage them not to post or share private photos or personal details.
text: Kumbuza umntwana wakho ofikisayo into ithe yaba ikwi-intanethi inganwenwa ngokukhawuleza. Mkhuthaze ukuba angaxhomi okanye abelane ngemifanekiso yakhe yabucala okanye inkcukatha zakhe.

SourceText: TALK AND LISTEN
text: THETHA KWAYE UMAMELE

SourceText:
Show interest in what your teen enjoys online. Ask what they see online and what they think about it - this builds critical thinking and helps them feel heard. 

**Listen without judging**, and talk about **safe boundaries**, like only talking to people they know offline. **Stay calm** if something goes wrong and remind them they can always come to you. Teens are more likely to share when they feel safe and trusted.
text:
Bonisa umndla kwinto ethandwa ngumntwana wakho ofikisayo kwi-intanethi. Buza yintoni abayibonayo kwi-intanethi-Lento yakha ukucinga nzulu kwaye ibancede bazive bemameleka.

**Mamela ngaphandle kokohlulela**kwaye thetha**ngemiqathango yokhuseleko** njengokuthetha nabantu ababaziyo ngaphandle kwe-intanethi.**Hlala uzolile**Ukuba kukho into ehamba kakubi kwaye bakhumbuze ukuba bangasoloko besiza kuwe. Abantwana abafikisayo banamathuba amaninzi okwabelana xa beziva bekhuselekile kwaye bethembakele.

SourceText: Teens often tell friends first. Ask your teen what they would do if a friend was in danger online. Remind them it’s okay to involve a trusted adult.
text: Abantwana abafikisayo basoloko bexelela abahlobo kuqala. Buza umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba angenza ntoni xa umhlobo wakhe esengozini kwi-intanethi. Bakhumbuze ukuba kulungile ukubandakanya umntu omdala omthembileyo.

SourceText: SHARE SAFELY
text: YABELANA KHUSELEKILEYO

SourceText:
Remind your teen to **think before posting**. 💭
Once something is online, it can spread fast and be hard to delete.

Teach them to **ask before sharing** anyone’s photo or info — and show this by doing it yourself.
Private or sexual pictures should never be shared.

Encourage your teen to remind friends to stay safe too — **friends can help friends make good choices**.
text:
Khumbuza umntwanawakho ofikisayo ukuba **cinga phambi kokuba uthumele**.💭
Ukuba into ikwi-intanethi ingasasazeka ngokukhawuleza kwaye kube nzima ukuyicima.

Bafundise **ukucela phambi kokwabelana** noba yifoto kabani okanye inkcukacha - kwaye yibonise lento ngokuyenza ngokwakho.
Imifanekiso yabucala neyesini ayifanelekanga kwabelwane ngayo naninina.

Khuthaza umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba akhumbuze abahlobo bakhe bahlale bekhuselekile nabo - **Abahlobo banganceda abahlobo bathathe izigqibo ezilungileyo**.

SourceText: NOTICE AND RESPOND
text: QAPHELA KWAYE PHENDULE

SourceText:
Watch for warning signs that something may be wrong. 🚨

Your teen might be quiet, hide their phone, or spend much more time online. Someone may ask them to share photos, keep secrets, or offer them presents like money or airtime.

If something unsafe happens, **don’t blame or punish** your teen. Instead, **block and report** together, remind them it’s not their fault, and get help from Childline (116), teachers, or another trusted adult.

If your teen has hurt others online, stay calm. Help them see the harm and learn to do better — **without shame or anger**.
text:
Jonga impawu zezilumkiso ukuba kukhona into engahambi kakuhle.🚨

Umntwana wakho ofikisayo angazola, afihle ifowuni okanye achithe ixesha elinzi kwi-intanethi. Omnye umntu angacela ifotos iimfihlo, imali, okanye i- ethayimu.

Ukuba into engakhuselekanga iyenzeka **musa ukusola okanye wohlwaye** umntwana wakho ofikisayo. Endaweni yoko bhloka kwaye uxele**ninonke bakhumbuze ukuba ayilo tyala labo, kwaye fumana uncedo kwi Childline(116), kwititshala, okanye komnye umntu omdala othembakeleyo.

Ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukhathaze abanye kwi-intanethi. hlisa umoya. Bancedise babone ubungozi bafunde ukwenza ngcono-**ngaphandle kosizi nomsindo**.

SourceText: Solving problems together works better than punishing. Support is available, and you are not alone.
text: Ukusombulula ingxaki kunye kusebenza ngcono kunokohlwaya. Inxaso ikhona, kwaye awukho wedwa.

SourceText: PROTECT TOGETHER
text: KHUSELA KUNYE

SourceText: Keep your teen’s online spaces safe. Sit together and set accounts to private, turn off location sharing, and use strong passwords. Remind them not to share their phone number, home address, school name or photos in school uniform. Explore together how to block and report anyone who makes them feel uncomfortable.
text: Ngcina indawo ye-intanethi yabantwana bakho abafikisayo khuselekileyo. Hlalani kunye kwaye nenze iakhawunti zibebucala. cima ukwabelana ngendawo okuyo, kwaye usebenzise ipasswords eqinileyo. Bakhuze ukuba bangabelani ngenombolo zefowuni yabo, nedilesi yekhaya lakhe, negama lesikolo, okanye ifoto ngezisikolo. Khangelani kunye indlela yokubhloka okanye uxele nabanina owenza bazive bengakhululekanga.

SourceText: Blocking and reporting strangers helps protect teens from unsafe people online, including those who trick them by pretending to be friendly.

SourceText:
Let’s do a quick practice to help you prepare for your home activity! 
Turn each of these instructions into positive ones:
text:
Masenze uqheliselo olukhawulezileyo ukukunceda ukulungiselela umsebenzi wakho wasekhaya!
Guqula umyalelo ngamnye kule ibeyelungileyo:

SourceText: 👕 Stop leaving your dirty clothes all over the place!
text: 👕Yeka ukushiya impahla yakho emdaka kwindawo yonke!

SourceText: You could say: "I know you’ve had a long day. Could you please put your clothes in the basket so it’s easier to keep things tidy? Thanks – it really helps."
text: Usenokuthi: "Ndiyayazi ubenosuku olude. Ungakwazi undinceda ufake iimpahla yakho kwibakethi ukwenzela kubelula ukugcina izinto zicocekile? Enkosi - iyanceda ngokwenene lonto."

SourceText: 🎵 Stop playing your music so loud in the house!
text: 🎵Yeka ukudlala umculo wakho phezulu endlini!

SourceText: You could say: "That’s great music. Who is the singer? Please turn the music off when you come into the house. You can play it in your room quietly if you want. Thank you!"
text: Usenokuthi: "Ngumculo omnandi lowo. Ngubani imvumi? Ndicela uwucime umculo xa ungena endlini. Ungawudlalela phantsi egumbini lakho ukuba uyafuna. Enkosi!

SourceText: 📱 Stop playing on your phone at the dinner table!
text: 📱Yeka ukudlala ngefowuni yakho kwitafile yesidlo sangokuhlwa!

SourceText: You could say: "I like that you enjoy your phone. Can you put it away during dinner so we can spend time together? Thanks – I really appreciate it."
text: Usenokuthi: Ndiyayithanda into yokuba uyonwabele ifowuni yakho. Ungakwazi ukuyibeka kude ngexesha lesidlo sangokuhlwa ukwenzela sichithe ixesha kunye? Enkosi - Ndiyayibulela ngokwenene lonto.".

SourceText: 📸 Stop taking so many selfies!
text: 📸 Yeka ukuthatha imifanekiso yakho emininzi!

SourceText: You could say: “You take great photos! Just remember not to share private ones. Want me to show you how to keep your account safe?”

SourceText: Great idea! Calm consequences work best when they are fair, happen soon after the behaviour, and are used the same way each time. This helps your teen understand what to expect and gives them a clear chance to learn from their actions.

It might seem like a good lesson, but it can make your teen feel cut off from friends and support.
Instead, use fair and related consequences — like reducing screen time or earning it back through positive actions.
text:
Ingabonakala isisifundo esilungileyo, kodwa ingenza umntwana wakho ofikisayo azive esusiwe kubahlobo kunye nenkxaso. 
Endaweni yoko sebenzisa iziphumo ezifanelekileyo nezinxullumeneyo — njengokunciphiphisa ixesha le fowuni okanye ukulifumana kamva ngezenzo ezilungileyo.

SourceText: Can you agree on one NEGATIVE consequence and one POSITIVE consequence with your teen?
text: Ningakwazi ukuvumelana kwisiphumo esinye ESINGALUNGA nakwe esinye ESILUNGILEYO kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo?

SourceText: That's fantastic! When teens help choose their own consequences - both positive and negative - they are more likely to understand and stick to them. You are helping them grow into a responsible young adult.
text: Kuyamangalisa! Xa abantwana abafikisayo bezikhethela ngokwabo iziphumo - ezilungileyo nezingalunganga - bangakwazi ukuqonda kwaye bahlale bezibambile. Uyabanceda bakhule belulutsha oluthatha uxanduva.

SourceText: That’s a great start! Take your time - you can come up with ideas together step by step.
text: Sisiqalo esihle eso! Thatha ixesha lakho - ningakwazi neengcebiso kunye inyathelo ngenyathelo.

SourceText: That's okay. These conversations can be tricky at first. Keep spending time together and try again when the moment feels right. You are already on the right path.
text: Kulungile. Ezincoko zinganobuzaza ekuqaleni. Qhubekani nichitha ixesha kunye kwaye zamani kwakhona xa ithuba livuma. Sele nikwindlela entle.

- 📓Papers (or old newspaper or a cardboard box) and pens

SourceText: Would any of these consequences be helpful for you and your child?
text: Ingaba enye yezi ziphumo zingaluncedo kakhulu kuwe kunye nomntwana wakho?

SourceText: If you are late for dinner, your food will be cold
text: Ukuba ufike emvakwexesha kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, ukutya kwakho kuzakubanda

SourceText: If you continue splashing water out of the bath, bath time will be over
text: Ukuba uyaqhubeka uchitha amanzi ngaphandle ebhafini, ixesha lokuhlamba lizakuphela

SourceText: If you break your toy, you will have no toy to play with
text: Ukuba uyophulile into yakho yokudlala, awuzokuba nayo into yokudlala

SourceText: If you can’t play close to home where I can see you, then you have to come inside
text: Ukuba awukwazi ukudlala kufutshane nekhaya apho ndinokubona khona, kumele ungene ngaphakathi

SourceText: Great. Discuss this (or another) consequence with your child and family, and try it out together.
text: Kulungile. Xoxani lento (okanye enye) iziphumo nomntwana wakho kunye nosapho, kwaye nizame kunye.

SourceText: If you do not put away your toys, then you cannot play with them tomorrow morning
text: Ukuba awuzibeki kude izinto zakho zokudlala, awuzokwazi ukudlala ngazo ngomso kusasa

SourceText: Great. Discuss this (or another) consequence with your child and family, and try it out tomorrow.
text: Kulungile. Xoxani lesi (okanye esinye) isiphumo nomntwana wakho kunye nosapho, kwaye nizame kunye.

SourceText: None of these will work in my home
text: Akukho nenye kwezi eyakusebenza ekhayeni lam

SourceText: That's okay! Try to think of just one consequence that you feel confident you can follow-through with in a calm way. Try starting with something small.
text: Kulungile! Zama ukucinga ngesiphumo sibesinye oziva uzithembile ukuba ungasilandela ngokuzolileyo. Zama ukuqala ngento encinci.

SourceText: The next time your child does not follow a rule, can you use a fair consequence in a calm way?
text: Kwixesha elizayo xa umntwana wakho engawulandeli umthetho, ingaba ungakwazi ukusebenzisa iziphumo ezifanelekileyo ngendlela ezolileyo?

SourceText: That's great! Remember to take a pause before you give the consequence so that you're able to remain calm, and praise yourself afterwards for a job well done!
text: Kulungile! Khumbula ukuma kancinci phambi kokuba unike isiphumo ukuze ukwazi ukuhlala uzolile, kwaye zincome emva koko ngomsebenzi wakho owenze kakuhle!

SourceText: That's okay. Keep trying. It will get easier in time. You can start by considering smaller behaviours that your child struggles with and planning a fair consequence in advance so you're ready.
text: Kulungile. Qhubeka uzame. Kuyakubalula ekuhambeni kwexesha. Ungaqala ngokuqwalasela isimilo esincinci umntwana wakho asokola ngaso kwaye ucwangcise iziphumo ezifanelekileyo kwangaphambili ukuze ube ulungile.

SourceText: What did @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learn when his mother played with him?
text: Ufunde ntoni u@data.characters.f3_son_4.name xa umama wakhe ebedlala naye?
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name should not be translated.

SourceText: How to lead and give instructions
text: Ukhokela njani kwaye unike imiyalelo

SourceText:
Yes! Actually, he learned all of these things! 

By leading the game, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learned how to give clear instructions and be in charge. This is a very important skill for the future!
text:
Ewe! Kunjalo, uzifundile zonke ezi zinto! 

Ngokukhokela umdlalo u@data.characters.f3_son_4.name ufundile ukuba ukunika imiyalelo ecacileyo kunye nokuphatha. Esi sisakhono esibalulekileyo kakhulu kwixesha elizayo!
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name should not be translated.

SourceText: How to be innovative
text: Ukubanobuchule bokwazi

SourceText:
Yes! Actually, he learned all of these things! 

By using his imagination, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name finds a new way to use a bed sheet. In his mind, it could be a castle or a rocketship. Being creative helps children build important skills for the future.
text:
Ewe! Enyanisweni wazifunda zonke ezizinto! 

Ngokusebenzisa ukuboniswa kwakhe, u@data.characters.f3_son_4.name wafumanisa indlela entsha yokusebenzisa ishiti lebhedi. Engqondweni yakhe, ingayinqaba okanye inqwelomoya. Ubuchule bokuyila kunceda abantwana ukwakha izakhono ezibalulekileyo kwixesha elizayo.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name should not be translated.

SourceText: How to problem solves
text: Usombulula njani ingxaki

SourceText:
Yes! Actually, he learned all of these things! 

By imagining a new kind of tent and solving a problem, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name is building important skills for school and life.
text:
Ewe! Eneneni, wafunda kuzo zonke ezizinto! 

Ngokuboniswa ngohlobo olutsha lentente kwaye nokusombulula ingxaki, u@data.characters.f3_son_4.name wakha izakhono ezibalulekileyo esikolweni nasebomini.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Science skills
text: Izakhono ze Nzululwazi

SourceText:
Yes! Actually, he learned all of these things! 

By testing and trying different things to build a fort, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name is learning about shapes and how science works in real life.
text:
Ewe! Eneneni, ufundile kuzozonke ezi zinto! 

Ngokuvavanya nokuzama izinto ezahlukeneyo ukwakha inqaba, u@data.characters.f3_son_4.name uyafunda malunga neemilo kwaye nokuba zisebenza njani kwezenzululwazi kubomi bamanyani.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_son_4.name should not be translated.

SourceText:
What does @data.characters.f3_uncle.name do to support @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name? 
Try all the options to learn more!
text:
Wenza ntoni u@data.characters.f3_uncle.name ukuxhasa u@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name? 
Zama lonke olukhetho ukufunda ngakumbi!

SourceText: He gives an instruction to prevent the mistake
text: Unika umyalelo wokuthintela impazamo

SourceText:
Yes, he warns her in order to avoid the mistake. 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe, uyamlukisa ukuze aphephe impazamo. 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!

SourceText: He remains calm
text: Uhlala ezolile

SourceText:
Yes, when your child makes a mistake it is important to stay calm. 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe, xa umntwana wakho esenza impazamo kubalulekile ukuba uhlale uzolile. 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!

SourceText: He shows he cares about @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name
text: Ubonisile ukuba uyakhathala malunga no @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Yes, when the accident happens, he first asks if @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name is okay! 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe,xa bekusenzeka ingozi,uqale wabuza uku ba @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name uyaphila! 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: He thanks @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name for recognising her mistake
text: Ubulele @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ngokuqonda impazamo yakhe
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Yes, praise helps our children to take more responsibility for their actions next time. 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe, ukuncoma kunceda abantwana bethu bathathe uxanduva ngezenzo zabo kwixesha elizayo. 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!

SourceText: He asks @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name to reflect on her behaviour
text: Ucele u @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ukuba azihlolisise nesimilo sakhe
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Yes, he helps her learn by asking her how she could have prevented the mistake. 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe, Umncedisile ukuba afunde ngokumbuza ukuba wayenokuyiphepha kanjani impazamo. 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!

SourceText: He involves @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name to resolve the situation together
text: Ubandakanye u @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ukusombulula imeko kunye
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Yes, by asking her to help clean up, he shows how she can make things right again after making a mistake. 
All of these options are true!
text:
Ewe, ngokumcela ancedise ekucoceni, umbonisile ukuba angazilungisa njani izinto emva kokuba enze impazamo. 
Lonke olukhetho luyinyani!

SourceText: What does @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learn from @data.characters.f3_uncle.name’s response?
text: Yintoni ayifundayo u @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name kwimpendulo ka @data.characters.f3_uncle.name’s?

SourceText: It is okay to make mistakes
text: Kulungile ukwenza iimpazamo

SourceText: I am still loved even if I make mistakes
text: Ndisathandwa nangona ndisenza iimpazamo

SourceText: I can learn from my mistakes
text: Ndingafunda kwimpazamo zam

SourceText: Apologising is important
text: Ukuxolisa kubalulekile

SourceText: I can help to make things right again
text: Ndinganceda ukwenza izinto zilunge kwakhona

SourceText: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
text: Ngokwenene! U @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ufunde izinto ezibalulekileyo kuba u @data.characters.f3_uncle.name uphendula ngendlela ezolileyo kwaye exhasayo.

SourceText: What could you do to encourage your child to play and learn?
text: Ungenza ntoni ukukhuthaza umntwana wakho adlale kwaye afunde?

SourceText: Join their play
text: Zibandakanye emidlalweni yabo

SourceText: That’s right! Join in on any play activity your child is doing. You will strengthen your bond and encourage your child to play and learn more.
text: Kulungile! Zibandakanye nakowuphi umdlalo umntwana wakho awenzayo. Uzakomeleza ubudlelwane benu kwaye ukhuthaze umntwana wakho adlale kwaye afunde ngakumbi.

SourceText: Go outside together
text: Hambani niye phandle kunye

SourceText: Great idea. Try to look for opportunities to play and learn, like collecting leaves or rocks on the way home from school.
text: Umbono omhle. Zama ukujonga amathuba okudlala kwaye afunde, njengokuqokelela amagqabi okanye amatye endleleni esuka esikolweni.

SourceText: Use household items
text: Sebenzisa izinto ezise ndlini

SourceText: Yes! Get creative. Anything in your home could be a musical instrument, costume, or item in a role-play.
text: Ewe! Yiba nobuchule. Nantoni na esendlini yakho ingasisixhobo somculo, isinxibo somdlalo, okanye izinto ezisetyenziswayo kumdlalo wokulinganisa.

SourceText: Ask their ideas
text: Cela imbono zabo

SourceText: Exactly. If you are not sure how you could play together, your child will have many ideas for what you could do.
text: Ngokunjalo. Ukuba awuqinisekanga ukuba ningadlala kanjani nonke, umntwana wakho anganembono ezininzi zokuba ningenza ntoni.

SourceText: Wonderful! No matter what you choose, spending time playing with your child is what truly matters. You will help them develop key skills and broaden their imagination. Well done!
text: Kwakuhle! Nokuba yintonina oyikhethileyo, ukuchitha ixesha nidlala nomntwana wakho yeyonanto ibaluleke nyhani. Uyakubanceda ukuphuhisa izakhono ezibalulekileyo, kwaye wandise imifanekiso ngqondweni yabo. Wenze kakuhle!

SourceText: Could you make time to play and learn with your child this week?
text: Ungalenza ixesha lokudlala kwaye ufunde kunye nomntwana wakho kuleveki?

SourceText: That’s great! Even a few minutes of play each day can help your child learn and feel close to you.
text: Kwakuhle! Nokuba yimizuzwana embalwa yokudlala ngosuku ngalinye kunganceda umntwana wakho afunde kwaye azive esondele kuwe.

SourceText: That’s okay. Even a few minutes a day can make a big difference. Try finding a small moment that works for you.
text: Kulungile. Nokuba yimizuzwana nje embalwa ngosuku kungawenza umehluko omkhulu. Zama ukufumana ixeshana elincinci elikusebenzelayo.

SourceText: That’s okay. Try starting with one small moment, like sitting and watching your child play or asking what they’re building. Every little bit helps!
text: Kulungile. Zama ukuqala ngexeshana nje elincinci, njengokuhlala kwaye ubukele umntwana wakho edlala okanye ubuze yintoni le bayakhayo. Nentwana nje encinci iyanceda!

SourceText: Why does @data.characters.f3_mother.name name @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name’s feelings when she’s feeling angry and then proud?
text: Kutheni u@data.characters.f3_mother.name ebize imvakalelo zika @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name xana eziva enomsindo aphinde azingce?

SourceText: To make @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name feel better instantly
text: Ukwenza @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name azive ngcono ngoko nangoko
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Not quite. Naming emotions might not make someone feel better right away. The goal is to help her recognize her feelings so she can handle them better next time.
text: Hayi ncam. Ukuchaza imvakalelo akunakwenza umntu azive ngcono ngoko nangoko. Injongo kukunceda yena aqwalasele imvakalelo zakhe kwenzele akwazi ukuzilawula ngcono kwilixa elizayo.

SourceText: To help @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learn to recognise her own emotions
text: Ukunceda u-@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name afunde ukuziqwalasela imvakalelo zakhe
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: That’s right. By naming @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name’s emotions, @data.characters.f3_mother.name models an important skill.
text: Kulungile. Ukubiza imvakalelo zika @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, u@data.characters.f3_mother.name ubonakalisa isakhono esibalulekileyo.

SourceText: To teach @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name how to solve problems on her own
text: Ifundisa u@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ukuba uyisombulula njani ingxaki ngokwakhe
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Not really. While solving problems is important, the main goal here is to help @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name recognise her emotions. Once she knows what she’s feeling, she’ll be better at solving problems next time.
text: Akunjalo. Ngelixa usombulula ingxaki kubalulekile, eyona njongo apha kukunceda @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name aqaphele imvakalelo zakhe. Ukwazi kwakhe ukuba uziva njani, uzakubangcono ekusombululeni ingxaki kwixesha elizayo.
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: To distract @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name from what’s bothering her
text: Ukumphazamisa u-@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name kwinto emhluphayo
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Not quite. The goal isn’t to take her mind off her feelings. By naming her emotions, @data.characters.f3_mother.name is helping @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name understand what she’s feeling, so she can deal with it better next time.
text: Hayi ncam. Injongo akuko kuthatha ingqondo yakhe kwi mvakalelo zakhe. Ngokuchaza imvakalelo zakhe u @data.characters.f3_mother.name unceda u @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ukuba aqonde imvakalelo zakhe, ukwenzela azokwazi ukumelana nazo kwixesha elizayo.

SourceText: What could have happened if @data.characters.f3_mother.name had criticised or ignored @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name’s frustration?
text: Kungenzeke ntoni ukuba u-@data.characters.f3_mother.name ucalucale okanye akahoya ukudandatheka kuka @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name?

SourceText: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name would have given up
text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ebesonokuyekelela
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Correct. Noticing and naming emotions is very important to help our children learn how to deal with their feelings.
text: Kulungile. Ukuqaphela kwaye uchaze imvakalelo zakho yinto ebalulekileyo ukunceda abantwana bethu bafunde ukumelana ne mvakalelo zabo.

SourceText: The same problem would happen again next time
text: Kwalengxaki inye ingaqhubeka kwakhona kwixesha elizayo

SourceText: That’s right. Noticing and naming emotions is very important to support our children and help them learn how to deal with their emotions.
text: Ilungile. Ukuqaphela kwaye uchaze imvakalelo zakho yinto ebalulekileyo ukunceda abantwana bethu bafunde ukumelana ne mvakalelo zabo.

SourceText: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name would not have learned how to catch a ball
text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name ngeyengakhange akwazi ukufunda ukubamba ibhola
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Exactly. Noticing and naming emotions is very important to support our children and help them learn new skills.
text: Ngqo. Ukuqaphela kwaye uchaze imvakalelo zakho yinto ebalulekileyo ukunceda abantwana bethu bafunde izakhono ezitsha.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_mother.name and her son are running late. Her son is struggling to tie his shoes but refuses help. How can @data.characters.f1_mother.name respond?
text: U@data.characters.f1_mother.name kunye nonyana wakhe bazokuba semva kwexesha. Unyana wakhe uyasokola ukubopha imitya yezihlangu zakhe kodwa akafuni ncedo. Angaphendula njani u@data.characters.f1_mother.name?

SourceText: Tie his shoes for him and get out the door. We are late!
text: Abophe izihlangu zakhe kwaye baphume. Silibazisekile!

SourceText: It is never fun to run late, but @data.characters.f1_mother.name will miss the opportunity to help her son learn to deal with his frustration if she doesn't help him first recognise what he’s feeling.
text: Akukho mnandi ukuhamba emva kwexesha, kodwa u@data.characters.f1_mother.name uzakuphoswa lithuba lokunceda unyana wakhe afunde ukumelana nonxunguphalo ukuba akamncedi aqale aqonde indlela aziva ngayo.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_mother.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Understand that her son is feeling frustrated and help him name his feelings
text: Aqonde ukuba unyana wakhe uziva enxunguphele kwaye amncede achaze iimvakalelo zakhe

SourceText: That’s a great idea. She can also commit to practising shoe tying with him later, when he’s calmer, and praise him for naming his feelings and for making a good effort!
text: Licebo elilungileyo elo. Unokuzibophelela ekuziqhelisaneni nokubopha izihlangu zakhe kunye naye ngelinye ixesha, xa umoya wakhe uzolile, kwaye amncome ngokuchaza iimvakalelo zakhe nokwenza umzamo omhle!

SourceText: Can you notice and talk about your and your child’s feelings today?
text: Ingaba unokuqaphela kwaye uthethe ngeemvakalelo zomntwana wakho namhlanje?

SourceText: That’s great! It might be awkward to talk about feelings at first, but it will get better for everyone with practice.
text: Kulungile! Ekuqaleni kunganzima ukuthetha ngeemvakalelo, kodwa kungangcono kumntu wonke aziqhelanise.

SourceText: Give it a try! It might be awkward to talk about feelings at first, but it will get better for everyone with practice.
text: Yizame! Ekuqaleni kunganzima ukuthetha ngeemvakalelo, kodwa kusenokubangcono kumntu wonke aziqhelanise.

SourceText: That's okay. Learning to share emotions with our children can be challenging. You can start by recognising and naming one emotion you or your child felt today.
text: Kulungile. Ukufunda ukwabelana ngeemvakalelo kunye nabantwana bethu ingangumceli mngeni. Ungaqala ngokuqonda kwaye uchaze imvakalelo ibenye yakho kunye neyomntwana wakho eniyivileyo namhlanje.

SourceText: What steps does @data.characters.f1_father.name take to help @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name follow her instruction?
text: Ngawaphi amanyathelo u@data.characters.f1_father.name awathathileyo ukunceda u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name alandele imiyalelo yakhe?

SourceText: He warns @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name that misbehaviour is not acceptable
text: Ulumkisa u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name ukuba ukuziphatha kakubi akwamkelekanga
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Try again! @data.characters.f1_father.name actually gives a positive instruction by telling @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name what she should do rather than shouldn’t do. This will help @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name to follow the instruction.
text: Zama kwakhona! u@data.characters.f1_father.name eneneni unika imiyalelo eyakhayo ngokuxelela u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name into amakayenze kuna kangayenzi. Oku kuyakunceda u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name ukuba alandele umyalelo.

SourceText: He gives @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name a transition warning and follows through with what he said
text: Unike u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name isilumkiso esinenguqu kwaye alandele oko akuthethileyo
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Correct! These steps make it more likely that @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name follows @data.characters.f1_father.name’s instruction. He also praises his daughter.
text: Unyanisile! La manyathelo angenza ukuba u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name alandele kakuhle kakhulu imiyalelo ka@data.characters.f1_father.name. Kwaye uyayincoma intombi yakhe.

SourceText: He makes @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name feel guilty for taking too long
text: Wenza u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name azive enetyla ngokuthatha ixesha elide
note: The string @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Try again! Making her feel guilty will make @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name less motivated to follow instructions both now and in the future. It will also feel stressful for @data.characters.f1_father.name.
text: Zama kwakhona! ukumenza azive enetyala u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name kungamenza angabinamdla kancinci ukulandela imiyalelo ngoku kunye nakwixesha elizayo. Uyakuziva kwakhona enoxinzelelo ngenxa ka@data.characters.f1_father.name.

SourceText: He tells her to stop playing and start cleaning
text: Umxelele ukuba makayeke ukudlala kwaye aqale ukucoca

SourceText: Try again! He gives @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name a positive instruction to “clean up” without giving a negative one of “stop playing.”
text: Zama kwakhona! unike u@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name umyalelo olungileyo ukuba ''coca'' ngaphandle kokumnika ongalunganga ''yeka ukudlala''.

SourceText: What would have happened if @data.characters.f1_father.name had said: “@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, stop playing with your blocks, and don’t go to bed with dirty teeth!”

SourceText: Many people think that, but it's not true. All children can enjoy any game – what matters is that they have fun and feel included.

SourceText: People often say that, but games are for everyone. When children can choose what they enjoy, they become more confident, creative, and learn to respect others too.
text: Abantu badla ngokutsho njalo, kodwa imidlalo yeyabantu bonke. Xa abantwana bezikhethela abakonwabelayo baziva bazithembile ngakumbi, benobuchule, kwaye bafunde ukuhlonipha nabanye.

Uziva ingathi AWUNAXESHA kwaye udiniwe? Khumbula ngendlela ezingenakuthatha ixesha lakho elongezelelweyo, njengokwenza umsebenzi wasekaya kunye ngelixa nincokola.

SourceText: Can you spend one-on-one time with your teen this week?
text: Ungakwazi ukuchitha ixesha lomnye nomnye kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo kule veki?

SourceText: That's great! Parents who spend focused one-on-one time with their teens can build trust and love!
text: Kuhle! Abazali abachitha ingqwalasela kwixesha lomnye nomnye kunye nabantwana babo abafikisayo bangakwazi ukwakha ukuthembana kunye no thando!

SourceText: You can do it! Try spending just a few minutes each day with your teen. Remember that you can always think of ways that do not take up extra time, like walking to the shop or preparing dinner together.
text: Ungayenza! Zama ukuchitha imizuzu embalwa kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo usuku ngalunye. Khumbula ukuba ungakwazi ukucinga ngeendlela ezingenakuthatha xesha elongezelelweyo, njengokuhamba ngenyawo ukuya evenkileni okanye ukulungiselela isidlo sangokuhlwa kunye.

SourceText: That's okay. Spending focused time with your teen will become easier as you build a routine. At first, you can try to think of ways that do not take up extra time, like doing a chore together.
text: Kulungile. Ukuchitha ixesha nomntwana wakho ofikisayo kuzakubalula njengokuba nisakha inkqubo. Ekuqaleni, ungazama ukucinga ngeendlela ezingazokuthatha ixesha elongezelelweyo, njengokwenza imisebenzi yasekhaya kunye.

SourceText:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

"Well done to me for..."
text:
Cinga ngento ibenye WENA ubukhe wayenza kakuhle kutshanje.

"Ndiqhube kakuhle ngokwenza..."

SourceText: Showing love to my children
text: Bonisa uthando ebantwaneni bam

SourceText: Getting up even though I felt tired
text: Ukuvuka nangona ndiziva ndidiniwe

SourceText: Smiling at someone
text: Ukuncumela umntu

SourceText: Making food to stay strong
text: Ukwenza ukutya ukuze uhlale womelele

SourceText: Spending time with my children
text: Ukuchitha ixesha nabantwana bam

SourceText: Helping my children with schoolwork
text: Ukuncedisa abantwana bam kumsebenzi wesikolo

SourceText:
Say it aloud if you can.

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using @global.app_name!
text:
Yitsho ngokuvakalayo ukuba unako.

Nantsi into enye ofanelwe kukunconywa ngayo: Uqhube kakuhle ngokusebenzisa i-@global.app_name!

SourceText: What small thing makes you happy?
text: Yintoni encinci ekwenza wonwabe?

SourceText: Sleeping
text: Ukulala

SourceText: Talking with a friend
text: Ukuthetha nomhlobo

SourceText: Reading something I enjoy
text: Ukufunda into endiyonwabelayo

SourceText: Going for a walk
text: Ukuthatha uhambo

SourceText: Having a nice cup of coffee, tea or hot chocolate
text: Ufumane ikomityi ye kofu, iti okanye itshokolethi eshushu

SourceText: Nice! Taking care of yourself is an important parenting skill!
text: Kuhle! Ukuzikhathalela sisakhono esibalulekileyo sobuzali!

SourceText: How can partners help each other relax?
text: Bangancedana njani abalingane ukuba baphumle?

SourceText: Remind them of easy ways to take care of themselves
text: Bakhumbuze ngendlela ezilula zokuzikhathalela

SourceText: Help them find time to relax by offering to assist with chores or childcare
text: Bancede bafumane ixesha lokuphumla ngobanika uncedo ngemisebenzi yasekhaya okanye ukhathalela umntwana

SourceText: Find moments of play and laughter together
text: Fumana amathuba okudlala nokuhleka kunye

SourceText: Exactly! By helping each other, we make sure that both fathers and mothers are better able to care for their family. When teens see you do self-care, they learn it’s important too.
text: Ngokuqinisekile! Ngokuncedana, siyaqinisekisa ukuba bonke ootata noomama bangcono ukuba bakhathalele iintsapho zabo. Xa abantwana abafikisayo bekubona uzikhathalele, bayafunda ukuba kubalulekile nako.

SourceText: Sometimes, taking a break to care for yourself requires asking for help. Who else can you ask for help?
text: Ngamanye amaxesha, uthatha ikhefu ukuze uzikhathalele kufuna ucele uncedo. Ngubani omnye onokumcela uncedo?

SourceText: Sibling or parent
text: Ngumntana wakhowenu okanye umzali

SourceText: Friend
text: Umhlobo

SourceText: That’s great! You can do self-care on your own, but it also helps to have people around you who encourage you to do small, kind things for yourself.
text: Kulungile! Ungazikhathalela ngokwakho, kodwa kuyanceda ukubanabantu abakungqongileyo abakukhuthazayo ukuba uzenzele izinto ezincinci, ezilungileyo.

SourceText: Neighbour
text: Ummelwane

SourceText: That’s great!  You can do self-care on your own, but it also helps to have people around you who encourage you to do small, kind things for yourself.
text: Kulungile! Ungazikhathalela ngokwakho, kodwa kuyanceda ukubanabantu abakungqongileyo abakukhuthazayo ukuba uzenzele izinto ezincinci, ezilungileyo.

SourceText: Can you find moments this week to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself?
text: Ungafumana imizuzwana kule veki uphole, qaphela imizamo yakho, kwaye uzinike imvuzo?

SourceText: That's great! Every small step you take to care for yourself makes a big difference for your family.
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Qho usenza inyathelo elincinci ngokukhathalela isiqu sakho wenza umehluko omkhulu kusapho lwakho.

SourceText: That’s a good start! Look for small ways to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself - even little moments of self-care can make a big difference.
text: Sisiqalo esilungileyo! Khangela indlela ezincinci zokuphola, qaphela imizamo yakho, kwaye uzivuze- nemizuzwana nje embalwa yokuzikhathalela ingenza umehluko omkhulu.

SourceText: That's okay. Try choosing one small, simple action like taking a deep breath or sitting quietly for a moment. Every little bit counts!
text: Kulungile, Zama ukukhetha ibenye encinci, ukwenza nje into elula uphefumle nzulu okanye uhlale ngokuzola umzuzwana. Yonke into encinci iyabala!

SourceText: What skills did @data.characters.f2_grandmother.name use?
text: Zeziphi izakhono azisebenzisileyo u@data.characters.f2_grandmother.name?
note: The string @data.characters.f2_grandmother.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Take a deep breath and pause before responding
text: Tsala umoya kakhulu uze unqumame ngaphambi kokuphendula

SourceText: Listen calmly to your teen
text: Phulaphula ngokuzolileyo kumntwana wakho ofikisayo

SourceText: Praise your teen for sharing
text: Mncome umntwana wakho ngokwabelala nawe

SourceText: Use problem solving skills
text: Sebenzisa ubuchule bokusombulula iingxaki

SourceText: Work out where you can get help
text: Khangela apho unokufumana khona uncedo

SourceText:
That's right! 

All these skills can help in a crisis.
text:
Kulungile! 

Zonke ezizakhono zinganceda kwintlekele.

SourceText: Can you chat with your teen about how you could respond to a crisis together?
text: Ungathetha nomntwana ofikisayo ngendlela eninokuthi nimelane ngayo nentlekele kunye?

SourceText: That's wonderful! Talking about this now will help your teen feel supported and safe. You are doing great.
text: Kwakuhle, Ukuthetha ngalento ngoku kunceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo azive exhasekile kwaye ekhuselekile. Wenza kakuhle.

SourceText: Give it a try! It can feel hard, but even just thinking about it and starting the conversation together is already a big step.
text: Yizame! Ingavakala inzima, kodwa ukucinga nje ngayo kwaye nokuqala incoko kunye sele kulinyathelo elikhulu kakhulu.

SourceText: That's completely okay - talking about potential crises can feel overwhelming. Keep spending time with your teen, and come back to this when it feels right.
text: Kulungile ngokupheleleyo - ukuthetha ngentlekele enokwenzeka kungavakala kusongamela. Qhubeka ucithe ixesha kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo, kwaye ubuyele kuyo xa kuvakala kulungile.

SourceText: Would you let your teen experience a big new city by themselves? Would you let your teen experience the big online world by themselves?
text: Ungamvumela umntwana wakho ofikisayo azifumane ekwisixeko esikhulu yedwa? Ungamvumela umntwana wakho ofikisayo azifumane ekwilizwe elikhulu lwe-intanethi eyedwa?

SourceText: It’s great that you trust your teen. There are also many risks, so we need to make sure we guide both our boys and girls to stay safe.
text: Kulungile ukumthemba umntwana wakho ofikisayo. Kwaye ikhona neminye imingcipheko emininzi, ngoko siyadinga ukuqinisekisa ukuba bonke abantwana bethu abangamakhwenkwe kunye nabangamanombazana ukuba bahlale bekhuselekile.

SourceText: Protecting our children shows care. Teen girls and boys also need space to learn and grow. By guiding them, we can balance safety and independence.
text: Ukukhusela abantwana bethu kubonakalisa inkathalo. Vabantwana abafikisayo abangamantombi nabangamakhwenkwe nabo badinga ithuba labo lokufunda kunye nokukhula. Ngokubakhokela, singalungalelanisa ukhuseleko kunye nokuzimela.

SourceText: Parenting online is not easy. By carefully giving freedom while offering guidance, you can help your son or daughter learn while staying safe.
text: Ukuba ngumzali kwi-intanethi akululanga. Ngokunika inkululeko ngenyameko ngelixa unikela ngesikhokelo, unganceda unyanawokho okanye intombi yakho ifunde ngexeshesha ihlala ikhuselekile.

SourceText: How can being online help our teens?
text: Ukuba kwi-intanethi kunokubanceda njani abantwana bethu abafikisayo?

SourceText: Help with learning
text: Nceda ngokufunda

SourceText: Social interaction
text: Intsebenziswano yoluntu

SourceText: Relaxing
text: Ukuphumla

SourceText: Just like adults, teens use phones to connect, relax, and learn. Showing interest builds trust and helps us spot risks early.
text: Njengabantu abadala, abantwana abafikisayo basebenzisa iifowuni zabo ukunxulumana, ukuphola, kunye nokufunda. Ukubonisa umdla kwakha ukuthemba kwaye kunceda sibone umngcipheko kwangethuba.

SourceText: What could be signs that something is wrong?
text: Ingaba ziyintoni iimpawu zokuba kukho undonakele?

SourceText: Being withdrawn or sad
text: Ukurhonxa okanye ukukhathazeka

SourceText: Mood swings or acting out
text: Ukutshintsha kwemvakalelo okanye ukwenza umdlalo

SourceText: Hiding phone
text: Ukufihla ifowuni

SourceText: Spending much more time online
text: Ukhucitha ixesha elininzi kwi-intanethi

SourceText: Sharing harmful images
text: Ukwabelana ngemifanekiso eyingozi

SourceText: All of the above
text: Zonke ezi zingentla

SourceText: Yes, all of these can be signs that something is wrong. We may think it is just “teen behaviour”, but it could mean your teen feels unsafe. Spending regular time together makes it easier for you to notice changes and for your teen to open up.
text: Ewe, zonke ezi zinto zingabazimpawu zokuba ikhona into engalunganga. Singacinga ukuba yindlela yokuziphatha yomntwana osafikisayo, kodwa ingathetha ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo uziva engakhuselekanga. Ukuchitha ixesha eliqhelekileyo kunye kwenza kubelula ukuqaphela utshintsho kwaye kwaye umntwana wakho athethe ngokuphandle.

SourceText: How should the mother respond?
text: Angaphendula njani umama?

SourceText: Thank @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name for sharing
text: Mbulele u@data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name ngokwabelana
note: The string @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Show empathy for @data.characters.friend_female_5.name
text: Bonisa uvelwano kwi@data.characters.friend_female_5.name
note: The string @data.characters.friend_female_5.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Talk about consent and peer pressure
text: Thetha ngesivumelwano kunye noxinzelelo lwabahlobo

SourceText: Support reporting and deleting
text: Xhasa ukuchaza kunye nokucima

SourceText:
Yes, these are all good responses. By thanking teens and responding supportively, they are more likely to share their own problems. 
Remind them to only share photos with permission, think about consequences, and that bullying and sharing private content is harmful. Support them to take safe steps, like reporting and deleting.
text:
Ewe, ezi zimpendulo ezilungileyo zonke. Ngokubulela abantwana abafikisayo kwaye nangokuphendula ngenxaso, banamathuba amaninzi okwabelana nengxaki zabo.
Bakhumbuze ukuba babelane ngeefotos xa kunemvume kuphela, cinga ngemiphumela, kwaye nango kuhlukunyezwa kwaye ukwabelana nomxholo wabucala kuyingozi. Baxhase bathathe amanyathelo akhuselekileyo, njengokuxela kunye nokucima.

SourceText: This form of bullying and pressure can happen to both boys and girls. Boys could respond with anger, while girls may withdraw. Remember, no one should ever be pressured into sharing private photos. If your teen sees or hears about this, remind them to tell a trusted adult right away and not share any of the messages.
text: Olu hlobo lokuxhatshazwa noxinzelelo lunokwenzeka kumakhwenkwe nakumantombazana. Amakhwenkwe angaphendula ngomsinda, ngelixa amantombazana angarhoxa. Khumbula ukuba akukho namnye naninina ekufuneka enyanzelwe ukuba abelane ngeefoto zabucala. Ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo ubona okanye uva ngalento, bakhumbuze ukuba baxelele umntu omdala abamthembileyo ngoko nangoko kwaye bangabelani ngayo nawuphi na umyalezo.

SourceText: How should @data.characters.f1_son_18.name’s father respond?
text: Ufanele u@data.characters.f1_son_18.name utata aphendule njani?
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name’s should not be translated.

SourceText: Take phone away
text: Thatha ifowuni

SourceText: This may feel like protecting @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, but it can push him to hide problems and stop him from telling you next time. Taking the phone does not solve the danger.
text: Oku kungavakala ngokungathi kukhusela u @data.characters.f1_son_18.name kodwa kungenza azifihle ingxaki kwaye kumenze ayeke ukukuxelela kwixesha elizayo. Ukuxutha ifowuni akusombululi ingozi.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Blame @data.characters.f1_son_18.name
text: Ukusola u @data.characters.f1_son_18.name
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Blaming breaks trust. Teens make mistakes, and feeling ashamed can make the situation worse. What matters most is helping @data.characters.f1_son_18.name feel safe and supported.
text: Ukusolana kuqhawula ukuthembana. abantwana abafikisayo bayawenza amaphutha, kwaye ukuziva ulusizi kungasenza isimo sibe ngakumbi. Eyona ingamandla kukunceda u@data.characters.f1_son_18.name azive ekhuselekile kwaye exhaswa.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Support and solve together
text: Xhasa kwaye nisombulule kunye

SourceText: Yes! Stay calm and listen. Tell @data.characters.f1_son_18.name it’s not his fault. Block and report if you can, and plan together what to do if photos are shared. If there’s anyone you both trust, ask them for help.
text: Ewe! Hlala uzolile kwaye umamele. Xelela u@data.characters.f1_son_18.name ayilotyala lakhe. Mvale kwaye uxele ukuba unako, kwaye nicwangcise kunye ukuba nenze nton ngemifanekiso ekwabelwane ngazo. Ukuba ukhona umntu enimthembileyo nobabini, mceleni ukuba anincede.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_18.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Can this happen to boys and girls?
text: Ingaba ingenzeka lento kubantwana abangamakhwenkwe kunye namantombazana?

SourceText:
Both boys and girls can face this kind of online threat, but boys may ask for help less often because they feel ashamed.
Remind your teen that no one deserves to be threatened. Tell them to stop sending pictures, save any messages as proof, and speak to a trusted adult right away.
text:
Bonke amakhwenkwe kunye namantombazana angajongana nolu hlobo lwesoyikiso kwi-intanethi, kodwa amakhwenkwe anokucela uncedo kancinci kuba baziva benentloni.
Khumbuza umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba akukho mntu ufanelwe kukoyikiswa. Baxelele bayeke ukuthumela imifanekiso, ngcina nokuba ngowuphi na umiyalezo njengobungqina, kwaye uthethe nomntu omdala omthembileyo ngoko nangoko.

SourceText: How should @data.characters.friend_male_4.name’s mother respond?
text: Ufanele u@data.characters.friend_male_4.name umama aphendule njani?
note: The string @data.characters.friend_male_4.name’s should not be translated.

SourceText: Deny/defend
text: Phika/khusela

SourceText: Denying the problem may feel easier, but it makes the situation worse. It is better to face the issue calmly, so you can understand what happened and give both children the support they need.
text: Ukuphika ingxaki kungavakala kulula, kodwa kwenza isimo sibesibi ngakumbi. Kungcono ukujongana nengxaki uzolile, ukuze uqonde ukuba kwenzeke ntoni kwaye ubanike bobabini abantwana inkxaso abayidingayo.

SourceText: Brush it off
text: Yisuse

SourceText: Saying “boys will be boys” makes harmful behaviour seem normal. This stops children from understanding the real consequences of their actions.
text: Ukuthi "amakhwenkwe ayakuba ngamakhwenkwe" kwenza ukuziphatha okuyingozi kubonakale njengokuqhelekileyo. Lento inqanda abantwana ekundeni izimo zokwenyani ngezenzo zabo.

SourceText: Scold child angrily
text: Ukungxolisa umntana ngmsindo

SourceText: Getting very angry can shame your teen and close the door to learning. He may only feel fear, without understanding why it was wrong.
text: Ukubanomsindo kakhulu kungahlaza umntwana wakho ofikisayo kwaye kuvale ingcango zokufunda. Angaziva esoyika, ngaphandle kokuqonda ukuba kutheni kungalunganga.

SourceText: Pause, listen, and understand
text: Yima, mamela, kwaye uqonde

SourceText: Correct. By staying calm and listening, you help your teen feel safe to talk. This gives you a chance to explain why sharing sexual pictures or videos is harmful and guide him to make better choices in the future.
text: Ichanekile. Ngokuhlala uzolile kwaye umamele, unceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo azive ekhuselekile ukuba athethe. Lento ikunika ithuba lokucacisa ukuba kutheni ukwabelana ngemifanekiso yamanyala kuyingozi, kwaye mkhokele ukuba enze ukhetho olungcono kwixesha elizayo.

SourceText: Are sexual pictures or videos only shared by boys?
text: Ingaba imifanekiso yezesondo okanye ividiyo zabelwana kuphela ngamakhwenkwe?

SourceText: Not sure
text: Andiqinisekanga

SourceText:
Boys are often more involved in this, but girls can be too.
Teach your teen to respect others and ask before sharing photos or videos. Explain that sharing or watching sexual content can hurt people.
Remind them it’s illegal to share any nude or sexual images of anyone under 18 — even their own.
text:
Amakhwenkwe abandakanyeka kakhulu kulento, kodwa namantombazana angabandakanyeka.
Fundisa umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba ahloniphe abanye kwaye acele phambi kokwabelana ngeefotos okanye iividiyos. Cacisa ukuba ukwabelana okanye ukubukela umxholo wesondo kunokulimaza abantu.
Bakhumbuze ukuba akukho mthethweni ukwabelana ngayo nayiphi na imifanekiso enqunu okanye yesondo yakhe nabanina ongaphantsi kweminyaka eyi 18 nokuba yeyakhe.

SourceText: What would you do if you were grandfather?
text: Ubunokwenza ntoni xa ubungutatomkhulu?

SourceText: Nothing
text: Ayikho

SourceText: Ignoring the problem may seem easiest, but it can put teens in danger. Strangers can use personal details from a profile as well as gifts to trick or pressure children.
text: Ukungayihoyi ingxaki kungabonakala njengento elula, kodwa ingabeka abantwana abafikisayo engozini. Abantu abangaziwayo bangasebenzisa inkcukacha zomntu kwiprofayili kunye nezipho ukuqhatha okanye uxinzelelo lwabantwana.

SourceText: Ask questions to understand
text: Buza imibuzo ukuqonda

SourceText: Yes! Ask @data.characters.f2_son_15.name what happened, what information he shared, and how he felt. Then guide him on safe choices like keeping profiles private and not replying to strangers.
text: Ewe! Buza u@data.characters.f2_son_15.name ukuba kwenzeke ntoni, zeziphi ezinkcukacha abelane ngazo, kwaye ebeziva njani. Ngoku mkhokele kukhetho olukhuselekileyo njengoikugcina iprofayili bucla kwaye angaphenduli abantu abangaziwayo.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_15.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Get angry
text: Abe nomsindo

SourceText: Getting angry may scare @data.characters.f2_son_15.name and shut down openness. He may hide future problems instead of asking for help. Stay calm so he knows he can trust you.
text: Ukubanomsindo kungoyikisa u@data.characters.f2_son_15.name kwaye avale ukuthethela phandle. Angazifihla iingxaki sexesha elizayo andaweni yokucela uncedo. Hlala uzolile ukuze ayazi ukuba angakuthemba.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_15.name should not be translated.

SourceText: Force to show chats
text: Anyanzele ukubona iincoko

SourceText: Forcing may feel like protecting @data.characters.f2_son_15.name, but it can break trust and lead him to hide things in the future. A better way is to sit together, talk through the risks, and agree on safe solutions as a team.
text: Ukunyanzela kungavakala ngathi ukhusela u@data.characters.f2_son_15.name, kodwa kungophula ukuthemba kwaye kumkhokelele ekufihleni izinto kwixesha elizayo. Indlela engcono kukuhlala kunye, nithethe ngemingcipheko, kwaye nivumelane ngezisombululo ezikhuselekileyo niliqela.
note: The string @data.characters.f2_son_15.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Talk about risks
text: Thethani ngemingcipheko

SourceText: That’s right! Use this as a chance to explain why accepting gifts or sharing personal details (like school or uniform) online is unsafe. Explore together how to block and report strangers, and remind your teen they can always come to you if something feels wrong.
text: Ilungile lonto. Sebenzisa lento njengethuba lokuchaza ukuba kutheni ukwamkela izipho okanye ukwabelana ngenkcukacha zakhe (ezifana nesikolo okanye iyunifomu) kwi-intanethi kuyingozi. Phononongani kunye indlela yokunqanda kwaye nichaze abantu abangaziwayo, kwaye khumbuza umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba angeza kuwe ngalo lonke ixesha ukuba kukho into evakala ingalunganga.

SourceText: Can you create and try out your Online Family Agreement this week?
text: Ingaba ungenza okanye uzame isivumelwano sosapho esikwi-intanethi kuleveki?

SourceText: Yes
text: Ewe

SourceText: Making the agreement together shows your teen that online safety is about teamwork. You can always change or update your agreement later as well.
text: Ukwenza isivumelwano kunye kubonisa umtwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba ukukhuseleko lwe-intanethi lungetsebenziswano. Unakho ukutshintsa ngalolonke ixesha or uhlaziye nesivumelwano kamva.

SourceText: I think so
text: Ndicinga njalo

SourceText: Give it a try. Involving your teen in choosing the rules helps them feel respected and makes it more likely they will follow them. You can start with just one rule and add more later.
text: Yizame. Ukubandakanya umntwana wakho ofikisayo ekukhetheni imigaqo kuyabanceda bazive behloniphekile kwaye ibenze lonto bayilandele ngakumbi. Ungaqala nje ngomgaqo omnye kwaye wongeze eminye mva.

SourceText: No

SourceText: That’s okay. You can start small. Even agreeing on just one rule together is a good first step. You can always add more ideas later on.

SourceText:
🎉 CONGRATULATIONS! 

You have done it! You have built lots of important parenting skills.

This is a huge achievement. It shows such care for your family.

Let’s celebrate you and plan your future @global.app_name support.
text:
🎉 SIYAVUYISANA!

Uyiqgibile! Uye wakha izakhono ezibalulekileyo ezininzi zobuzali.

Le yimpumelelo enkulu. Ibonisa inkathalo ku sapho lwakho.

Masivuyisane nawe kwaye sicwangcise ikamva lakho @global.app_name sikuxhase.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Let's celebrate our journey together and all your achievements!
text: Masivuyisane ngohambo lwethu kunye nempumelelo yakho yonke!

SourceText:
Greetings everyone.

Today’s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together.

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learnt throughout this time together.

Now, let's think of the next steps. What could be the next steps after this? Maybe we are planning to continue all the learnings that we have learnt here. We don't know, we are hoping that for the next steps, the skills, the learnings will continue. We wish you a pleasant, happy, family time. 

Thank you.
text:
Molweni, nonke.

Umxholo wanamhlanje ngumbhiyozo namanyathelo alandelayo.

Bekumnandi, kukuhle ukuba nawe koluhambo. Namhlanje sibhiyozela uhambo lwethu kunye.

Namhlanje sibhiyozela zonke iimfundiso esizifundileyo kulo lonke elixesha sikunye.

Ngoku, masicinge ngamanyathelo alandelayo. Ingangawaphi amanyathelo alandelayo emva koku? Mhalwumbi silungiselela ukuqhubeka nazo zonke iimfundiso esiye sazifunda apha. Asiyazi, siyathemba ukuba kwinyathelo elilandelayo, izakhono, nezifundo zizakulandela. Sikunqwenelela okumnandi, ulonwabo, kwixesha losapho.

Enkosi.

SourceText: You and your family have learnt so much. Let's think back and see what has changed since learning all these parenting skills
text: Wena kunye nosapho lwakho nifunde lukhulu. Masibuyele emva sibone ukuba lukhona na utshintsho emva kokufunda zonke ezizakhono zobuzali

SourceText: You've done an amazing job. Tap play to reflect on how far you've come
text: Wenze umsebenzi omhle. Cofa u dlala ukujonga apho usuka khona

SourceText:
Close your eyes and relax.

Think of your family life before you started your journey with this app.

Think back on skills you learned:

Self-care
One-on-one time
Praise
Positive instructions
Managing stress
Family budgeting
Rules
Calm consequences
Problem solving
Teen safety
Dealing with crisis
Reflect on the journey – how was it for you to:

Share ideas and experiences
Reflect on and learn from the stories
Practice skills with your teen
Did anything change for you and your family?

What do you need to continue to use skills?

Cinga ngobomi bosapho lwakho ngaphambi kokuba uqalise uhambo lwakho kule App.

SourceText:
Today’s lesson is about helping children follow rules and instructions by using consequences.

Consequences are the good or negative things that happen after a child’s actions. When children don’t follow a rule, giving consequences can help them learn and take responsibility for their actions.
text:
Isifundo sanamhlanje singokunceda abantwana balandele imithetho kunye nemiyalelo ngokusebenzisa iziphumo.

Iziphumo zizinto ezilungileyo okanye ezimbi ezenzekayo emva kwezenzo zomntwana. Xa abantwana bengawulandeli umthetho ukunika iziphumo kunokubanceda bafunde kwaye bathathe uxanduva ngesenzo sabo.

SourceText: How can calm consequences help you and your family?
text: Zingakunceda njani wena nosapho lwakho iziphumo ezizolileyo?

SourceText:
Greetings everyone.

Even if you do everything right, your child will misbehave sometimes. We may be tempted to scream and shout, but that just leaves everyone more angry. 

If we stay calm, and give them a calm consequence, they will learn to take responsibility for their actions instead.
text:
Molweni nonke.

Nokuba ungenza yonke into kakuhle, umntwana wakho angaziphatha kakubi ngamanye amaxesha. Singazibona sele sifuna ukukhwaza kwaye singxole, kodwa oko kushiya wonke umntu enomsindo ngakumbi.

Ukuba sihlala sizolile, kwaye sibanike iziphumo ezizolileyo, bazokufunda ukuthatha inxaxheba ngeziphumo zabo.

SourceText:
Some consequences happen naturally – like when a toy breaks, it can’t be used.

Others are set by you to help your child follow rules (_“if you don’t pack away your toys, you can’t play with them tomorrow”_). 

Let’s see how @data.characters.f1_father.name uses consequences to help his son, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, follow instructions:
text:
Ezinye iziphumo ziyazenzekela - ifana nokuba kophuke into yokudlala, ayinakusetyenziswa.

Ezinye zibekiwe nguwe ukunceda umntwana wakho alandele imithetho(_" ukuba awuzibeki kude izinto zakho zokudlala, awuzokwazi ukudlala ngazo ngomso"_)

Masijonge ukuba u@data.characters.f1_father.name uzisebenzisa njani iziphumo ukunceda unyana wakhe, u@data.characters.f1_son_5.name alandele imiyalelo:

SourceText: You are playing so nice and quiet, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to clean up your toys.
text: Udlala kamnandi kwaye uthe cwaka, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. Kwimizuzu eyi 5, izakubalixesha lokucoca izinto zakho zokudlala.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. should not be translated.

SourceText: *5 minutes later*
text: *emva kwemizuzu eyi 5*

SourceText: It’s time to put away your toys.
text: Lixesha lokubeka kude izinto zakho zokudlala.

SourceText: No. Not yet!
text: Hayi. Hayi okwangoku!

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, either you put away the toys now, or you won’t be able to play with your toys after dinner.
text: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, ingaba ubeka kude izinto zakho zokudlala ngoku, okanye awuzokwazi ukudlala ngazo emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don’t want to! I’m not finished with my game.
text: Hayi, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! Andifuni! Andikagqibi ngomdlalo wam.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! should not be translated.

SourceText:
Because you did not clean up your toys when I asked you to, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, you cannot play with your toys after dinner. 
Now please come and wash your hands.
text:
Kuba ungakhange uzicoce izinto zakho zokudlala ngexesha ndikuxelela ngalo, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, awuzokudlala ngezinto zakho zokudlala emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa.
Ngoku ndicela uze kwaye uhlambe izandla zakho.
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, should not be translated.

SourceText: You are washing your hands so nicely, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name – well done!
text: Uzihlambe kakuhle izandla zakho, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name - wenze kakuhle!
note: The string @data.characters.f1_son_5.name should not be translated.

SourceText: @data.characters.f1_father.name used a consequence to help @data.characters.f1_son_5.name learn that actions have impacts.
text: U@data.characters.f1_father.name usebenzise iziphumo ukunceda u@data.characters.f1_son_5.name afunde ukuba izenzo zinefuthe.

SourceText:
@data.characters.f1_father.name did this by:
- 😌 Staying calm 
- 🤝🏾 Involving @data.characters.f1_son_5.name in planning the consequence 
- 💜 Giving a fair consequence related to the behaviour (no playing after dinner if you don't put toys away) 
- ⭐ Being consistent by following through with the consequence
text:
U@data.characters.f1_father.name wenze lento ngoku:
- 😌 Hlala ezolile
- 🤝🏾 Ngokubandakanya u@data.characters.f1_son_5.name ekucwangciseni iziphumo
- 💜 Ukunika iziphumo ezifanelekileyo ezinxulumene nokuziphatha ( akukho kudlala emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa ukuba awuzibeki izinto zokudlala)
- ⭐ Ukuhambelana ngokulandela iziphumo
